title: Brecon Beacons National Park
name: Beili Helyg Guest House
directions: From Penderyn, follow Cwm Cadlan road from Lamb Hotel for 1.5 miles, you'll see sign and yellow grit bin at the gate on your left.
content: Fantastic little B&B with 3 rooms, all en-suite. Very comfortable beds, friendly hosts, delicious breakfasts. Ideally placed for waterfalls and mountains, Walkers and cyclists welcome.

title: Eleuthera
name: Valentines Resort & Marina
content: Valentines is the most vibrant and exciting luxury resort in Harbour Island, Bahamas.  The resort offers 40 spacious, tropically appointed luxury suites with fully equipped kitchens and a 50 slip state of the art Yacht Marina.

title: Puerto Iguazú
name: Poramba Hostel
content: Small, friendly and relaxed hostel, offering both shared and private rooms. In a very nice, tranquil and green part of town, only 300mts. from the bus terminal. Good kitchen. Swimming pool.

title: Lappeenranta
name: Matkustajakoti Turisti-Lappee
content: Centrally located. The shower facilities are shared, the double rooms have private toilets but the single rooms do not. Prices include breakfast and the use of the sauna facilities.

title: Labuan
name: Pulau Labuan Hotel
content: a 2-star hotel. Rooms with A/C, attached toilet and wifi. Breakfast included.

title: Lesotho
name: Maliba Mountain Lodge
content: New 5 star luxury lodge situated in the [[Ts'ehlanyane National Park]]. Luxury suites, excellent food and a location like no other.  Hiking and pony-trekking available.

title: Carpentras
name: Le Coq Hardi
content: also has a restaurant

title: Zierikzee
name: Hotel Lotus
content: The hotel rooms are above a Chinese restaurant. All rooms have views on the port.

title: Zruč nad Sázavou
name: Penzion pod Zámkem
content: Offers nice rooms under the castle near the old town centre. You can also enjoy a café in this pension.

title: Semmering
name: Panhans Hotel
content: Is a historic 4 stars hotel in the centre, which opened in 1888 and got enlarged since. For the restaurant of the hotel see above.

title: Milan/Outer Milan
name: Hotel Bonola
content: Hotel Bonola is close to the freeway exits (the Tangenziale Ovest exit "Viale Certosa" is 1 km away), "Rho-Pero", the new trade show center and Mazdapalace the historical trade show center.

title: Tweed
name: Beachwood Hollow Resort
content: Cottage rentals on Stoco Lake, boat rentals, sandy swimming beach, play area, docks, beach and lounge chairs, lake water slide, rafts, wi-fi.

title: Edinburgh/Old Town
name: Euro Hostel Edinburgh
content: Kincaid's Court, Guthrie Street. In Cowgate, open every summer from June 8th until September 2nd. Budget accommodation in 43 apartments used as student residences during term time.

title: Takamatsu
name: Castle Hotel
content: This hotel could easily be your best budget japanese style hotel experience. Japanese style rooms have a tea table, tv, kettle, fridge, a separate sleeping area with futon and a real japanese bath. Every room has yukata (kimono style robe) ready for guests. Friendly owner speaks good English. Don't get confused as the hotel is not marked in English. It's the first building after the railway crossing. The same railway crossing won't let you sleep early or late as it starts beeping every ten minutes from 6am to midnight.

title: Gansbaai
name: Haus Giotto B+B
directions: In De Kelders, 5 km before Gansbaai.
content: A modern, small and intimate B&B in the peaceful village of De Kelders.

title: Helsinki/Central
name: Eurohostel
content: Helsinki's largest hostel, very close to the dock for the Viking Line ferry and the Uspenski Cathedral.  Dorms from €24.10, single rooms from €45 (plus €2.50/person for non-HI members).

title: Tbilisi
name: Walker Hostel
directions: From Metro Freedom sq. to Leselidze st. in the end of Zdanevich upturn (behind Bethlemi st. 27).
content: Cozy rooms, big living room, kitchen and balcony with incredible view. 24h reception, fan, airport transfers (11€), BBQ area, bicycle parking, cable TV, free parking, free WiFi, laundry, linen and towels included, lockers, luggage storage, tours/travel desk.

title: Hargeisa
name: Ambassador Hotel
directions: 1.4 km north-west of the airport, just off the main highway
content: One of only two Western-style hotels in Somaliland, the Ambassador is where foreign ambassadors stay when visiting the country. The facilities are top-notch by African standards, with a 24-hour gym, laundry, restaurants, non-alcoholic bar, room service, free Wi-Fi and a mosque. Additionally, the English-speaking hotel staff can organise visas, flights and tours to major Somaliland sights. Safe for solo female travellers.

title: Blanes
name: Hotel Santa Marta
address: Playa de Santa Cristina, s/n - 17310 [[Lloret de Mar]]
content: 5 stars

title: Pécs
name: HUNGUEST Hotel Kikelet
alt: Art & Fit Hotel, Restaurant and Wellness
directions: North one km from center. Next to Hotel Fenyves Panoráma
content: The hotel is located at one of the most scenic spots of the Mecsek Mountains, directly above the downtown of Pécs. The hotel offers a unique view onto the town and the neighbouring hills.

title: Paris/16th arrondissement
name: Hotel Eiffel Kennedy
content: Small three star hotel (33 rooms).

title: Marrakech
name: The Heart of the Medina backpackers hostel
content: 1st backpackers hostel to be located in the Medina. 1 minute walk from Djemaa Place. Rooftop terrace, hot showers, comfortable surroundings. No more than 6 beds to a room. Breakfast included as are bed linens, towels, and free wifi. You can expect to pay €8 euro/person all year round per night if booked in advance via email or website. No lockouts, no curfews, and is open 24/7, 365 days/ year.

title: Singapore/Chinatown
name: Hotel Re!
content: Former primary school repainted with eyeball-blistering fluorescent shades and thus now a 12-storey, 140-room "retro boutique" hotel.  Located on a hilltop (Pearl's Hill Park) and a 5-10min walking distance to Outram MRT station. Restaurant offers a variety of international cuisine and daily international-themed set meals at $18.80++.

title: Sopron
name: Black Sheep (Fekete Bárány) Restaurant, guesthouse
content: Five rooms , Rent a bike, WIFI. Restaurant: Hungarian, folk food

title: Christchurch
name: Addington Court Motel
content: Close to Addington Raceway, A&P Showgrounds and Westpac Trust Stadium.

title: Logroño
name: Hotel Murrieta
content: 3-star hotel.

title: Budapest/Pest
name: ACHAT Premium Hotel Budapest
price: dbl from HUF14500 all tax incl.
content: ****Part of a German hotel chain. Rooms: 134. All rooms with air-conditioning. Five maisonette suites and Business and Superior rooms. Cosy "Bistrorante" with outdoor terrace offers both Hungarian specialities and international cuisine. Also here an elegant lobby bar.

title: Tirana
name: Freddy's Ho(s)tel
content: Rooms are passable, usually with ensuite. No true dorm rooms. WiFi

title: Bunbury
name: Mantra Bunbury
content: Opened in December 2008 Bunbury’s newest boutique property, Mantra Bunbury, presents a tangible vision of contemporary elegance and hospitality. This full service Hotel caters to business and leisure travelers as well as locals looking for an intimate getaway. Mantra Bunbury offers sixty-four superbly appointed deluxe and standard studio suites set within the heritage precinct of The Silos. Capture the historical aura of the Silos in the hotel lobby, the gallery featuring works by Leon Pericles and opening in March, a fully-licensed residential club lounge . Other hotel features include an enclosed year-round climate controlled swimming pool and deck, a spa, tennis courts, landscaped gardens, professionally managed state of the art health spa and off-street parking

title: Saint Petersburg/North
name: Gostinitsa «Viborgskaya»
content: "Turris" network of hotels. A few minutes walk from the subway. Built on the Soviet era, which imposes limits on the number of rooms, and casts doubt on the three stars. There are rooms with no amenities, finishing standard rooms could be better. If the budget allows, better to stay in the junior suites and above. The lobby has a free hour internet Wi-Fi, bar and restaurant on the ground floor, you can order breakfast or half-board by the "buffet".

title: Copenhagen/Vesterbro
name: Copenhagen Island
content: Newly build 4 Star hotel located on its own artificial island in the harbour - hence the name - which apart from some exceptions, gives you good views from the room. Stylish interiors and good service. And one of Copenhagen's largest shopping centers right next door.

title: Győr
name: Alfa Hotel and
content: *** Eleven rooms, 26 beds. All rooms with color TV, mini bar, telephone, safe and air conditioning. Parking and storage are free. 24 hour reception. Free Wi-Fi..

title: Sibiu
name: Sibiu Travelers Hostel/Villa Teilor
price: €10.80 per night, including breakfast and tea, coffee and cooled mineral water day & night and free laundry
content: In a quiet area close to the train and bus station (5 min walk) and another 9 minutes walk from the ancient centre. Breakfast, coffee, tea and mineral water included. 2 PCs and fast wireless Internet everywhere, personal lockers & towels for free, spacious, cozy garden with wooden benches & tables and a patio curled around by wine ranks. Two bathrooms & toilets, a fully equipped kitchen and free laundry.

title: Rovaniemi
name: B&B Reindeerstreet 24
content: Friendly bed & breakfast next to Ounasvaara, about 1.3 km from downtown, can arrange tours and activities during your stay.

title: Timișoara
name: Hostel Costel
content: A house and huge garden with lots of common places, a really big and nice equipped kitchen. Free Wi-Fi, lockers in every room and friendly hosts who can help with every question.

title: Orchha
name: Sheesh Mahal
content: Beautifully designed hotel situated in the palace.

title: Kaunas
name: Daniela Hotel
content: 4 stars hotel is in the very heart of the city, next to the main pedestrian street Laisves Avenue. 75 rooms.

title: Salalah
name: Haffah House
address: Al Matar and Ar Robat Sts
content: Old rooms, basic but decent. Very close to the airport and in the centre of the city so it's easy to reach any place you want to get to, reasonable swimming pool, gym and tennis courts. Banking and rent a car services are available in the same building.

title: Heredia
name: Hotel America
content: Probably the most comfortable place in downtown Heredia. It is located half a block from Parque Central.

title: Yurihonjo
name: Route Inn Hotel
alt: ホテル ルートイン 由利本荘
directions: At the junction of Highway 7 and Highway 107 in Honjo.
content: This hotel has a convenient location for people traveling by car.

title: Debar
name: Hotel Kosovrast
price: Standard / Modern / Suite €24/28/34 per person & full board
content: Hotel Kosovrasti is located on the cost of Debar's Lake. A perfect place to stay and also get a medical treatment using thermo-mineral waters.

title: Sarandë
name: Porto Eda Hotel
content: The simple. Mobile: +355 69 7233180

title: Tbilisi
name: Veziko apartments
content: Warm and cosy apartments to stay at, a lovely and hospitable family run this place in Old Tbilisi, so backpackers who are into local lifestyle would be able to feel it by staying in a real georgian house, about 25$ per night/double bed. internet, stove and bath is available.

title: Shanghai/Huangpu
name: Les Suites Orient, Bund Shanghai
content: Right on the Bund opposite the ferry terminal, the Les Suites Orient lives up to its name. The free breakfast is not to be missed.

title: New Orleans/Uptown
name: Creole Gardens Bed and Breakfast Inn
content: One block from the St. Charles Ave. Streetcar Line. Next to the Warehouse District, and just 12 blocks from the French Quarter. Famous for colorful banana courtyard, kid and pet friendly and great hot breakfast.

title: Alajuela
name: Villa Calas
content: Chalet style rooms and restaurant near Poás Volcano.

title: Vientiane
name: Saysouly Guesthouse
address: 23 Manthatulath Road, Ban Xieng Yeun, Vientiane
content: Nice, atmospheric. Family suite upstairs is huge, clean, very comfortable, and an excellent value. Warning: bedbugs (Dec 2014).

title: Copenhagen/Østerbro
name: Hotel Rye
checkin: Until 9PM, but later check-in is possible for a fee
content: This is a small, unusual hotel with a cozy atmosphere and homemade buns with the breakfast, feels like a real apartment, complete with showers and toilets down the hallway.

title: Da Nang
name: HAGL Plaza Da Nang
directions: Corner of Nguyen Van Linh & Hoang Dieu
content: 206 air conditioned rooms, all of which have cable TV, Internet, minibar, and shower with bathtub. Has spa and swimming pool, fitness room/gym, and restaurant, bar and café.

title: Dumaguete
name: Hotel Palwa
content: near international ATM

title: Hadrian's Wall
name: The Greenhead Hotel and Hostel
content: Both the hotel and hostel are a short distance from the wall. For the hostel, ask at the hotel.

title: Barcelona/Eixample
name: Hotel del Comte
content: 1 km from La Rambla. Renovated in 2007 and now boasts super-slick rooms with glass and marble bathrooms, flat panel TVs, free Wi-Fi. Problems with 3rd-party bookings reported, so book directly.

title: Arequipa
name: Pirwa Park Hostel Arequipa
directions: San Cercado Arequipa. A few steps from the Plaza de Armas
content: Free breakfast, free internet, pick up service, kitchen, laundry, breakfast and comfortable beds.

title: Shikinejima
name: Kamanoshita campsite
content: Near the beach, not far from the hot springs. No reservation. Closed during July, August, January, February and Golden Week. Toilets, water, BBQ place.

title: Malang
name: Hotel Pelangi
content: Centrally located mid range hotel in the city.

title: Sydney/Darling Harbour
name: Hotel Ibis Darling Harbour
content: Economy international hotel, right on the western edge of Darling Harbour, near Harbourside

title: Murmansk
name: Park Inn Poliarnie Zori
directions: A short walk up the hill from the Detskiy Mir bus stop.
price: From 1300 rubles for a basic single
content: A clean, well-located hotel with helpful front desk staff. Includes the very popular nightclub Ledokol ("Ледокол") which often hosts live music performances.

title: Käsivarsi Wilderness Area
name: Jogasjärvi open wilderness hut
content: Open wilderness hut (4 persons). Fireplace (should have been repaired by fall 2014, check).

title: Urban camping in Japan
name: Dogo Park
content: Very nice, big, quiet park. Has public toilets, rest huts and vending machines. It is very near Dogo Onsen (oldest onsen in Japan and a considerable tourist attraction) so it is well located. Also, if you are doing the [[88 Temple Pilgrimage|Shikoku Pilgrimage]], you are not straying far away from the henro path, and you will be assured a good night's rest as camping pilgrims are highly respected and you will not be bothered by anyone.

title: Turku
name: Radisson Blu Hotel Marina Palace
content: Located on Linnankatu overlooking the River Aura Hotel Marina Palace is considered by many to be the best hotel in Turku. It has housed many celebrities visiting Turku, including Queen Elizabeth II and royal family of Sweden. With well-appointed, baroque-style rooms overlooking the Aura River, it offers premium lodging at the city centre. You can dine at two on-site restaurants including the popular ''Grill it! Marina'', and take advantage of enticing benefits like complimentary access to the fully equipped gym.

title: Tallinn
name: Barons Boutique Hotel
content: The hotel is in an old bank building and features and overdose of pretentiousness for what are essentially quite simple rooms.

title: Las Vegas
name: Mandalay Bay
content: Located at the far southern end of the Strip next to the Luxor.

title: Schiphol Airport
name: citizenM Amsterdam Airport
content: A modern budget hotel with trendy design rooms. Every room has Wi-Fi access, films-on-demand and an LCD television.

title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: The Sloane Square Hotel
content: Modern and stylish hotel with good location in Chelsea close to a great array of shops.

title: Wanaka
name: Wanaka View Motel
content: One, two and three-bedroom chalets near the lakefront.

title: Chippenham
name: Lucknam Park Hotel
directions: Exit ''M4'' at ''Junction 17'' and head southwest on dual carriageway''(A350)'' for 2.5 mi. At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto ''West Cepen Way(A350)'', continue to follow ''A350'', go through 2 roundabouts for 1.0 mile. At the roundabout, take the 4th exit onto ''Bristol Road(A420)'', continue to follow ''A420'' for 4.9 mile. At ''Ford'' turn left toward ''Colerne'' for 1.5 mile. Sign for hotel entrance on right
content: A 5 star hotel and spa set in the Wiltshire countryside near the city of Bath. The hotel offers numerous activities including an equestrian centre and has a Michelin Star restaurant

title: Parikia
name: Apollon Hotel Paros
content: 3 star hotel with 23 fully equipped rooms. Traditional Cycladic style villas with panoramic views of the sea, the bay of Parikia and the surrounding islands.

title: San Diego/North
name: Homewood Suites San Diego Del Mar
content: Don't be fooled by the name. This hotel is not in Del Mar, but in the neighborhood of Sorrento Valley. The location is actually more convenient to points south of the I-5/I-805 merge.

title: Bangor (Wales)
name: Tyddyn Sydney Bach
address: Tyddyn Sydney, Treborth, Bangor Gwynedd LL57 2NJ
content: VisitWales 5* Holiday Cottage for two people.  19th Century stone cottage fully furnished and equipped.

title: Stockholm/Gamla Stan
name: Rica Hotel Gamla Stan
content: A four-star hotel in a 17th century building.

title: Bangkok/Silom
name: Tarntawan Place
alt: ทานตะวัน เพลส
content: Only 150 metres from Soi Patpong 1, this luxurious hotel is well worth it. The 24-hour breakfast service caters to those who'd like to sleep through the morning after a night of partying.

title: Sedona
name: Pine Flat Campground
content: Open April - October, this is another very popular campground. 56 units are available, 18 of which can be reserved [http://www.recreation.gov/campgroundDetails.do?contractCode=NRSO&parkId=70645&topTabIndex=CampingSpot online]. Vault toilets, drinking water (no showers), no hookups, trailers under 30'. Campers may use the coin-operated showers at nearby Cave Springs Campground (listed above).

title: Beaver Creek
name: Luxury Home Rentals by East West Resorts
directions: on site private check in at residence
content: Large private ski homes on the slopes. Full concierge services, vacation consultant assistance, ski in / ski out. From four to seven bedrooms.

title: Longyearbyen
name: Mary-Ann's Polarrigg
price: NOK595/850 for a single/double, breakfast NOK95 extra
content: Former miner's barracks converted into a bed and breakfast. A bit pricier than the competition, but the selling point is the central location.

title: Tullahoma
name: Executive Inn
content: Hotel amenities include a 24 hour front desk. Suites and Jacuzzi rooms are available. Pets welcome at a nominal fee. All rooms offer free internet access, cable TV and free local calls. Microwaves and fridges are available in some rooms.

title: Kolkata/Esplanade
name: Paragon Hotel
directions: off Sudder St, Park Street metro station
content: Recently under new management which refuses to pay the union wages that were previously paid. Rather loud dormitory next to rather loud reception area for Rs 120. You get plenty of action nearby

title: Gower Peninsula
name: Number 38 The Gower
address: Gower Holiday Village, Scurlage Nr Port Eynon, SA3 1AY
content: Self-Catering Bungalow, sleeps 6, pets welcome, free WiFi, Pool, indoor outdoor play areas, shop,pub and fish & chip shop with walking distance.

title: Santa Cruz Trek
name: Paria
content: Recommended camp site for the first night.

title: Shankarpur
name: Hotel Sandy Bay
content: All rooms A/C, multi cuisine A/C restaurant and bar. A pick up and drop off service is available.

title: Troy (New York)
name: Hilton Garden Inn Troy
content: Ample meeting space, free parking, and the Recovery Sports Grill is on site.

title: Amritsar
name: Hotel Hong Kong Inn
address: Queens Road (Crystal Chowk),Hotel Lane, Opposite Country Inn Hotel
content: Rooms: 47

title: Sopron
name: Palatinus Pansion
price: Single / double (off - low - high season) HUF10300-11300-11800 / 16400-17400-18400, Off period: Jan - March, Nov; Low season: Apr –Jun; Sept–Oct; High season: Jul–Aug (2014)
content: Capacity: 60 people. Single rooms, double rooms and apartments with a shower and toilet. Services: non-smoking rooms, wake up calls, drink-bar, closed parking, internetconnection in a lobby (free), SAT TV, creditcard acception, cab/taxi ordering, money exchange

title: Rovaniemi
name: Rantasipi Pohjanhovi
content: Four star downtown hotel with saunas and swimming pool.

title: Sopron
name: Botanikuskert Hostel
alt: Botanikuskerti Diákszálló, Fekete Zoltán Diákhotel és Kollégium
price: Dorm HUF4400, sgl HUF5900, breakfast included, supper one or two course(s) plus HUF1000 or HUF1400
content: Capacity: 203 people. ONLY during summer! Rooms (53): seventeen double, one 1+2 bed, twelve 2+2 bed, two triple, fourteen 2 + 3 bed room, seven 3+3 bed. All with bath, Wi-Fi, microwave oven, fridge.+36 99 518 240. Breakfast is served between 7:00 and 9:30. 24-Hour Front Desk. Elevator. Free closed parking inside. Kitchen. Internet and cable television access in rooms. Wheelchair access rooms. Locked bicycle storage. Meeting room, laundry, a smoking room per each level, taxi ordering, bus parking. '''Wellness''' services: Gym daily / weekly: HUF400 / 1200 per person; Finnish sauna:HUF 600 / hour for one person, over 2 persons:HUF 500 / person, cabin rental (8 pers): HUF3500 / hour, Turbo solarium: HUF100 / min. Other services: Secure underground parking garage: Cars for HUF500 / night or one week: HUF2500; Motorcycle for HUF300 / night or one week: HUF 1500. The closed open air parking are free. - Dual bowling lanes: 1500 / lane / hour.

title: Nagykanizsa
name: Marika-City Pension
price: Jun.1st-Sep.15th Sgl /Dbl or Twin / Tpl  HUF7300 /10600 /14100. Family rooms for four / five persons HUF16900 / 20900  all tax inc. (out of season about 15% discount)
content: , In the central pension designed of high level, 7 rooms with shower and toilet, with colour TV; breakfast room and carpark are waiting for the guests. Free wifi spot.

title: Sonoma
name: MacArthur Place
content: Luxury hotel property with a spa. Western themed, but don't let that square you - the decor is modern and classy with all the touches of a (fancy) home. Lovely gardens, many types of rooms, and free internet. Breakfast and wine reception included. MacArthur also has free DVDs you can borrow and a fitness center. Onsite restaurant is Saddles, a high end steakhouse with a tacky cowboy theme.

title: Dresden
name: Holiday Inn
content: Halfway between the airport and the old town, this hotel is a considerable distance from most points of interest.

title: Rovaniemi
name: Guesthouse Borealis
content: This is a very friendly guesthouse located in the immediate vicinity of the railway station. Cross the road from the railway station, directly in front of you is the red-yellowish university building, find a small walking road to your left (facing the building) that goes uphill. Turn left to the bigger road and walk 25 metres (80 feet). If you are looking for a warm and hospitable place to stay then this is worth checking out.

title: Stuttgart
name: Arcotel Camino
content: The Arcotel is an art- and design-themed hotel in a historic building on Heilbronner Strasse, north of the Hauptbahnhof. There are many various rooms in the hotel, including a special ''Stuttgart 21'' room with a view on the construction site and a telescope for you to zoom in on details.

title: Ambergris Caye
name: Sunset Beach
content: Sunset Beach is a peaceful 12 condo resort just south of San Pedro. www.Vacation-Rentals-Belize.com

title: Vienna/Landstraße
name: Best Western Plus Amedia Hotel Wien
content: Rather boring both outside and inside (although with liberal use of red), the hotel is easy to miss at the far end of Landstrasser Hauptstrasse. Amedia marks high on comfort, cleaniness and service, which is a combination rarely found in Viennese hotels.

title: Tucson
name: Starr Pass Golf Suites
content: 80 spacious casitas and suites with spectacular desert views, many with fireplaces and balconies.

title: Cameron Highlands
name: Westwood Highland
directions: Between Kampung Raja and Kuala Terla
price: Dorm: RM35, single private room w/ shared bathroom: RM60, double private room w/ shared bathroom: RM100, family rooms (3 / 4 persons) w/ private bathroom: RM220 (All with breakfast included)
content: The owner of this hostel, Troji, is an experienced traveller who decided to found his own hostel in his hometown after living around Malaysia and in London. He's running the hostel with the help of his lovely family. The location is not that good but Troji offers free pick-ups from Kualka Terla or Kampung Raja in the main road, just call him in advance. Extra clean hostel with a western spirit (free WIFI, home cinema in the living room and a coffeeshop with one of the best expresso in the highlands) in the middle of a flower farm runned by Troji's family. https://www.facebook.com/pages/Westwood-Highland/152967308220749

title: Madrid
name: Osuna
content: Set in the middle of the main business districts.

title: Pori
name: Sokos Hotel Vaakuna
content: 416 Beds in 203 Rooms.

title: Flagstaff
name: Canyon Vista Campground
content: Open beginning of May to mid-October, with 11 individual sites. Located near Walnut Canyon, with good views of the San Francisco Peaks. Drinking water and vault toilets, no hookups, trailers/RVs under 22'.

title: Bangkok/Thonburi
name: River Side Bangkok
content: This two-star hotel has 262 "superior" and "deluxe" rooms. Rooms are fully equipped with modern facilities and some include a room-service breakfast. Many of the rooms have a nice view over the Chao Phraya River.

title: Djenné
name: Djenne Djenno
content: Owned by a Swedish expat, this "malian boutique" mud brick hotel is richly decorated with traditional textiles from the local ''Bogolan'' tradition. Has an on-site restaurant and also organizes excursions.

title: Catania
name: Hotel Villa Cibele
content: The hotel is in an elegant early 19th century building. The villa was restructured and has reached the old time majesty and elegance. In it the villa emerge the ancient and the modern following by a logical line of design and colours.

title: San Diego/Downtown
name: ITH Adventure Hostel
content: A friendly and cozy hostel that offers free breakfast and free dinner daily. Also they provide free adventure activities that guests can go on to enjoy San Diego.

title: Boston/Downtown
name: Boston Marriott Longwharf
content: Located on Boston Harbor at the historic Long Wharf in downtown Boston. This Boston, Massachusetts hotel features 400 hotel rooms, 11 hotel suites, a concierge lounge with harbor views, and Oceana Restaurant that serves fresh seafood cuisine.

title: Berlin/City West
name: Pestana Berlin Tiergarten Hotel
content: Located next to the Tiergarten park and zoo, in a quiet corner between embassies.

title: Virgin Gorda
name: Bitter End Yacht Club and Resort
price: For landlubbers, villas are around $6000 a week, double occupancy during high season
content: This resort has both public slips, rooms for the night, and many nice hammocks scattered beneath palm trees from which to see the view. Accessible only by sea, it has its own ferry from Gun Creek.

title: Frankfurt
name: Frankfurter Hof
content: The grand old hotel of Frankfurt and known for excellent style and service for more than 130 years.

title: Gillingham (Kent)
name: Medway Youth Hostel
content: 40 bed summer hostel about 3 miles from Gillingham, housed in a districtive converted Oast House in a semi-rural setting.

title: Chapel Hill
name: Holiday Inn Express
content: Has access to the pool at the (nicer) hotel next door. Free hot breakfast, clean rooms, and good wi-fi.

title: Prague/Old Town and Josefov
name: Botel Florentina
price: Depending on season, last minute deals.
content: Boat moored close in the centre. Cruises, restaurant.

title: Aufseß
name: Schloss Unteraufseß
content: apartment in the castle.

title: Percé
name: La Maison Réhel
price: High season rates: $80-$85/nt for up to 2 people; $25/nt each additional person
content: Open Jun-Sep. Located in a calm setting off the main drag yet boasting easy access to all of Percé's attractions, La Maison Réhel is a spacious old Victorian house dating to 1910 (built by local country lawyer Alphonse Garneau) whose relaxing porch gives you a front-row view of towering '''Mont Sainte-Anne''' and the majestic '''St. Michael's Catholic Church'''. Inside there are five rooms, all of which are decorated handsomely in period style with hardwood floors and antique furniture, and all but one of which boast ample queen-size beds ("L'Aubergine" makes up for only having a double bed with the inclusion of a small dresser and sink). Bathrooms are shared. Elsie and Augustine serve a full breakfast every morning from 7:30AM-9AM featuring locally sourced ingredients, and are on hand constantly to share information on what there is to do around town.

title: Brufut
name: Sheraton Gambia Resort
content: Brufut also has The Gambia's finest hotel, the five-star Sheraton Gambia Resort, which overlooks a beautiful beach. The hotel with its well featured large conference facilities was one of the main locations for the 7th AU Summit, hosting the opening and closing ceremonies as well as the major sessions of the conference and lodging the presidents offices.

title: Vienna/Hietzing
name: Hostel Hütteldorf
content: This Youth Hostel is preferred by students.

title: Entebbe
name: Rosemary Courts
content: Opened in Jan 2014 with 6 tastefully and comprehensively furnished double rooms and 2 family rooms each with modern fitted kitchen and air-con. 25m swimming pool with an attractive, rainbow opalescent tiled bottom will open in Jul 2014. Authentic and hygienic fruit juices and smoothies in a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. Kampala trained chef specializes in Italian cuisine and there is an intimate, 30 cover restaurant. Free Wi-Fi (provided by a cellular link, so rather intermittent like most of Uganda). Lush garden has mature shade trees and relatively quick beverage and cake service for Uganda. Fully tiled and luxuriously equipped ''en suite'' doubles with bathtub from USD89 (single occupancy USD79) including ''à la carte'' cooked breakfast, with kitchenette USD119.

title: Suzdal
name: Sokol hotel
content: A large hotel currently under renovation after a fire. 67 rooms in two buildings.

title: Milan/Centro Storico
name: Hotel Lloyd
content: Offers large meeting rooms and a well-being program. Local business, shopping and culture just 10 minutes walk from the hotel.

title: Calgary
name: Hyatt Regency
content: Pet-friendly. Spa.

title: Beijing/Dongcheng
name: Eastern Morning Youth Hostel
address: Dongdan Santiao, behind the Oriental Plaza
directions: in the basement of the Oriental Plaza complex next to Wangfujing Pedestrian Street
price: Private rooms cost about ¥90 per night—book in advance
content: A great budget option if price is your primary concern. The staff do not speak much English but are friendly. Internet access is available at ¥10 per hour. It is a five-minute walk to the Dongdan or Wangfujing subway stations and about a 15-minute walk to the International Hotel airport shuttle stop.

title: Entebbe
name: Boma Guesthouse
directions: In May 2014, road was still signed as "Gower Rd"
price: ''En suite'' sgl USD120, dbl/twin USD140, tpl USD180 (one budget room with pvt shower room & WC opposite USD90/110 sgl/dbl) incl VAT and cooked full English breakfast pool use & airport transfers. €, GBP, UGX, USD (bills later than 2005) cash only
content: Colonial homestead set in extensive and lush gardens with abundant bird life, this boutique hotel has attentive, friendly and helpful staff looking after it's 16 rooms. There is a large and comfortable guest lounge and an adjoining games room with guest computers and scanner. Printing a boarding pass is free - other printing & photocopying for UGX500 per page. All bedrooms & ablutions are effectively fly-screened and have digital safe, TV with 7 individually controlled satellite channels incl Al Jazeera, BBC World News, CNN, Fox & M-NET movie channels, desk & chair and an outside patio well equipped with electrical outlets. Rooms 1 & 2 have hip baths. There is both a standby generator & lavish provision of lead acid, battery-backed inverters. Each accommodation building has solar powered water heating with a good head of water. Extraction fans are wind powered and mineral water is available from water coolers and jugs in each bedroom. Bird tables and baths are well maintained. The children's sandpit has shade umbrella, swings, slides, toys, toy-car & a pirate castle for climbing. All interior areas, bedrooms, restaurants and the pool area are strictly smoke-free. Reliable and fast Wi-Fi provisioned by Infocom UG.<br />There is an intimate '''restaurant''' adjacent to the sparkling, small pool where breakfast is served 06:00-10:00, lunch from 12:00 & dinner 18:00-22:00 but there is room service 24/7. Pan-fried tilapia was UGX28,000 (May 2014) and served with some of the nicest boiled potatoes in Uganda (as might be expected from an Irish-owned establishment), three different vegetables and fragrant, rosemary bread. Lemon meringue pie with home-made ice cream was UGX15,000. There is a separate patio restaurant adjacent to the reception area for non-house guests to be entertained and served.<br />

title: Al Wakrah
name: Al Siraaj Wakra Inn Apartments
content: Serviced apartments with free wi-fi and breakfast and onsite coffee shop.

title: Regensburg

content: The hostel is located on ''Unterer Wöhrd'' island in the river Danube.

title: Rotorua
name: Crash Palace backpackers
content: A home away from home. Family run and they really make you feel part of the family. Friendly dog and cat on premises. Hot tub available. Great atmosphere. Part of the Nomads network of hostels.

title: Williams (Arizona)
name: Railside RV Ranch
content: Has cabins for rent as well as RV hookups.

title: Chiang Mai
name: Linda Guesthouse
directions: Close to the railway station, follow the sign at Charoen Muang Rd
price: 100-300 baht, reduced cost for longer stays
content: East of Tha Phae Gate, easily accessible on songthaew routes. Very clean rooms. The guest house also offers many trekking tours. The staff speaks German, English, and Thai. Family-like atmosphere. Cheap and very good food around the clock, freshly made.

title: Sucre
name: Hotel Villa Antigua
content: New beautiful restored mansion from 1860. Spacious rooms, largest garden in Sucre, courtyard with green and fountain surrounded by pillars, several terraces with views over old city and surrounding mountains. Hotel has all facilities, restaurant, gym, WiFi all-over. Stylish and comfortable.

title: Kittilä
name: Guesthouse Golden Goose
content: Free WiFi, sauna.

title: Presidente Prudente
name: Godoy Palace Hotel
content: In an easily accessible location the hotel provides one of the best views in town.

title: Istanbul/Galata
name: Pera Rose Hotel
content: Nice little hotel about a ten minute walk from Taksim square, close to the British consulate-general. Good value for money.

title: Chicago/Wicker Park
name: IHSP Chicago Hostel
content: Keep the party going on the 24 hour "party deck" on the roof. Some private rooms, wifi, bike rentals available.

title: Canggu
name: Villa Avalon Bali
content: 1, 2, 4 and 7 bedroom villa with private pool.

title: Kruševo
name: VilaGora
content: Reasonable accommodation in Krusevo - Macedonia

title: Ayvalik
name: Ayvalikvip
content: Bedroom hotel on Cunda. Standard rooms offer French beds, en-suite bathrooms, air-con, satellite TV, and wireless internet. Car parking available.

title: Nelson (England)
name: Holmefield Gardens B&B
directions: c. 2 km North, just off the A682
content: Modern terraced town house with 2 guest bedrooms of which one is ''en suite''. Wi-Fi access; special provisions for cyclists; cooked breakfast.

title: Budapest/Belváros
name: Le Meridien Budapest
content: Ovelooking the wide and green Erzsebet Ter, the Le Meridien has over 200 plush rooms. Despite the brand's modern inclinations, there is no escaping from "classic" furniture, heavy curtains and crystal chandelier's that characterize so many Budapest hotels. The hotel's "Health Club" includes a gym, swimming pool and jacuzzi, all complimentary to hotel guests.

title: Langkawi
name: Citin Hotel Langkawi by Compass Hospitality
content: Newly renovated, 46 cozy rooms, clean, air-con, 22" LCD flat screen TV, ensuite bathroom. There is a cafe which provides a decent breakfast and the lobby is with WiFi. The friendly staff are well informed about the island.

title: Rio de Janeiro/Zona Sul
name: Golden Tulip Ipanema Plaza
content: Neither super-luxurious or ultra-modern, the Plaza's rooms are quite clean and comfortable. The swimming pool on the terrace is nice and the hotel's location is convenient for both shoppers and beach goers.

title: Käsivarsi Wilderness Area
name: Pihtsusjärvi wilderness hut
directions: on the east shore of Pihtsusjärvi, north of Rassajapuro
content: Open wilderness hut (10 persons) and reservation hut (10 persons). Stove and gas cooker.

title: Niš
name: Hostel Nis
directions: next to the building of the University of Nis (Banovina palace)
content: In the very downtown area, one minute walk from city's fortress, central bus station, and another minute away from the city's central square, in three stories pre-WW2 house. Dorms with 4 and 8 beds per room, privates have 2 beds. There's no check in or check out, staff work 24h/day, two bathrooms, two toilets, and there's hot water 24h/day. Internet (WiFi, desktop) is fast and free of charge. Breakfast isn't included, but you can use the kitchen (one kitchen per floor) to prepare your meal or store your food. Coffee, tea, or home-made rakija brandy is free of charge, as well as using secured parking lot if you travel with your vehicle/bike. Separated area for smoking.

title: Budapest/Central Pest
name: 1 ST Hotel Hostel
content: Cheap hostel, central location, for special request large groups accepted even for 8-15 person.

title: Halifax (Nova Scotia)
name: Gerard Hall
content: Early May to late August.

title: Las Vegas
name: The Mirage
content: An upscale hotel located near the middle of the Strip, the Mirage features a "volcano" that erupts every hour, a white tiger exhibit, a 200,000 gallon tropical aquarium, and a tropical rain forest.

title: Khasab
name: Khasab Hotel
price: OMR 28+/night, more expensive on weekends and during high season
content: Double, triple, deluxe and family rooms. Swimming pool and restaurant. Buffet breakfast included on price. Free Internet access and airport pick-up.

title: Győr
name: Pannonia Hotel
content: One star

title: Albany (New York)
name: Morgan State House - Luxury Inn
content: The Morgan State House is an excellent example of late 19th-century elegance and design. It has been restored to provide the most unique accommodations in the Capital District. Voted "Best in the Capital /Saratoga Region", The Morgan State House is an inn in the European tradition. It is centrally located in downtown Albany, on a quiet, tree-lined residential street overlooking Washington Park and was the longtime home of the artist and suffragette Alice Morgan Wright (1881—1975), who lived here from 1888 (when she was 7 years old) until her death. The house was designed by R.W. Gibson, the architect of the Cathedral of All Saints, for her father, Henry Romeyn Wright, who made a fortune in dry goods during the Civil War. The multiple peaked gables and intricate interior details reflect the Japanese-influenced aesthetic of the 1880s. Alice Morgan Wright was a leading figure in the American suffrage movement and once was jailed in London with Emmeline Pankhurst. In 1921 she helped found the New York League of Women’s Voters. An influential artist of the Art Deco style, Wright maintained a studio on the fourth floor of the house, and her works can be found in museums and private collections throughout the country.

title: Witney
name: Oxford Witney Hotel
content: This 87 rooms hotel of the Four Pillars chain is on the outskirts of town, just off the A40/A415 roundabout. It offers modern 4 star rooms and a good on-site spa and pool.

title: Albuquerque
name: Courtyard Albuquerque
content: Chain motel in the North I-25 area.

title: Snowdonia National Park
name: Plas Gwynfryn
content: An Edwardian Country House available to hire for self catering holidays. Sleeps 14 - 18. Visit Wales 4* Accommodation. The guest bedrooms consist of four double ensuites, two family rooms and a twin room. Sea and mountain views.

title: Union Pier
name: Union Pier Summer House
content: A classic Victorian bed and breakfast.

title: Vienna/Neubau
name: Youth Hostel Vienna-Myrthengasse
content: Institutional.

title: Placencia

content: central location for diving on coral reef, fishing, sailing  and excursions to rainforest and Maya temples, virtually bug free super protected villa steps away from the beach from Placencia with 4 elegant hygienic suites with porch for 2 to 4 people to rent with equipped kitchen, AC, TV, Wi-Fi internet, on 500m from bars, restaurants and supermarkets, free sailing trip with snorkeling for sympathetic guests.

title: Doha
name: Al Madina Suites
price: Rates on official website start at QAR 450.00
content: The hotel offers well-furnished suites all equipped with air-conditioner, Internet connection, cable TV, and coffee/tea maker. Some of its facilities are fitness room/gym, airport and city transfers, tours and excursion desk, and laundry service.

content: Good value bed and breakfast in the north west of the district.

title: Williams (Arizona)
name: Grand Canyon Hotel
content: Oldest hotel in Arizona, since January 1891. A lovely place, right in the middle of Williams. A worthwhile stop on the way to the Grand Canyon or a base to explore it.

title: Tübingen
name: Neckar Camping
content: Another possibility, especially in summer, is the Neckar Camping, beautifully situated on the shore of the river Neckar and within walking distance (approx. 15 min.) of the old town.

title: St. Julian's
name: Le Meridien St Julians Hotel & Spa
price: Varies from around €70 up to €190 per night for the standard room, depending on season, availability and length of stay
content: Le Méridien St Julians is set on the ground of a 19th century villa. Spa facilities include: indoor pool, fitness center, sauna, Jacuzzi, squash court, etc. Also offers a rooftop pool with views on the Bay. Rooms all have a balcony, some of them overlooking the sea. Large bathroom, in-room safe, television, movie selection, refreshment center and internet connection. Main restaurant Scirocco offers buffet options and the KuDeTa Lounge Bar is ideal for a snack at any time of the day. Pool Bar & Grill also available in summer. Kids Club (indoors) available.

title: Semur-en-Auxois
name: Hotel Des Cymaises
content: Beautiful two star hotel down a quiet road right off the tourist area within the old medieval city. It is close to the tourist office, main bus stop, and many restaurants. Comfortable and clean rooms renovated in an 19th century mansion with a lovely private patio area in the rear, breakfast is offered for €9.

title: Maasai Mara National Reserve
name: Manyatta Camp
content: Located just outside the eastern Oloolaimutia Gate with beautiful views over the park. It's possible to reach the village of Oloolaimutia with public transport from [[Narok]].  The matatu is leaving Narok in the morning time and returning in the afternoon.

content: Backpackers hostel in Miami just 1 block from the beach.

title: Iseo
name: Covelo
content: Between Iseo and Pilzone, it has a bar, a restaurant, a mini market and a beach. Free Wi-Fi available.

title: Seinäjoki
name: Hotelli Fooninki
content: from 65€

content: A hostel in an old apartment building right next to the city centre, by the harbour.

title: Saint Petersburg/Center

directions: Minibuses K-3 and K-213, M: Sadovaya
price: Private room (17 rooms) weekday-Weekend sgl/dbl RUB1200-1400/1300-1500, 2 dorms (Four-bed) RUB500, 2 dorms (six-bed) RUB400-450 (2014)
content: phone daily 09:00-21:00. Bike renting. Walk and Bike Tours.

title: West Coast (Suriname)
name: Hotel Pak Hap
price: dorm USD35, dbl USD65, Presidential Suite USD120
content: Mainly a business hotel. Tour reservations possible.

title: Chemnitz
name: Mercure Kongresshotel Chemnitz
content: This hotel is the large landmark "radiator" building found in the centre of Chemnitz. At 386 rooms its one of the largest hotels in the area.  The rooms are equipped with modern amenities and the hotel also offers seminar and conference facilities for up to 300 people.  Parking can be found nearby and the main railway station is within five minutes walk.  Facilities include a restaurant, bar, WiFi Internet access and currency exchange.  Staff at reception also speak English (in addition to German!).  Pets are accepted and there are some smoking rooms. |price=  £30-50 per night.|lat=50.83607434999993|long=12.921029491718032

name: Moro Hotel

name: Nguyen Khang Hotel
directions: In a small quiet alley that links Pham Ngu Lao and Do Quang Dau. Coming from Pham Ngu Lao the alley is next to the Canadian Hotel.

Clean, tastefully simple in decoration, rooms are rather small but have air-con, fan, TV, fridge, and those at the front have large windows. Visa and Mastercard accepted.

title: Muharraq
name: Mövenpick Hotel Bahrain
content: Swiss flair and traditional Arabian hospitality. Overlooks a lagoon and features a fine dining restaurant, international bar, atrium lobby restaurant, pool bar, parking area and two outdoor tennis courts. 7 min driving distance from the city. Babysitting service, business centre, gym, spa, swimming pool, tennis courts. 24-hour room service, internet, mini bar, satellite TV, tea and coffee making facilities (on request).

title: Nilaveli
name: Shahira Hotel
content: Decent prices for clean rooms. Nice owner who tells you all about the tsunami in 2004

title: Quetta
name: Quetta Serena Hotel
directions: In Cantonment area, crossing of Zarghoon Rd and Hali Rd.
content: One of the best hotels around, centrally located and offers lots of service.

title: Lijiang
name: Hidden Garden
address: No. 46 Wenming Alley, Yishang Street (Wuyi Str.) Old Town District 674100 Lijiang, Yunnan, China
directions: get a taxi to Beimen Po Gucheng guan li ju (北门坡 古城 管理局). When you get off the taxi you are at the northside of the old town. Walk down the old cobble street then turn left after 25 meters. After 50 meters this alley ends, you turn left. Follow the street for 120 meters, turn right. The Hidden Garden is situated after 40 meters on the left hand side.
content: Hidden Garden Lijiang is the newest small scale (10 room) guesthouse tucked away in the narrow alleys of Lijiang Old Town. The hostel is located in the upper north eastern parts of the Old Town, just outside the crowds and noise of the center. The old Naxi style house has the ancient look and feel, with modern facilities. There is a peaceful garden, a relaxing and quiet place to hang out, have a coffee, or discuss your travel itinerary with the multilingual staff.

title: Groene Hart

content: Hotel located in the historical town centre.

title: Tynset

title: Dumaguete

title: Copenhagen/Amager

content: Charming old beach hotel from the last century, recently renovated, in some beautiful traditional buildings.

title: Antwerp

content: The Ramada Plaza is a glazed highrise tower overlooking a park, with 210 elegantly appointed rooms, geared towards business travellers. It is in the very south of the city, right next to the Berchem motorway junction. While the location is remote, there is a tram station next to the hotel.

name: Camping Bled
content: In a beautiful green setting close to the lake. Free (but slow) WiFi at the reception.

title: Frankfurt
name: Novotel Frankfurt City
content: 235+ rooms in a solid business traveller hotel. Next to the trade fair ground and has loads of conference rooms

title: Vienna/Josefstadt
name: Hotel Graf Stadion
directions: Metro station (U2 Rathaus) and tram stops nearby
content: The house was built in the Biedermeier Epoche style in 1824/1825 and is registered as a historic monument; it has been run as a hotel since 1897. 39 singles and doubles with bath with shower/WC, hair dryer, clothesline, SAT-Flatscreen-TV, radio, telephone and free WLAN in the entire hotel.

title: Somerset (Kentucky)
name: General Burnside Island State Park
content: The state park campground features 93 sites with electric hookups and 9 primitive tent only sites. Amenities include shower houses and laundry facilities. The campground is open April 1 through October 31. A 2 night minimum stay is required on weekends.

title: Leipzig
name: Mercure Hotel Art Leipzig
content: This Mercure is more about modern comforts than art, but unless you are looking for striking new frontiers in hotel room design, you should be very fine with its reasonably-appointed rooms and free WiFi.

title: Pécs
name: CENTRAL apartment
content: It is a nice apartment with fully equipted kitchen and bathroom. Wifi, Tv.

title: Benllech
name: Llanbedrgoch Holiday Caravan
content: 8 berth, 3 bedroom caravan sited in its own grounds situated in the garden of a farm.

title: Wikivoyage:Listings
name: Hotel Eldorado
content: The Eldorado, a former ''maison de rendez-vous'', was once home to the kept women of the 19th century bourgeois. Now a very cute ''no'' star hotel, its charm more than makes up for what it lacks in amenities (who needs a TV in Paris anyway?). The  staff are super friendly, the décor is garage sale chic, and there's a lovely courtyard that fills with neighbourhood hipsters on warm evenings. It also has a very good location and you can easily avoid the noise of Pigalle or Montmartre's high prices, but they're within stumble distance if you decide to explore. For early risers breakfast (€5, until 10:00) is served in the attached restaurant/bar. Some English spoken, especially for those who pet the cat sprawled across the reception desk.

title: Freetown
name: Family Kingdom
content: Across the road from the beach.

title: Inverness
name: Beach Cottage B&B
content: Bed and breakfast on the shores of the Moray Firth with two guest rooms both with sea views.

title: Buonconvento
name: Villa Armena

title: Durham (North Carolina)
name: Comfort Inn Medical Park
content: Offers guests free shuttle service and a small meeting room.

title: Harkány

content: Accomodate in renovated first floor double bedrooms and  apartments, equipped with shower, toilet, cable TV, refrigerator on second floor. Daily menus in dining hall. With Garden and Terrace. Breakfast: 400 Lunch: 900, Dinner: 700 HUF. Secure parking area inside the institute: 350 HUF per day.

title: Vantaa and Northern Helsinki

content: The national chain Sokos has a hotel in Tikkurila, next the railway station.

title: Borås
name: First Hotel Grand
content: Hallbergsplatsen 2. Luxurious and centrally located.

title: Rehoboth Beach
name: Atlantis Inn
directions: located inbetween 1st and 2nd Street on Rehoboth Avenue
content: In the heart of downtown Rehoboth Beach, 1.5 blocks from the beach and boardwalk.  Deluxe accommodations, suites and efficiencies with sleeping arrangements up to six people per room.  Rooms feature a refrigerator and microwave, or a full kitchen. Your room also includes free wireless internet access, parking, and outdoor pool and large sundeck overlooking Rehoboth Avenue.

title: Semarang
name: Gumaya Tower Hotel
content: 5-star hotel. Houses a few restaurants and a coffee shop.

title: Kilpisjärvi

content: Tundrea Holiday Resort is a holiday residence located in the very heart of Kilpisjärvi. You can stay either in hotel rooms or big chalets. Open all year round. "Original Lapland style" restaurant serving local dishes.

title: Sopron
name: Anna Pansion

price: Sgl /dbl HUF7350 / 10800 all tax incl., + breakfast: HUF900 p.p.
content: Services: - 5 double rooms with bathroom (shower, toilet), with cable TV, internet connection. Diner, lounge with cable TV. Closed parking place in the yard, camera guarded parking place. Card operated entrance, upon request washing facility and assistance with the programs in the town. - No pets!

title: Palermo
name: B&B Novecento
content: Original liberty style building in the historical centre, three-star B&B with rooms with AC, Wi-Fi, private bathroom (external or also ensuite), central heating, LCD tv, mini bar, frigo, original furnishings of early 1900s.
