content: The oldest Ibis in Warsaw is in a slightly unattractive location, but reasonably close to the city centre and many attractions and easily accessible by public transit and by car.

title: Vienna/Inner East
name: Mercure Wien City
directions: Tram lines 1 and 2, stop Salztorbrucke across the Donaukanal
content: The Mercure is in the northwestern part of Leopoldstadt, in an inconspicious 1970s building close to the Donaukanal. The Superior and Privilege rooms are nice and modern, while the Standard rooms are garish with liberal use of red paint, so you will probably want to splurge on the €10 rate difference. WiFi is free throughout the hotel.

title: Bayreuth
name: Arvena Kongress Hotel
price: Single room from €110, double room from €150 (may be cheaper on weekends)
content: Specialized on conferences, congresses, etc.

title: Voss
name: Gamlahuset
price: Weekend prices from kr 1500 and week from kr 2500
content: Gamlahuset is located at the small farm Kvale in the valley Raundalen at Voss, approximately 17 kilometers east of the centre of Voss. Gamlahuset has two big living rooms, three bedrooms, kitchen, two toilets and a bathroom. There are beds for 8 persons. The house, which is from around year 1800, was renovated in 2007. In several of the rooms the authentic style is kept. The house is totally 100 m2.

title: Berlin/City West
name: Hotel Pension Am Park
content: Fairground in walking distance. Small house, personal, individual atmosphere.

title: Bandelier National Monument
name: Juniper Campground
price: Camping fee $12/night/site as of 6/29/06; Golden Age and Golden Access passes provide 50% discount.
content: Open most of the year, but may close in the winter depending on the weather. The gate to Frijoles Canyon closes for the night at sundown and opens at 7AM, the entrance to this campground is just before the gate. There is a 24-hour paystation close to the entrance to pay camping fees (not entrance fees).  The station accepts cash and most credit cards using a do-it-yourself keypad and credit card reader. After dark, its lights turn on automatically when someone approaches the station. Campsite fees are good until 12 noon, more than a single day can be paid for at one time.  First-come, first-serve, no reservations. 94 sites, no hook-ups, but centrally-located water taps and a dump station are available.  Each site has a paved parking pad, picnic table and fire grill. Parking pads, picnic tables and tent sites are nearly all sloped, a few pieces of 2 inch x 6 inch slabs of wood will usually prove helpful in levelling vehicles and picnic tables.  During extreme fire hazard conditions building of fires in the grills may be prohibited. It is always a good idea to bring a fueled stove for cooking rather than to rely only on the possibility of building a fire in the grill. The restrooms have electrical outlets, flush toilets, sinks with hand soap dispensers, and special sanitary sinks to dump small portable toilets and gray water from dishwashing.  No showers (available for a fee at the public pool and the YMCA in Los Alamos, 12 miles/20 km away).  Limit 10 people/2 vehicles/3 tents per site.  Firewood gathering is not permitted. Pets are permitted only in campsites, parking areas, or along roadways, and must be on leash.  Evening programs are offered at campground amphitheater in summer as staffing permits; check the bulletin boards on the restrooms.

title: Reykjavík
name: Hótel Leifur Eiríksson
content: A rather basic hotel, but at a good price given its location just across the street from Hallgrímskirkja. Rooms have satellite TV which includes one English-language channel. The hotel also has a bike rental.

title: Kamianets-Podilskyi
name: Hotel Texas
content: One sgl, four dbl, three tpl rooms

title: Denver
name: Crowne Plaza Denver Downtown
content: Rooms are reasonably spacious and have free broadband internet access and a desk. Breakfast is modestly priced and modest in style. The lobby is typical Holiday Inn. Given the size of the hotel, reception and concierge staff numbers are small but there still seem to be no queues for their services. Stay high in a room on the Glenarm St. side if you want a mountain view. Airport shuttles ($21 to international) serve the hotel.

title: Tbilisi
name: Prestige Hotel
directions: in north, central Tbilisi on a quiet street
content: Quiet, comfortable, newly renovated.+ phones=+995 32 940505, +995 32 942974, +995 32 952974

title: Ubud
name: Dewa Bharata Bungalows
content: Balinese styled accommodation, double bed, twin bed, public pool, direct IDD phone,TV, free wifi, airport transport,motorbike rental,breakfast,restaurant.

title: Nyborg
name: Hotel Hesselet
directions: Just north of the motorway exit before the Great Belt Bridge
content: Moderns hotel with spacious room, many with a good view of the Great Belt.

title: Dumbarton
name: Dumbuck Hotel
content: 16 room hotel in an 18th century mansion house

title: Nagykanizsa
name: Pelikan
directions: From the motorway take the exit to Gyékényes, Kiskanizsa. When you get to the MOL petrol station turn right and then straight away left into Pivári Street. Continue down this street for approximately 1km. - SW from downtown
price: HUF2500-3800 per person all tax  incl.
content: Each room has cable TV and internet connection via W-LAN. There is also a computer with internet available for guests. There is a kitchen with a microwave, fridge and coffee machine. There is a grocery and café located just 5 minutes walk from the pension. Also has a secure car park.

title: Singapore/Chinatown
name: Inn at Temple Street
directions: 1 minute walk from MRT and Chinatown shopping
content: Feels slightly shabby and uncared for: cramped rooms, peeling wallpaper, antiquated air conditioning. The upside is a great location.

title: Nuuksio National Park
name: Tikankolo
content: Another wilderness cabin with a sauna. Room for 6 persons.

title: Swords
name: Forty Four Main Street
content: Forty Four main street (formerly the Hawthorn Hotel) is located in the heart of Swords village, surrounded by bars, shops and championship golf courses.

title: Pori
name: Matkakoti Musa
content: 5 rooms with 12 beds.

title: Offa's Dyke Path
name: Valeside B&B
address: Bella Vista, Tremeirchion Road, Bodfari LL16 4EG
content: 2 dbl (one ''en suite''), 1 ''en suite'' twin.

title: Kakunodate
name: Guesthouse Fūga
content: Inn only without meals.

title: Chania
name: Villa Anna Maria
content: a high aesthetic holiday villa in Gerani that accommodates up to 8 persons

title: Ayvalik
name: Tatil Emlak
content: Rental houses.

title: Guilin
name: Fu Yuan Hotel
directions: from railway station or main bus station with bus #16 to Chuan Shan Qiao bus stop
price: Single bed ¥88, Twin bed ¥118, double prices during Chinese holidays
content: Nice hotel with friendly staff and clean AC rooms. Rooms with PC & Internet access are available. Sharon's Coffee with Western food nearby.

title: San Francisco/Western Addition
name: Hotel Kabuki
content: A Japanese-style hotel with a calm ambiance.

title: Paris/18th arrondissement
name: Terrass Hotel
content: Excellent four star hotel in Montmartre with 98 rooms, en suite baths, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, good restaurant, business facilities. The rooftop restaurant with fantastic views of Paris is open May-Sep.

title: Skellefteå
name: Brunnsgården
content: Bed&Breakfast next to Bonnstan and the river within walking distance from town

title: Banff
name: Fox Hotel & Suites
content: The Fox offers one and two bedroom suites and hotel rooms. The hotel's centerpiece is the hot pool inspired by the original Cave and Basin Site.

title: Copenhagen/Northern suburbs
name: Hotel Fortunen
directions: Bus 388 from Klampenborg station to Ermelundsvej stop
price: Rooms from 425 Kr with shared bathroom
content: A small hotel, in charming yellow brick building from the 1930's. it is at the entrance the huge Dyrehaven park, and many rooms have windows facing the park, with an old fashioned 30s feel - you'll be the judge whether that is good or bad (pictures on the website). Also doubles as a solid traditional restaurant.

title: Lexington (Kentucky)
name: Holiday Inn Express-Lexington Northeast
content: Located just 2 miles from the center of Downtown and 2 miles from the Bluegrass Airport, this hotel built in June 2008 is perfect for both business and leisure travelers.

title: Narita
name: Backpackers Fuji
directions: An 8 minute walk from both JR and Keisei station.
content: A small, well equipped ryokan with two dorm rooms, shared toilets and kitchen. All brand new and well taken care of. Situated in a small street right behind the Omotesando main street. Run by a very nice couple with sufficient English skills. Please bring cash in Yen to pay on arrival.

title: Budapest/North Pest
name: 2night Hostel
address: XIII., Szt. Istvan krt, 22, Just press ’96′
price: 4, 6 bed or dbl. (off season)  €11, €10, €16; - 4, 6 bed or dbl.: €15, €13, €22 per person
content: Big rooms, no bunk beds, free breakfast, free Internet. Formerly known as ''2night Home'' or ''2night Privates hostel''. Offers spacey double rooms and dorms.

title: Greenville (North Carolina)
name: The 5th Street Inn
directions: Corner of 5th St and Library St
content: Built in 1925, this bed and breakfast is registered as a national historic location.  The inn has four rooms available, including the top floor 700ft² ''Chancellor's Suite'' that includes a private bath and a sitting area with a couch.

title: Suzdal
name: Vasilyevsky Monastery
directions: From the monastery to the town centre is a very pleasant 10 minute walk. The main road leading from the Suzdal bus station to the town centre
content: For those interested in a monastic type of stay. The rooms are comfortable, warm, and clean, but are fairly bare-bones, as guests live alongside resident monks. No telephone, TV, or shared kitchen is provided. Two shared bathrooms are available. It is best to exit at Suzdal Bus Station and walk to the monastery. Pay for the room inside the church.

title: Pittsburgh/Downtown
name: Omni William Penn
content: Located in the heart of downtown, the renowned Omni William Penn is a historic landmark recently renovated while retaining its 1916 charm.

title: Kaliningrad
name: The Art Hotel «Pushkin Hall»
content: It is a family hotel.

title: Madrid
name: ME Madrid
content: Located in Plaza de Santa Ana

title: Kigali
name: Auberge La Caverne
directions: A few hundred meters before Place de l'Unite roundabout on the left side.
content: Wifi 1.000 RWF per day. Clean rooms and good basic breakfast. It's a long, uphill walk from the bus station, consider paying 300 for a moto-taxi

title: Liverpool
name: The Liner
directions: Just next to Lime Street station
content: A rather good hotel, well located.

title: Taketomi
name: Taketomi Guesthouse Je t'aime
alt: 竹富ゲストハウス ジュテーム
content: With young backpackers lounging in hammocks while reggae wafts in the background, Je t'aime is the probably the closest thing in all of Japan to a Thailand-style guest house. The owner sings and plays the ''sanshin'', and is especially wicked on the ''sanba'' (three-leaf Okinawa castanets).

title: Winnfield
name: Best Western
content: Outdoor pool, free high speed internet available.

title: Entebbe
name: Sunset Entebbe
price: Sgl from USD40, dbl/twin USD50, tpl USD80
content: Relatively clean single storey buildings in a tranquil setting with 5 rooms in the main building and another 4 in outbuildings, some with their own patio. All rooms have ''en suite'' showers, wash hand basins & WCs but maintenance is haphazard and most shower room windows are unscreened allowing mosquitoes to enter via the ill fitting adjoining door to the bedroom. A meagre breakfast and intermittent Wi-Fi is included in their tariffs. Centrally controlled satellite TV with two channels available at any one time from a larger selection. Airport transfer on arrival or leaving free of charge one way. Otherwise, it's arranged for USD10 per room. If you stay more than one night, airport transfer's free both ways. Negotiate rates for longer stays.

title: Minneapolis/South
name: Courtyard Minneapolis
directions: between Cedar and 19th Ave; Light rail: West Bank; Bus: 2, 3, 7, 22
content: Mid-rise hotel on the West Bank right next to the Seven Corners intersection, and within easy reach of Downtown and the U of M.

title: Lviv
name: Cats' house hostel
address: 20 ulitsa Saksaganskogo, apt. 4 (Second Floor) - вул. Саксаганського, 20, кв. 4
content: 20 beds, 24 hour reception, English, Ukrainian, Russian speaking staff, free Wi-Fi, tea, coffee, breakfast, bed linen, towels, slippers included, washing machine, library, tourist assistance – information, maps, luggage storage. Hostel is in the old Austrian house in the middle of the city near tram and bus stop.

title: Guanajuato
name: La Casa del Tío
content: Great location in the historic center, budget, basic, no frills but clean, free kitchen, wireless, promotions and the best rooftop in Guanajuato. This is a legally-registered hostel in the city and the owner, Olivia Machuca, is the president of the Associacion of Mexican Hostels. Their goal is to provide a professional and friendly service to the visitors. La Casa del Tío is always recommended in travel guides such as ''Lonely Planet'', ''Rough Guides'' and ''Let's Go'' among others. The laundry machine they offer on the website doesn't work.

title: Zierikzee
name: Bed & Breakfast Hibernaculum
content: This B&B has 4 excellent rooms.

title: Bangkok/Khao San Road
name: Nouvo City Hotel
directions: right next to the New World City Hotel, across from May Kaidee's 2
content: A new boutique hotel with very nice rooms, a roof-top swimming pool, complete spa, free Wi-Fi for guests and a halal restaurant. Buffet breakfast is included with the price.

title: Mar Lodj
name: La Nouvelle Vague
content: The Nouvelle Vague offers a warm family ambiance in a setting great for small groups with service that’s hard to find elsewhere in Senegal. The accommodations are private straw-roof huts, offering tropical comfort and views of the delta from the terrace. Lagoon and ocean-fishing excursions are available. Locally-owned.

title: Helsinki/West
name: Stadion Hostel
content: In the Olympic Stadium building to the north of the center, but quite easily accessed by tram.

title: Oulu
name: Airport Hotel
price: weekdays: single rooms 100 €, double rooms 120 €. Weekends: single rooms 75 €, double rooms 85 €.
content: A decent hotel 5 minutes by car from the airport.

title: Tampere
name: Dream Hostel
content: Just opened and newly renovated hostel. Apparently the first one that is close to what you expect from a hostel elsewhere.

title: Las Vegas
name: Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center
content: Non-gaming, non-smoking hotel.

title: Prague/Old Town and Josefov
name: Pension U Medvídků
directions: literally: at the bear cubs, 5 min walk form Old Town
content: On the site of an old brewery that is now a Czech Budweiser (Budvar) restaurant, the pension building houses a brewing museum and shop. It is also connected to a smaller bar that is open until 3AM. The rooms are clean and atmospheric. Ask for a room at the very top (#43 is a good pick) to avoid street/restaurant noise. Rates are seasonal but start from around 1550Kč/2300Kč/3100Kč per night for singles/doubles/triples off peak. Add an extra 10% if you want one of the beautifully restored historical rooms.

title: Bergamo
name: NH Orio Al Serio
content: The other NH in Bergamo is an airport hotel across the ''autostrada'' from the Il Caravaggio airport, which you can reach via an underground passage. The huge Oriocenter shopping centre is also adjacent. The hotel features simple rooms, large glazed lounge (if you want to pass time watching the cars on the autostrad). Breakfast is usually included in room rates and starts at 4 AM, a shuttle to the airport is available for EUR 5. To get to the city centre, take bus line 1 from the airport. It is a good option for those arriving on late or departing on early flights.

title: Barcelona/Sant Martí
name: Tryp Barcelona Condal Mar
content: In a round modern tower a few blocks north of the Diagonal. Typical Tryp features, including family rooms with foldaway bunk beds.

title: Pogradec
name: Hotel Kalaja
content: Mobile: +355 69432799. -  The Hotel 2 stars. There are 80 rooms including 8 suites. In restaurant, the fixed menu is €6/halfboard, €10/full board p.p.

title: Bitola
name: Hotel Tokin House
content: Very central - just 20m from Shirok Sokak Street.

title: Gundagai
name: Tuckerbox Motor Inn
directions: on the Hume Highway at South Gundagai
content: The Tuckerbox Motor Inn is the newest four star motel at Gundagai.

title: Flagstaff
name: Flagstaff KOA
content: Spaces for trailers/RVs and tents, cabins available. Laundry, showers, wi-fi and shuttle bus; bicycles available to rent.

title: Melbourne/City Centre
name: Rydges Melbourne
content: Opposite Her Majesty’s Theatre, one block from The Comedy and Princess Theatres, and only a few more to other popular Melbourne theatres.

title: Las Vegas
name: Las Vegas Hostel
content: A definite budget option. A reasonably well kept hostel with very friendly staff. Free beer and BBQ at the weekend is not to be missed. Surrounding area is not overly safe. Walking alone at night is not recommended. The pizza parlor next door does a deal on a soda and a generous slice of pizza for around $3. Fremont Experience is roughly a 20 minute walk from the hostel.

title: Luxembourg (city)
name: Novotel Luxembourg Centre
content: The Novotel is in Bonnevoie, next door to Sofitel Grand Ducal. Unfortunately, it faces away from the Alzette, so there is not much in terms of a view, but the hotel itself is quite modern and follows the usual Novotel standard.

title: Lausanne
name: Lausanne GuestHouse
price: Place in a four-bed room starting at CHF36, CHF88 for a sgl (with shower).
content: Near the CFF railway station, thus in easy range of the centre of Lausanne. It's in a nice 19th century town house. Unfortunately the guest house is scheduled for demolition in a few years to make way for another rail platform.

title: Kisoro
name: SawaSawa Guest House
directions: Directly opposite the junction of the old Cyanika road that comes from the Rwandan border crossing with the main road from the DRC border crossing.
price: ''En suite'' (with hot shower): sgl UGX34,600, dbl UGX49,300, twin UGX54,300; shared ablutions: sgl UGX24,600, dbl UGX39,300, twin UGX44,300
content: Brand new and freshly painted in 2014, this budget option has been opened by a local lady that has many years experience working in the hospitality industry. This certainly shows in the little touches like providing a chair in the rooms so that you can sit at the table and write or Skype and providing hooks to hang your wet towels. Breakfasts and other meals are a sensation. Less than a dozen small chalets arranged around a central courtyard. Strictly non-smoking, but there is a well groomed and cared for cat. Very clean with comfortably firm mattresses.

title: Milwaukee
name: Aloft Milwaukee Downtown
content: On the Milwaukee River. Sleek new hotel.

title: Las Vegas
name: Wynn Las Vegas
content: Built at a cost of $2.7 billion, this is the most expensive resort in the world, with the money plowed into (among other things) a private golf course, an artificial mountain with a 5-story waterfall and a million-gallon water tank for the nightly show.

title: Minneapolis/Southwest
name: Minneapolis International Hostel
content: This is the only backpackers' hostel in the Twin Cities. Quick walking distance to the Minneapolis College of Art and Design, the Minneapolis Institute of Arts, and Eat Street. A 15 minute walk or short bus ride to [[Minneapolis/Downtown|Downtown]], and a short bus ride to Uptown. A credit card number is required to be on file for every party staying with them.

title: Pristina
name: Hotel Baci
content: close to a couple of the more important transportation hubs (i.e. bus station, taxi roundabout, intersection to other towns in Kosova etc.). There's also a decent restaurant downstairs and free Internet in the lobby. Besides this, Hotel Baci offers to its clients free laundry, free fitness and sauna. Breakfast is included in the price, there is 24/7 electricity and water.

title: Niue
name: Niue BackPackers
content: Four bedrooms, one ''en suite'', shared kitchen & dining lounge. BBQ on deck. 2 minutes' walk from swimming spots and 5 minutes from supermarket.

title: Maastricht
name: Hotel Derlon
content: Ideally located on the most beautiful square of the city.

title: Khabarovsk
name: Abricol Hotel
directions: Bus 6 or 57 from the railway station
content: About a kilometer north(west) of the railway station on the outskirts of town, offers 28 modern rooms within a larger entertainment complex which also includes a restaurant, two bars, billiards, a bowling alley and a sauna/pool. The Hotel is hard to reach by public Transport, taxi from city center costs about 250 rubles.

title: Jimbaran
name: Ayana Resort and Spa
content: Large cliff-front resort set in 77 hectares of prime Bali real estate. 290 rooms and suites, and 78 private villas. 8 restaurants/cafes, 5 bars including the famous Rock Bar, and a huge Spa complex.

title: Kazan
name: Suleiman Palace
content: Comparable in class of service to the Shalyapin Palace, but a bit further away from the city center. The Kremlin is not easily walkable from here, but it can be reached by a short taxi ride or bus.

title: Tha Khaek
name: Inthira Hotel
directions: in the city centre, close to the Mekong
content: The Inthira Hotel is part of a chain. Excellent restaurant with international and Lao cuisine. Good place to meet other travelers. Wi-Fi in public area. Bicycle and motorbike rental.

title: Antwerp
name: Ibis Styles Antwerpen City Centre
content: The Ibis Styles offers great location next to the Antwerp Centraal railway station and free breakfasts, but it is starting to get slightly worn.

title: Chippenham
name: Home Farm Bed & Breakfast
directions: Exit ''M4'' at ''Junction 17'' and head southwest on dual carriageway''(A350)'' for 2.5 mi. At the roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto ''West Cepen Way(A350)'', continue to follow ''A350'', go through 2 roundabouts for 1.0 mi. At the roundabout, take the 4th exit onto ''Bristol Road(A420)'', continue to follow ''A420'' for 2.4 mi. Turn left onto ''Yatton Road'' for 0.6 mi. Slight left onto ''Cuttle Lane'' for 0.2 mi. Continue onto ''The Green'' for 449 ft. Turn left onto ''Harts Lane'' for 167 ft
content: A 17th century grade II listed Farmhouse situated on a working farm in the heart of the village, set in large gardens far from traffic noise, minutes away from two pubs on the village green. Self-catering accommodation is available with adequate off-road, secure parking. Accommodation comprises two Farmhouse rooms, and 'Harts', a luxury garden room, each with en suite shower rooms and complementary toiletries. There is also the self-catering Pear Tree Cottage, with 2 twin bedrooms sleeping 4, plus sofa-bed, opening onto a large level lawn with swings, trampoline and table tennis. Flat screen TV, DVD player, Freeview, hairdryer, ironing facilities, tea and coffee hospitality tray, WiFi access available in all public areas

title: Auckland
name: Ponsonby Backpackers
price: $25 7 bed dormitory, $27 4 bed share, $31 pp double
content: Located in an original 19th century villa right in the heart of Ponsonby.

title: Budapest/Belváros
name: Mercure Budapest City Centre
content: This hotel is smack right at the Vaci utca and still exudes the charm of the chain's old Eastern European standards, including small ill-placed mirrors and paintings, and it is becoming quite a bit worn. Room and bathroom shapes can be weird and quite unfunctional, and God forbid you ask for an extra bed.

title: Seoul/Seodaemun-Mapo
name: The Win Boutique Hotel
directions: From Hapjeong Station, take Exit 1. Go half a block NW and turn north down a narrow alley. The hotel and affiliated coffee shop has a neon blue sign.
content: The basement dorm has a large common area and several bathrooms. Everything is clean, and access is 24h. Staff presence is minimal; reservations are recommended.

title: Budapest/Újbuda and Tétény
name: Danubius Hotel Gellert
content: Yes, it is the famous Gellert Hotel! It's one of the most traditional hotels in Budapest and Hungary. Located at the foot of the Gellért Hill, on the bank of the Danube, is ideally situated for both business and leisure travellers. The hotel has one of the most famous baths, see the [[Budapest#Baths|Baths section in Budapest article]].

title: Brownsville (Kentucky)
name: Cottages at Briar Creek
address: 2772 Brier Creek Rd. Mammoth Cave, KY 42259
content: Located just outside the entrance of Nolin Lake State Park.

title: Ko Yao
name: Hill House
content: New bungalows with double fan, fridge, private hammock on a big balcony and a family atmosphere. Set on a tropical hill with stunning view over the limestones.

title: Prague/East bank of Vltava
name: Clown and Bard Hostel
content: . With a lively vibe and a bar in the basement there's always something going on at the hostel too, though it's not the cleanest or newest in town. Free breakfast and internet is available for all guests and rooms in the very large dorm start at 300Kč. For those who want a little privacy, five bed dorms, six bed privates and doubles are available for 380czk, 400Kč and 500Kč respectively.

title: Banff
name: Banff Ptarmigan Inn
content: Located only a block from downtown, it offers a great location.

title: Albuquerque
name: Best Western Rio Grande Inn
directions: north of Old Town at the intersection of I-40/Rio Grande
content: Basic chain motel which has the advantage of being right near Old Town.

title: Yellowstone National Park
name: Canyon Lodge and Cabins
price: Lodge Room $178, Western Cabins $183, Frontier Cabin $98 (2012 rates)
content: Lodge rooms are located in the Cascade and Dunraven Lodges, both built in the 1990s while the cabins were all constructed in the 1950s and 1960s. All lodging includes private bath. Open from early June through late September.

title: Düsseldorf
name: Radisson Blu Media Harbour
content: New Design-Hotel in Düsseldorf Media Harbour, very hip!

title: Gondar
name: Taye Hotel
content: New hotel in the city centre, just around the corner from the Palace. Still with kinks to work out, but the most upmarket option available in Gondar.

title: Bogotá/Zona Rosa
name: Cabrera Imperial
content: It offers rooms equipped with kitchen with microwave oven, air-conditioning, safe, cable television and DVD player. Some of its facilities and services are indoor swimming pool, sauna, fitness room, room service, car rental and airport transfer.

title: Brownsville (Kentucky)
name: Rocky Hill Inn Bed and Breakfast
address: 1881 Rocky Hill Rd. Smiths Grove, KY 42171
content: Built in 1857, this bed and breakfast features four guest rooms.

title: Jaca
name: Hotel Lacasa Faus Hutte
content: Lacasa Faus-Hutte is located at 1000 meters high from the heart of the west side of Pirineos Mountain. Only 12 minutes distance from the Ski stations of Astún & Candanchú. Jaca city is only 12 km far from Lacasa Faus-Hutte. There is easy access to the valleys of Ansó, Hecho, Ordesa ,El Roncal y Valle de Tena.

title: Győr
name: Fonte Hotel and Restaurant
address: Schweidel utca 17. ( Parkoló felőli bejárat: Kisfaludy utca 38.)
price: Standard Sgl / dbl € ~ 57/68, Superior Sgl / dbl € ~64/75, Apartment -2 separate (Superior) rooms up to 3 people € ~88
content: *** Parking entrance: Kisfaludy utca 38. Services: cable TV, telephone, safe, mini bar, wake-up call service, writing desk, smoking and non smoking rooms, rooms with air conditioning, double or twin beds; for children playpens; cots and high chairs, room for disabled guests, quiet, peaceful area in pedestrian zone; abundant buffet breakfast with a variety of 8 freshly prepared selection of homemade warm food; closed, guarded parking facilities on site; covered, closed bicycle storage. Wi-Fi. - About the restaurant: A la carte (Hungarian and Mediterranean flavour, light meal specialities, fit” offers) and the best wines of the country

title: Mukutmanipur
name: Pancha Pally Tourist Complex
content: Managed by under the control of Department of Tourism, Government of West Bengal

title: Nampula
name: Milenio
content: The Milenio is the latest addition to Nampula. A very modern stylish building.

title: McLean (Virginia)
name: Staybridge Suites
content: Outdoor pool, free wireless internet, complimentary breakfast. The cheaper rates are generally on the weekends.

title: Berlin/Mitte
name: Hotel Adlon
content: Unter den Linden 77 (''Pariser Platz, Unter den Linden''), Located directly at the Brandenburg Gate and was rated the best hotel of Europe in 2006.

title: Haparanda
name: Nivagården
content: Situated 35 km north of Haparanda. A well equipped cottage for 7 people. Farm animals.

title: Lake Wales
name: Cherry Pocket Steak & Seafood Shak
content: 22 sites. Hookups, laundry, & showers available. Tent camping permitted. Handicapped access. Free wi-fi available.

title: Albany (New York)
name: Quality Inn Central
content: Offers guests free continental breakfast. Near Albany International Airport.

title: Soltau
name: Hotel Port Royal
content: Designed with pirates in mind, it is a family-orientated hotel and was inspired by the Port Royal Caribbean fortress.  The hotel is situated right next to Heide Park.

title: Bangkok/Khao San Road
name: Siam Oriental Inn
alt: สยามโอเรียนเต็ล อินน์
directions: in the middle of Khao San Road
content: Nice, clean and quiet rooms, both fan and air-conditioned, all with a private bathroom. There's a lively restaurant, an internet cafe where you can surf the web for 1 baht per minute and a photo-processing store. Other amenities include laundry, where you have to pay by kilogram, and luggage storage.

title: Yellowstone National Park
name: Grant
content: (21-Jun to 02-Oct). 425 sites, showers, flush toilets, RV dump station.

title: Bissau
name: Azalaï Hotel 24 de Setembro
content: Fairly well maintained hotel, with rooms in better shape than the outside. On-site hotel and restaurant.

title: Ad Dakhla
name: Hotel Dakhla Attitude
content: Offers nautical activities, seafood tasting and desert excursions. The hotel is sheltered from the wind by the mountains. Has three camps gathering seven types of accommodation. The hotel's sport center WindfishPro offers all kind of sport activities and kitesurf and windsurf lessons and material rental.

title: Buena Park
name: Knott's Berry Farm Resort Hotel
content: Knott's Berry Farm's on-site hotel. Special features include deals to the theme park, special entrance to the park, complimentary shuttle to Disneyland, and special themed Snoopy rooms complete with tuck-in service provided by Snoopy himself. Great for kids.

title: Krems
name: Gästehaus Kleine Mühle
content: It's a wonderfully renovated old mill with a personable proprietor and wonderful breakfast

title: Vaasa
name: Kerstins Stugor
content: This place offers cabins a long way out of town.

title: Poznań
name: Hotel Henlex
content: This hotel is very inexpensive (cost around £160 including evening meals on 2 nights). The staff are friendly and helpful, reception, restaurant and corridors have been recently redecorated and quite modern. The area is very quiet and residential. The food is quite nice.

title: Turin
name: AC Hotel Torino
content: Next to Eataly and Lingotto center this 5 star hotel offer good prices for a quality accommodation.

title: Milan/North
name: Berna Swiss Quality Hotel
price: Single room from €89, double room from €116 (low season of 2009).
content: Four-star hotel 100m away from the station.

title: Dateland
name: Dateland RV Park
content: The only place to sleep in Dateland. Electric and sewer hookups, and showers and laundry facilities onsite. Registration is at the gift shop (see listing above).

title: Lake Wales
name: Peace Creek RV Park
content: 110 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Handicapped access.

title: Titel
name: Hotel Tisa
directions: on the southern side of the main square off Glavna Ulica
price: roughly $30 for a twin room; breakfast included
content: The two star Tisa is pretty much the only accommodation in town. It seldom sees tourists these days, and looks a little tired, but the staff are helpful and rooms are clean.

title: Stuttgart
name: Dormero Hotel Stuttgart
content: The Dormero is a huge (over 450 rooms) 1980s style tower hotel within the SI entertainment complex (cinema, musical theatre, casino, spa) in Moehringen, an outer district of Stuttgart close to the airport. Due to its particular location, arrival by public transit is not really simple.

title: Senggigi
name: la casa home stay
address: Gg Pura Melasa Batu layar Senggigi
content: Located at 4 km on the south of Senggigi in a Balinese village close the beach.

title: Kobe
name: Sannomiya Terminal Hotel
content: Directly over the Sannomiya station, with reasonable pricing, simple but adequate facilities and rather small rooms. The "twin room with sofa bed" is larger than the doubles, but the convertible sofa pretty much fills up the extra space.

title: Simferopol
name: Guest house on the Suvorovsky descent
content: Good location: close to the center, as well as many restaurants, shops, banks. Clean and comfortable. Good free WiFi. Bad soundproofing.

title: Boston/Back Bay
name: W Boston
content: Located near Boston’s theatre district, the W Boston has 235 modern guest rooms all with the signature W bed. The hotel also features the restaurant Market, from celebrity-chef Jean-Georges and the W lounge in the lobby.

title: Jakarta/South
name: Rasuna Icon
content: Within walking distance to the Rasuna Said office strips. Minimalist interior. Its restaurant has a bar and a indoor and outdoor seating area, be careful with mosquitos as even the indoor area is exposed to the outdoor air.

title: Tbilisi
name: Green Stairs Hostel
directions: walk east from Metro Marjanishvili one block, turn right and it'll be a 5min walk on the left
content: Free WiFi and a communal fridge. The hostel is very simple, but run by a nice couple who speak English. It's a little cold in the winter, but each room does have a space heater. The owner will drive you to the airport for 25 GEL.

title: Las Vegas
name: Westgate Flamingo Bay
content: One and two bedroom villas equipped with a full kitchen, whirlpool tub, spacious living room and a fireplace. 2.5 miles from the Strip.

title: Woerden
name: Camping Batenstein
content: Camping, with spaces for tents and caravans. It's also possible to rent a caravan or a "hut" with beds and a small kitchen. Located next to the swimming pool and also next to the "Bredius park".

title: Manchester/Victoria-Shopping District
name: The Mitre Hotel
content: Located right in the heart of the shopping district in Shambles Square, moments from the Arndale Centre and Victoria station, the Mitre Hotel offers pleasant accommodation in a period building. En-suite and shared bathroom tariffs available.

title: Freiburg
name: Hotel Rheingold
price: A doubleroom costs 139 Euros a night at peak times, breakfast included
content: A four star hotel just opposite the train station. Its tidy rooms are a bit on the worn side but the staff is very helpful and friendly. There's a garage underneath the hotel, where guests get reduced rates.

title: Toronto/Harbourfront
name: Westin Harbour Castle
content: Indoor pool, gym and spa facilities, on-site restaurants.

title: Milan/North
name: UNA Tocq Boutique Hotel
content: Offers 109 rooms and 13 apartments right in the heart of Corso Como. The hotel also features a restaurant and bar, as well as a fitness center with indoor swimming pool, and a garage nearby the hotel.

title: Neuchatel
name: Hotel Beau Rivage
directions: located on the waterfront by Place Pury
content: A very expensive and high-class affair.

title: Whittier
name: Radisson Hotel - Whittier
content: Located in Uptown Whittier.

title: Munich/Altstadt
name: Mercure Hotel München Altstadt
content: With patterned carpets and lots of light wood, this hotel as typical for a German Mercure as it could be.

title: Trondheim
name: Øysand Camping
directions: Local buses towards Orkanger, frequent, day pass not valid
content: South of the city near the Øysand beach.

title: Mutěnice Wine Region
name: Penzion LUDMILA in Dubňany
content: Located across the street from the restaurant 'U chytilů' (and owned by the same family), a two person room here runs from 700kč per night.  The penzion is in '''Dubňany''' on the road to '''Mutěnice'''.  The family that owns this penzion also operates a separate penzion near the '''Milotice''' cellars.  This second penzion (in '''Milotice''' is actually a part of one of the company's smaller wine producing operations.  It is possible for the family to arrange parties there with live music or just take a tour of the cellar and the surrounding region.  Several people in the company speak English.

title: Cologne
name: Königshof Swiss Quality Hotel
content: Three star hotel situated 500m away from the railway station and 13 km from the airport.

title: Samarkand
name: Bahodir B&B
directions: In the city center, on the east side of the Registan, behind the museum.
price: USD8 for a dorm bed, doubles from USD20 , breakfast is included and a dinner costs USD2 extra.
content: This place seems to be the main meeting point for backpackers in Samarkand. The courtyard with teabeds makes a nice place for few beers and sharing travel stories. The staff is friendly, honest and willing to sell beer from their fridge. However, if staying in the dorm, the shared bathroom and toilet is a bit claustrophobic, but not bad. There is Wi-Fi but had some kind of problem.

title: Bardstown
name: Plantation Bed and Breakfast
content: Located at the Springhill Winery

title: Győr
name: Buda Pension
price: Standard room €44, Classic room €60, Superior €70, 'First' suite for 3-6 persons €80-120. (2013. guide prices)
content: Four rooms with 2, 3 beds and a suite with 4-5 beds. Rooms with mirror, LCD TV, DVD player, Mini-bar. Services: massage, Wi-Fi, garden for barbecue. - Program management: (Wine Tours, Holiday at Lake Balaton in Tihany, one of the finest resorts in the Lake). Tickets ordering (theaters, cinemas, concert). Bicycle storage, rental. Child-friendly hotel. Dogs are welcome.

title: Kőszeg
name: AACS downtown Pension
content: Cap.: Forteen rooms / forty people. Rooms with mini bar, telephone, TV, WC, shower / bath. Services: Parking, garden, coffee bar, breakfast room, hair salon, pedicure and beauty. - On the basement level housed a pizzeria

title: Odense
name: Hotel Ansgar
content: Reasonably spacious rooms decorated in a traditional style. 400 m from Central Station.

title: Patagonia (Arizona)
name: Patagonia Lake State Park
content: Full electric hookups are available, as well as water and toilets. Reservations are recommended particularly for three-day weekends; for location description, see listing above.

title: Bergamo
name: Arli Hotel
content: A three-style hotel at the Porta Nuova, created by owners having a peculiar sense of style, but if you are looking for a decent and dependable accommodation in the centre of Bergamo, you can reply on the Arli.

title: Kaunas
name: Babilonas Hotel
content: Hotel is in a quiet district of Kaunas, named Žaliakalnis. Recently renovated hotel offers 24 modern arranged rooms, a conference hall and a restaurant.

title: Hollywood (Florida)
name: Hollywood Beach Marriott
directions: Six miles from Fort Lauderdale Airport and eight miles Port Everglades
content: Located on the Intercoastal Highway, away from the busy strip of tourist hotels in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Ålesund
name: Ålesund Vandrerhjem
price: Dorm: kr 285 including breakfast & bed linen (10% discount with HI membership)
content: The youth hostel in the town center.

title: Maradi
name: Hotel Jangorzo
content: Also pricy, but also nice.

title: Maithon
name: Majumdar Nivas of DVC
directions: On an island in Maithon Lake, connected to the mainland by a bridge.
content: Contact: CPRO, DVC Towers, CIT Housing Complex, VIP Road, Kolkata 700054. Phone:+91 33 2333-2115. Limited food menu.

title: Saint Paul
name: Super 8 Saint Paul
directions: at White Bear, off of I-94 exit 245; Bus: 63
content: Newly renovated 97 unit property. Complimentary breakfast, business center, fitness center, meeting room facility and whirlpool suites available.

title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: Premier Inn
content: In the extreme south of the district close to the Thames

title: Bangkok/Silom
name: Holiday Inn
alt: ฮอลิเดย์ อินน์ สีลม กรุงเทพฯ
content: Another luxurious hotel, it consists of rooms in two towers. The rooms in the first tower are better than in the second tower. It has a big lobby room and spacious rooms with flat-screen TVs.

title: Kharagpur
name: Hotel Park
content: Restaurant, Credit Cards accepted, TV in rooms

title: New Orleans/French Quarter
name: Hotel Masion de Ville
content: Is one of the most historic hotels in the Quarter, everyone from Tennessee Williams to Audobon has spent time there.

title: Haparanda
name: Seskarö Strandby & Camping
directions: Situated in the beautiful Seskarö island, 25 km south of Haparanda.
content: The camping site is open during the summer. Various cottages and camper/caravan/tent spots. A beach, mini golf track, campfire places and possibility to fish. Kiosk and grill-café.

title: Timbuktu
name: Hotel Campement Bouctou
content: Cheaper.

title: Edessa
name: Guesthouse Varosi
content: The old family house has been reformed to a warm, welcoming guesthouse that offers the original atmosphere of Greek hospitality

title: Taketomi
name: Hotel Peace Island Taketomijima
alt: ホテルピースアイランド竹富島
price: Double rooms ¥25,000 with breakfast and dinner
content: Opened 2012, this small tropical resort is a low-lying assemblage of Taketomi-style buildings, a short walk away from the village center.  The facilities are rather basic for the price (no pool, for example), but the rooms are fairly spacious and come with little outdoor balconies for enjoying the evening breeze.  Restaurant, free laundry facilities, and one of the few shops on the island selling takeaway booze.

title: Kazan
name: Happy House hostel
price: 500 rubles/bed or 1400 rubles for a double (2013)
content: Walls are freshly whitewashed and inexorably resemble a hospital. Cheap, but very cramped.

title: Frankfurt
name: Lindner Main Plaza
content: Stunning views over the skyline of Frankfurt and directly on the river.

title: Fox Glacier
name: Fox Glacier Holiday Park
content: 14 room lodge, campsites, powered campervan sites, and bunkhouse cabins are available.

title: Stuttgart
name: Mercure Stuttgart City Center
content: Despite the name, the hotel is not in the city centre but rather some 1.5 km uphill north from the Hauptbahnhof. The decor and appointments are nondescript and a little dated and overall there is nothing really outstanding about this Mercure.

title: Iligan
name: StayLite Suites
address: Champaca St, San Miguel Village, Pala-o
directions: at the back of Philippine Independent Church
content: Clean and affordable pension house offering 59 air-conditioned rooms, each with its own queen-sized bed and private bathroom. Features and amenities: 24-hour reception, 24-hour uniformed security and CCTV, 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping, flatscreen cable TV, free in-room internet access via Wi-Fi, free luggage storage, free parking, intercom

title: Adler
name: Aurora
content: Private mini-hotel in the heart of Adler with scenic views with a walking distance to the sea.

title: Urban camping in Japan
name: Kamonyama Park
content: Very good park, very quiet. Has public toilets but no rest huts. If you go visit Yokohama (Minatomirai area, Chinatown), it is worth staying there. Located at walking distance from Minatomirai Park.

title: Beijing/Dongcheng
name: Dongjiao Minxiang Hotel
address: 23A Dongjiao Minxiang, 北京东城区东交民巷甲23号
directions: NE corner of Zhengyi Rd intersection, 1 block N of Qianmen E St.
content: Offers rooms with private toilet and bath with tub, slippers, bathrobe, and hair dryer.

title: Salzburg
name: Schwärzler Hotel Neutor
content: Schwärzler Hotel Neutor, known as the artists' meeting place, is located close to the city center. Breakfast is served until 1PM in your room or until 3PM in the hotel's 'Artist Cafe.'

title: Bergen
name: Scandic Bergen City
content: A reasonably priced conference hotel, also a good option for tourists due to its relatively central yet quiet surroundings. There is a gym and bath close by, and a cinema across the street. From kr 1100 per night for a standard double room.

title: Vienna/Landstraße
name: Austria Trend Hotel Savoyen
content: The hotel offers spacious and modern rooms including great breakfast.

title: Barcelona/Inland Suburbs
name: Barcelona City North
content: Bathroom ensuite, TV, satellite, air-conditioned, WiFi.

title: Cincinnati
name: Cincinnatian Hotel
content: Sets the bar for luxury in downtown Cincinnati. Located near Fountain Square and is within walking distance of the convention center and the major businesses in the city.

title: Masirah Island
name: Masira Island Resort
content: Four star hotel and by far the grandest option on the island. Set up as beach resort with all the facilities you would expect.

title: Severomorsk
name: Flagship Hostel
content: Mini-hotel located on fourth floor, shared bathrooms.

title: Milwaukee
name: Ambassador Inn
content: Just across the street from the more elegant but more expensive Ambassador Hotel listed above. Free internet.

title: Cleveland/West Side
name: Sheraton Cleveland Airport
content: The ''only'' hotel located on the grounds of Cleveland International Airport (CLE).

title: Pine City
name: Maple Knoll Inn B&B
content: "Old Doc Halpin House"

title: Paris/17th arrondissement
name: Hotel Prince Albert Monceau
content: Free Wi-Fi.

title: Jakarta/South
name: Park Lane
content: Five-star hotel with less than five-star prices. Old on the outside but don't be fooled, refurbished inside. Good location within the CBD and huge breakfast buffet. All in one dining at RIVA (Grill, Bar, and terrace), weekly live acoustic at the bar for entertainment or a night of jamming dance by the DJs.

title: Zelenograd and New Moscow
name: Silky Way
address: 45 Lenina Street, pos. Oktyabrskiy, Lyuberetskiy District
directions: ~15km SE from city limit, Malakhovka train station
content: Silky Way proudly stands in an area that was once part of the Great Silk Road. It offers cozy rooms, all of which have air-conditioner, cable TV, mini-bar, and refrigerator. Some of its amenities are restaurant and bar, fitness room/gym, and high-speed Internet access.

title: Dar es Salaam
name: YMCA
content: Single and double simple rooms. Rooms are cheaper if you are a resident of Tanzania.

title: Kolkata/South
name: Hotel Hindustan International
content: Good location near Rabindra Sadan metro station. Good food. Five star rates.

title: Banff
name: Inns of Banff
content: This hotel has an indoor pool, outdoor hotpool, 2 restaurants and lounge, ski shop, underground parking and on the Banff transit route.

title: Lucca
name: B&B Lucca Fora
content: The Bed & Breakfast Lucca Fora takes its name from the local dialect. In fact, it is located just outside  the walls of the medieval centre of Lucca.

title: Mount Aso
name: Little Asia Guest House
content: This was a really nice family-run operation close to Aso-san. It's easy to get to if you have a car, but you might miss the sign if you're not looking closely. The owners were very welcoming, as were the other guests. There is free Wi-Fi available, and they do a family-style dinner every night at 7PM. Guests who want to attend are asked to contribute a small ￥280 fee to help pay for the food. There is a natural hot spring out back that you can pay ￥300 to use. There is a trail that will take you to a "secret" waterfall.

title: Stupino
name: Sherr
directions: the same building Yunost movie theatre is
content: New hotel opened in 2009.

title: Bergen
name: Thon Hotel Bergen Brygge
price: Single: from kr 695, Double: from kr 895
content: An ok hotel situated in the historic part of Bergen, though not very historic in itself.

title: Paris/17th arrondissement
name: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile
content: The tallest hotel in Paris is the lone skyscraper in the northwest of Paris, adjacent to the Palais du Congres. It enjoys an unobstructed line of sight towards the Eiffel Tower from the rooms facing it and its top-floor bar. After Hyatt took over the property, it is being gradually updated, but still not entirely up to the best Hyatt worldwide standards.

title: Taolagnaro
name: Le Dauphin
content: Hotel with 25 rooms/bungalows.  It is owned by the same people as the Croix du Sud but is older and a bit more run down.  Rooms have air conditioning, and the hotel offers free wi-fi.  The restaurant serves good French colonial fare and has an attentive and friendly staff.

title: Peak District
name: Wheeldon Trees Farm
content: 8 award winning 4* holiday cottages near Buxton, Bakewell in Derbyshire Peak District sleeping up to 28. Dog, pet, children, family, group friendly

title: Cardigan
name: Piggery Poke 4 star hostel
directions: On a loop off the coast path between Mwnt and Aberporth, near the village of Felinwynt
content: 4 star hostel with 16 beds arranged as a double bunk with a single over in one room, 5 beds in a second room and 8 bunks in the third room, all with en suites. Pick-up/drop-off service available from points along the coast path. Cycle lock up and transport available.

title: Beverly Hills
name: The Crescent Beverly Hills
content: A modern hotel originally built for silent film stars in 1926. Has a trendy on-site restaurant.

title: Maputo
name: Hotel Cardoso
content: Opposite the traffic circle from the Natural History Museum. Recently refurbished and is a solid 4-star hotel although things often tend to go wrong. Staff fluent in English. A great garden to have a drink in and watch the sun set over the Baixa and Rio Santo. Doubles with a river view and airconditioning were US$140 or more in May 2009.

title: Fairbourne
name: Einion House Bed and Breakfast
directions: on the A493, or 10 mins from Fairbourne Railway Station
content: 5 mins walk to Friog Beach, a B&B that can accommodate up to 12 people.  Visit Wales Graded 4 stars B & B

title: Mariehamn
name: Hotel Esplanad
content: A bed and breakfast hotel open only in the summer season.

title: Cloverdale (California)
name: Vintage Towers Bed & Breakfast Inn
content: This elegant 1901 Victorian mansion is conveniently located in downtown Cloverdale on a quiet residential street, just blocks from restaurants, shops and the town plaza. Free tasting passes are available for 120+ wineries in the nearby area. All rooms have private baths, central heat and A/C, flat screen TVs, and free Wi-Fi access. A multi-course gourmet breakfast is served every morning, including fresh fruits and vegetables grown at the Inn. The Inn features fine period antiques, luxurious linens and upscale amenities. The beautifully landscaped grounds include a demonstration vineyard, Koi ponds and patio, flower and vegetable gardens and a mediterranean courtyard. Outdoors, guests can enjoy the splendor from a forty-foot veranda, a vintage gazebo or a flower-covered pavilion. Inside, they can relax in the inn’s parlor or library. Cloverdale Municipal Airport is 3.9 miles from the inn and the Sonoma County Airport is 25 minutes away.

title: Samoeng
name: Samoeng Resort
directions: Turn right at T-junction, continue for 2.5 km to an intersection. Resort is right in front of you.
content: Samoeng Resort and Nature Observation Centre is an eco-adventure lodge and retreat centre located in Samoeng Valley near Khun Khan National Park.

title: Bangkok/Khao San Road
name: Jennys Cafe and Guesthouse
alt: เจนนี่ & เกสท์เฮาส์
directions: walk north along Chakrabongse Road, cross the bridge, then follow Samsen Road and take a right into Soi 4
content: Great small budget guest house situated on a quiet street just a few minutes walk from Khao San Road. Incredibly friendly Thai owner (Jenny), who speaks great English and is extremely helpful. Range of rooms from fan cooled with shared bathroom to air-conditioned doubles with private bathroom, balcony and fridge. Veggie friendly restaurant downstairs and free Wi-Fi.

title: Seminyak
name: Kubu Pesisi Villas
content: Gorgeous villas surrounded by spacious and delightful tropical garden.

title: Helsinki/West
name: Crowne Plaza
content: Formerly the ''Hotel Hesperia''. Rooms offer comfy beds, modern furniture and up-to-date electronics. The hotel also has a sparkling new gym with a pool.

title: Paris/8th arrondissement
name: Hôtel Balzac
content: This elegantly furnished hotel exudes opulence from its fine classic interior to the personalised butler service.

title: Gondar
name: Goha Hotel
content: Former Ghion (government) hotel, so it's old. Has excellent views, as it's located on a hill overlooking the city.

title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: Hyatt Regency San Francisco
directions: at the Embarcadero Center, next to the California and Market cable car turnaround
content: A very prominent hotel near the waterfront, with many rooms having lovely views of the Bay. Typically of Hyatts, there are plenty of amenities and very nice rooms.

title: Tucson
name: Hyatt Place Tucson Airport
content: Located .5 mile south of the Tucson International Airport and minutes from the Desert Diamond Casino.

title: Beppu
name: Beppu Guest House
directions: 5 minutes walking south east from Beppu station
content: Great location, nice staff, free laundry.

title: Springdale (Utah)
name: Red Rock Inn B&B Cottages
content: Rooms in the form of charming individual cottages.

title: Stockholm/Västerort, Solna and Sundbyberg
name: ibis Styles Stockholm Jarva
content: A relatively inexpensive hotel located in an office park between the Jarva Krog (motorway crossing served by busses between the Arlanda Airport and the city) and the Ulriksdal station on the local railway line between Stockholm Central station and Arlanda and Uppsala. The cheapest rooms in the hotel only have windows that face the large atrium rather than the outside, but there are no rooms with no windows as in many other cheap hotels in Stockholm. The wild colours do a good job of making the simple fit-outs look modern and welcoming.

title: Sidon
name: convent
content: Nice place providing a calm courtyard. Dynamic and friendly tender. Clean enough. Breakfast not included. It is located in the souk : from the port, when you face the Khan, follow the street on its left, then turn right up the street. The convent is on the right side on the street.

title: Ushuaia
name: B&B Casa Tekenika
content: Affordable B&B.

title: Dumaguete
name: Dumaguete Studio Apartments
content: A/C, Internet, cable TV, microwave & gas stove, swimming pool. No children. Strictly no smoking, anywhere in the compound. Inhabited mostly by retired western men with Filipina wives or girlfriends.

title: Győr
name: Duna Pension
content: 14 rooms with bathroom, TV, Wi-Fi. Buffet breakfast included in the price! Services: 24-hour reception, a refrigerator, a playroom with toys, garage. Parking: HUF900.

title: Oudewater
name: Hotel Abrona
content: This cosy hotel is run by people with mental disabilities, offering them a chance to learn skills that might allow them to work in the regular hotel world. Rooms are simple but well-maintained and the staff is very friendly. The hotel has 24 double rooms, all with private bathrooms and free wifi. There's also an on-site restaurant and room rates include breakfast.

title: Las Vegas
name: El Cortez Hotel and Casino
content: 300 rooms, 2 restaurants and a Chinese buffet. Recently remodeled with a great rewards program.

title: Tel Aviv/Central Tel Aviv
name: Dizengoff Beach Apartments
content: Located in the finest area of Tel Aviv, offers deluxe one bedroom apartments and flats only a two minute walk from Israel's famous Tel Aviv beaches and its sprawling green park. Each rental apartment includes one bedroom and a well designed, modern living room. Spacious enough for a couple or for that special business trip. Each rental suite has a spectacular view of Tel Aviv and many of these rental apartments overlook the sea.

title: Tampere
name: Homeland Tampere
content: Apartment hotel located near Tammelan tori, about 5min walk from the railway station.

title: Mull
name: Tobermory Youth Hostel
content: SYHA Hostel on the seafront, with great facilities, awarded 4 stars by the Tourist Board.

title: Fez
name: Riad Numero 9
directions: in the heart of the medina
content: Intimate boutique hotel. Franco-Mediterranean cuisine. What sets this establishment apart is the interesting decoration which is a juxtaposition of French and English vintage and Asian contemporary. The panoramic view from the rooftop terrace is one of the best in the medina.

title: Cairo/Giza
name: Mena House Oberoi
content: Built in 1869 as a royal lodge for King Ismail the Magnificent, this magnificent palace has housed guests including Empress Eugenie and Prince Albert. Tastefully restored and located very close to the Pyramids. Rooms in the newer Garden wing from $150, Palace wing rooms from $210; be sure to ask for a room with a view of the Pyramids. The main Pyramids gate is only a 5 minute walk away.

title: Vladivostok
name: See You Hostel
content: It is located in the south of the city. Very cheap but excellent accommodations. Friendly and helpful staff who can arrange tours upon request. Online booking is available.

title: Kota Kinabalu
name: Borneo Global Backpackers
content: Fan dorm with outside hot-water bathrooms. Free breakfast and slow internet. The bus from the KK Airport goes right past the hostel. Has to be the most low cost dorm bed in KK but is far from the city center. There are a few restaurants around.

title: White Post
name: L'Auberge Provencale Bed and Breakfast
content: Features French cuisine.

title: Oudewater
name: Bed & Breakfast De Ruige Weide
content: Out of town, this is a good place for those who have their own means of transport or care for a hike. It's a lovely, family-run place with gardens around. The rooms are modernly decorated and the whole thing is housed in a historic farm building.

title: Biharinath
name: Biharinath Tourist Point
content: Basic urban style amenities and eatery with varied menu. Accommodations range from dormitory to A.C. "super deluxe" room.

title: The Hague
name: Stayokay Den Haag
content: This standard but relatively soulless and uninspiring backpacking hostel has double rooms with individual toilet and shower facilities as well as 8 bed dorms.It is huge, quite corporate so don't expect too much of a personal touch here. The hostel has a good location, being close to the Hollands Spoor train station (a 5 minute walk). Hosteling International members get discounts at Stayokay, and you can get a one-year membership card that is useful if you're staying at other HI Hostels. There are internet facilities available to lodgers at a reasonable fee.

title: Ushuaia
name: Cabañas Las Aguilas
content: Well-maintained, nicely furnished cabanas with kitchen.

title: Horn Island
name: Wongai Beach Resort
content: 21 self-contained rooms with complimentary breakfast and bar + restaurant

title: Kaş
name: Ateş Pension
directions: Call for free pickup from bus station
price: High season: 25 TL (dorm), 30 TL (double room with bathroom)
content: For independent travellers, Ateş is the least expensive place in town, with the only dorm in Kaş. Despite this, their rooftop terrace views and generous buffet breakfast exceed those of more expensive pensions. The terrace also has a traditional-style cushioned seating area, perfect for lounging with a cool drink in the hottest part of the day. Ateş is run by a small friendly family, and they're happy to give free information on just about any activity in Kaş. Good home-cooked meals are a welcome change to kebabs and pide. Guests have access to the swimming pool in the hotel across the road, but most people are better off strolling the few extra metres down to the seafront, where free sun-loungers are available and the snorkelling is excellent.

directions: Riad in the heart of Marrakech 5 min walk from Jemaa el Fna
content: .Jacuzzi on the roof terrace, wifi throughout the riad, 7 ensuite shower and A/C accommodation with great gastronomy. French owner, friendly team and atmosphere.

title: Joensuu
name: Sokos Hotel Kimmel
content: 230 rooms with different equipment

title: Howrah

price: Standard Room INR 4,200 Fortune Club Room INR 5,000 Executive Suite 7,000 (Best Rates Price)
content: Nestled in a serene and tranquil atmosphere, Fortune Park Panchwati is a grand place.

name: Donáti Hostel
directions: At Buda north gate. -From  [[Image:BKV m 2 jms.svg
content: 60 beds, 10 rooms, seasonal

title: Swansea
name: Hurst Dene Guest House
content: Hurst Dene is located in the leafy suburb of Uplands just off Uplands Square on the main road to the heart of the Gower peninsula. They offer guest rooms and self-catering apartments at affordable prices.

title: Storms River
name: Tsalanang Township Bed&Breakfast
directions: Right on stop street, go left after 1km and 4 crossings
content: Enjoy rural township life at a graded dinner, bed&breakfast. Township walk included.

title: Offa's Dyke Path
name: The Park Hotel
content: Accommodation and food services.

title: Lisbon
name: Pestana Palace
content: Located in an old Palace, has a wonderful garden and luxury spa. Extremely comfortable, and well worth the €220 per night if you book in advance and online.

title: Vienna/Innere Stadt
name: Hotel Palais Coburg
content: A converted historic building that now has an outstanding restaurant (perfect wine list) and spa. Beside some rooms mostly suites and impeccable service.

title: Austin/Downtown
name: Firehouse Hostel
content: A hostel located in Austin's oldest standing firehouse. Dorm rooms, "euro-style" private rooms (shared bath), and suites (private bath) available. The hostel also has free wifi, free computer terminal, free breakfast, laundry facilities, and locker storage.

title: Oudtshoorn
name: Miles B&B Guest House
content: Five minutes away from the centre of town, but near the hiking trails in the area.

title: Jakarta/East
name: favehotel Pusat Grosir Cililitan
content: One of the best budget options for staying in the region. Boutique style hotel and rooms. Limited breakfast options but satisfactory.

title: Haparanda
name: Sverigefinska folkhögskolan
content: Situated in Haparanda centre. 23 hotel standard rooms and cooking facilities. In summer time also 28 hostel rooms.

title: Sopron
name: Shosi Hostel
content: Rooms 72 four bed rooms.

title: Port Elizabeth
name: Bishops Inn
price: From R540 to R1200 per unit per night
content: Bishops Inn offers superior rooms and 1&2-Bedroom self-catering suites opposite Kings Beach. All rooms have Wi-Fi access.

title: Huonville
name: Huon Bush Retreats
directions: Take A6 35 km from Hobart to the Huon Valley. Then C619 through Ranelagh to North Huon Road, right into Browns Road.
content: Self-contained cottages in an extensive private habitat reserve.

title: Moganshan
name: Naked Retreats
address: Shangxiahuang Village, Paitou Town, Deqing County
content: Beautiful old farmhouses renovated in a truly quaint style into a resort. A mix of rustic and luxury. Various activities also offered including horse riding, spa treatment, hiking, tea picking and archery. Michelin Star restaurant as well as two other decent restaurants on site.

title: Bendorf
name: hotel friends Mittelrhein
content: Moderd building on the edge of the town.

title: Geneva
name: Hotel Residence St.James
content: The St-James Residence is in an elegant district in the centre of town on a street parallel with the River Rhone.

title: Chefchaouen
name: Dar Rass El Maa
content: A charming Guest House below the water source.

title: Arusha
name: Arusha Torch Budget Inn
content: Clean and bright spacious rooms as well as friendly staff and the central location make this a welcoming place attracting both tourist and business travelers. Breakfast includes a delicious fruit juice, coffee/tea, omelet and some bread & jam.

title: Waitomo
name: Kiwi Paka Backpackers
content: Qualmark rated 5 star quality accommodation in the heart of Waitomo Caves.

title: San Francisco/Chinatown-North Beach
name: Castro Hotel
directions: between Emery Ln and Stockton St
content: Fancy a short stay at an S.R.O., well here's one that rents by the week.  The rooms are clean, it's in the heart of North Beach, it's safe — being directly opposite the police station, and it gets good reviews.

title: Hua Hin
name: Royal Express Hua Hin
directions: opposite Hua Hin Soi 78, near station
content: Royal Express Hua Hin by Compass Hospitality, a small hotel with a few minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, and convenience stores. The rooms are well-designed with a simple, cosy and modern style with flat screen TV, en suite bath, and free Wi-Fi.

title: Landshut
name: Hotel Lifestyle
content: This hotel is very conveniently located close to Landshut Central Station. The rooms are bright and spacious and the breakfast buffet is included. A typical business hotel with all needed amenities.

title: Pécs
name: Agoston hotel
directions: from the railway station: take the bus 38 or 38/ A to 'Ágoston square'
content: Rooms with sgl, dbl, tpl and quad for 40 people. Shower bath, Toilet, Air-condition, Cabel TV, Telephone,Internet connection (Wi-fi), Hair drier, Medical Mattresses; Spare bed.

title: Salalah
name: Arabian Sea Villas
content: An Omani-Belgian enterprise located directly on the beach of South Dahariz, adjacent to the coconut groves. This is one of the best budget options in Salalah; rates include breakfast and wifi (available in the breakfast/coffee room). Note: it is best to book a room directly by email or telephone, as the booking service on the website caters to German tour operators, with significantly higher nightly rates.

title: Ushuaia
name: Hotel Austral
content: 10 rooms, centrally located.

title: Albuquerque
name: Los Poblanos Inn
content: Located in the Village of Los Ranchos de Albuquerque (7 mi/11 km from downtown Albuquerque), the inn and 25 acre grounds are beautiful, set near the Rio Grande bosque with conference and meeting facilities available.

title: Fredensborg
name: Danhostel Fredensborg Vandrerhjem
content: Youth and family hostel, open all year around. The hostel can provide rooms with toilet and bath. The hostel serve breakfast everyday.

title: Sydney/Lower North Shore
name: Park Regis Concierge Apartments
content: Ideally located amidst the relaxed village atmosphere of Cremorne - a short drive to the attractions of Sydney's city centre. The hotel's city fringe location gives leisure visitors numerous sightseeing and entertainment options on the North Shore. The hotel features fully self contained studio and one bedroom apartments some with harbour views. The apartments feature modern decor, climate controlled air-conditioning, TVs, direct dial phones with internet access and full kitchen and laundry facilities. The hotel is situated near numerous dining options with a restaurant and bar next door.

title: Philadelphia/Old City
name: Omni Hotel at Independence Park
content: This hotel overlooks the Independence National Historic Park and is within walking distance of the Liberty Bell, U.S. Mint, Independence Hall and the Benjamin Franklin House.

title: Buffalo/Allentown and the Delaware District
name: Lenox Hotel & Suites
content: The oldest continually operating hotel in Buffalo (opened in 1896), the Lenox Hotel and Suites began its existence as a luxurious hotel and apartment building that counted a young F. Scott Fitzgerald among its early residents. Under new ownership, this stately old beauty has recently been renovated to its former glory. The Lenox's ground floor is occupied by the '''Nina Freudenheim Gallery''' and an elegant restaurant, the '''Lenox Grill''', and it also boasts lovely views of downtown Buffalo and the waterfront from its upper floors. A limited number of executive suites with kitchens are available.

title: Paris/16th arrondissement
name: Peninsula Paris
content: Opening in 2014, the meticulously hotel, known before the Second World War as the Hotel Majestic, has 200 rooms including 24 suites in this 19th century classic Haussman building.

title: Knysna
name: House Hammond
content: 4 Star Guest house. Each custom built individual unit, with feature en-suite bathroom, is equipped with luxury bedding and stylish décor.

title: Prescott
name: Hilltop Campground
content: Open April - October, with picnic tables and grill rings, vault toilets, and drinking water. No hookups, trailers up to 40'. No reservations, first come, first served.

title: Kaunas
name: Baltosios Bures
content: Cheap, yet cosy motel alongside with '''Kaunas yacht club''' at the shore of Kaunas Reservoir in Pazaislis. Motel offers 35 double rooms with TV, Wi-Fi and showers.

title: Budapest/Bel-Buda
name: Hotel Kulturinnov
content: 30 beds in 15 rooms

title: Paris/16th arrondissement
name: Renaissance Paris Le Parc Trocadero
content: A quiet small hotel with a courtyard north of metro Victor Hugo. Wired internet at rooms.

name: Cyclamen Chalets

price: chalet / night (up to 6 / 7-8 / 9-10 persons)HUF 16000 / 20000 / 24000 plus tur tax HUF 450 p.p. breakfast HUF1500 p.p.
content: Open: seasonal (Apr-Sep). Iideal for 5 - 10 persons per house.Tthree bedrooms for 4-2-2 persons;a living room with two beds; kitchenette with fridge, kitchen tools can be rented; bathroom, shower; toilette; the building is heated by electrical means provided in the heating season on demand.

title: Point Roberts
name: Maple Meadows Inn
content: Wi-fi, fridge, microwave, breakfast room service, deck/patio.

title: Ames
name: Gateway Hotel
directions: off University Blvd, south of US 30
content: One of the more reputed hotels in Ames. Heated indoor pool, fitness center, whirlpool and sauna, free parking, free wireless internet, room service, on-site restaurant, meeting/conference space.

title: Burlington (Vermont)
name: Lang House on Main Street Bed and Breakfast
content: Historic bed and breakfast offering beautifully restored rooms and breakfast.

title: Copenhagen/Vesterbro
name: Hotel Løven
price: single rooms from 450 Kr per room per night, double rooms from 250 Kr per person per night
content: clean, secure with commune kitchen area. Breakfast not included. Also, you might be disappointed with the suggested breakfast cafe, so you're probably better off going to one of the many buffets around the center.

title: Mombasa
name: Nyali International Beach Hotel & Spa
image: https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Mombasa Beach Hotel from Nyali Beach, Mombasa, Kenya 2.jpg
content: Vacation village with 173 rooms with a small safe, rooms are equipped with coffee or tea maker, satellite tv, safe, mini-bar, "Internet connectivity" and hairdryer. 5 restaurants and 4 bars. Several pools, tennis.

title: Dhaka/Central
name: Hotel Orchard Plaza
price: US$70-150, but immediate 30% discounts are offered
content: Built in 2003 it's one of the newer top end hotels in town. Rooms are equipped with complimentary Internet, and it's comfortable and clean with super friendly staff. The restaurant on the 11th floor is also good and has broad city views.

title: Kinsale
name: Friar's Lodge
content: New & modern on a hill with 18 rooms, single €80, double €90-130, triple €150-160, quadruple €190, wi-fi, private parking.

title: Albany (New York)
name: Quality Inn & Suites Albany Airport
directions: 1-87 North to Exit 6, make left turn onto Rt.7 West, hotel is on the right; I-87 South to Exit 6, make right onto Rt.7 West, hotel on right
content: Features Q Corner Cafe breakfast w/hot items, seasonal outdoor pool, 24 hour fitness center, and three onsite restaurants including the very popular Filet 7 West (providing room service).  Complimentary glass of wine or beer each M-Sa evening.  Business center, wireless internet access in all areas, voice mail, large work desks and access to copy and fax Services. Banquet and meeting facilities are available. All spacious guest rooms feature irons, ironing boards, coffee makers, hair dryers, microwaves and refrigerators.

title: Dahab
name: Sheikh Ali Resort
content: Dahab's first all-suite hotel, built with love by Dahab's original tourism family. Featuring 22 pool-side suites with balcony or terrace just a few minutes walk from the beach promenade.

title: Punkaharju
name: Punkaharjun lomakeskus
content: A resort offering accommodation in cottages and apartment-style rooms.

title: Kimitoön
name: Villa Merihelmi
price: €30–45/person, extra bed €20; towels not included, breakfast + €7/4
content: 1930s house in local style, Dalsbruk.

title: Elsinore
name: Hotel Skandia
directions: directly across the street from railway/ferry terminal
price: Single from 595 kr; double from 795 kr
content: Cheapish family run hotel in the city centre, the rooms were a bit kitschy for one traveler, but their 1150 Kr weekend specials is good value, otherwise.

title: Leipzig
name: City Partner Suite Hotel
content: 4-star hotel. Great value.

title: Mar Lodj
name: Campement Essamaye
content: The unique style of Campement Essamaye’s traditional impluvium house mimics buildings in the owner’s native Casamance region. The campement has ten comfortable rooms around a central courtyard (communal toilet/shower block) and plenty of space for tent-camping. Closer to Mar Fafako than Mar Lodj, you’re more likely to run into locals than other tourists (if anyone at all), giving a very authentic feel to your visit. Excursions can be organized (hiking, kayaking, fishing) and the adventurous might even find themselves persuaded to book an extended tour down to the Casamance with the owner, Xavier Diatta.

title: Iqaluit
name: Rannva's Bed & Breakfast
content: The owner of this bed and breakfast also has a gallery of fur and sealskin garments located on Angel Street.

title: Albany (New York)
name: Ramada Plaza Albany
content: Pet-friendly. Offers full service restaurant, cocktail lounge, continental breakfast, meeting and banquet facilities. Provides extended stay amenities and services. Walking distance to restaurants and attractions.

title: Antananarivo
name: Radama Hotel
content: A charming hotel in the heart of Antananarivo.

title: Milwaukee
name: Hilton Milwaukee City Center
content: An Art Deco tour-de-force built in 1927, a grand hotel of legendary proportions. It has ballrooms with vaulted ceilings, city views, and period fabrics. Fully restored, with modern amenities. With 730 rooms in the heart of Milwaukee's Westown, the Hilton is adjacent to the Midwest Express Convention Center.

title: Ilulissat
name: Ilulissat Youth Hostel
content: Small hostel in town, guests must provide their own towels and bed linens. Sleeping bags are ok. There are 43 twin rooms available.

title: Tokyo/Taito
name: Annex Katsutaro Ryokan
alt: アネックス勝太郎旅館
directions: near Sendagi Metro Exit 2 - from the top of the stairs turn left, cross Shinobazu-dori just past Lawson's and continue straight for 50 more meters; or from Nippori station follow Yanaka Ginza to the end and turn left
content: Smallish Japanese-style tatami rooms with ''en suite'' bathrooms and A/C in a modern (2001) 3-story building (elevator available) on a quiet residential street. English spoken. WiFi; free use of computer in the lobby; coin washer/drier (ask for detergent at front desk).

title: National Park Kongernes Nordsjælland
name: Dronningholm
directions: Shortly after you pass the castle ruins there i a small parking lot on the right, the grounds are 200 meters on the south side of the small lake
content: A campground for up to 10 people near the Dronningholm castle ruins near Arresø lake

title: Birmingham (England)
name: ibis Birmingham Bordesley
content: The slightly out-of-town ibis is more of an option for motorists, situated at a large roundabout of the A45 circling the city. It is one of the older ibis hotels in the UK.

title: Malibu
name: Malibu Motel
content: One of Malibu's less expensive options.

title: Seminyak
name: The Seri Suites
content: Surrounded by rice paddies with a relaxing, quiet environment. Less than 10 min by free shuttle bus from the main shopping, eating and beach areas of Seminyak. One, two and three bedroom suites available.

title: London/South Bank
name: Express by Holiday Inn London Southwark
content: Situated on the River Thames, clean and charming hotel.

title: Jerusalem/West
name: Apartments Israel LTD
content: Furnished apartments for short term rent in Jerusalem.

title: Kobe
name: Kobe Portopia Hotel
alt: 神戸ポートピアホテル
content: This is a high-rise international hotel on Portopia Island mainly of interest to business travelers or those attending events at the International Convention Center nextdoor. Includes spa and pool at additional cost. Free wifi in guest rooms. Very nice view from the 30th floor during the breakfast buffet or the bar in the evening. Shuttle service to Sannomiya, Shin-Kobe Stations and Kobe and Kansai airports.

title: San Francisco/SoMa
name: Four Seasons Hotel
content: Very high-end hotel. Beautiful art collection, and extensive sports club with fitness facilities and spa.

title: Beverly Hills
name: Four Seasons Hotel
content: Luxury accommodation.

title: Maastricht
name: Design Hotel Eden
content: If you're bored of identi-kit hotel rooms then ''Design Hotel Eden'' will be a breath of fresh air. All the rooms are comfortably furnished in a variety of modern styles. You'll appreciate a philosophy that doesn't put a desk in your room so you can relax properly; and with the centre of Maastricht less than 5 minutes walk away that's easy to do.

title: Vigan
name: Vigan Hotel
content: Basic hotel in an old colonial house with old-style wooden floors and furniture. The rooms are very basic but acceptable. At 500 php for double, this is one of the few budget option. No food, breakfast or whatever.

title: Yurihonjo
name: Anraku Onsen
directions: Follow signs to Honjo High School.  At the traffic light in front of the high school, go SE for several hundred meters.  It's on the right.
content: Hotel and onsen.

title: Florence
name: Hotel Morandi alla crocetta
content: Housed in a Dominican 16th-century convent, this hotel has a comfortable  atmosphere. It offers rooms with TV, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, etc. On-site garage parking is available.

title: Haparanda
name: Haparanda Vandrarhem
content: Situated by Tornio River in Haparanda centre. 23 rooms. Book ahead of time, as the reception desk is not always open during the advertised hours (16:00-19:00).

title: Budapest/Central Pest
name: Astoria City Hostel
price: Dorm 6-8 bed EUR 14-18, Triple EUR 72/room, dbl EUR 56-64/room twin EUR 56/room (2014 Aug)
content: . Offering dormitories, private rooms and apartments.

title: Flagstaff
name: Flagstaff Rental Cabin
content: 3-Br Cabin with two king size fully adjustable beds with massage upstairs and two queen beds downstairs. Ralph Lauren bedding throughout. 55" 3D TV and fireplace in the great room.
