title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: ITH Zoo Hostel
content: A unique and friendly hostel with tons of character. Free food daily as well as free guided adventure activities all around San Diego.

title: Nagykanizsa
name: Pension Hugi
price: Standart room  for one / two / three person(s) HUF7800 / 11100 / 13300. - Deluxe room HUF9300 / 13100 breakfast plus HUF1000
content: A few minutes away from downtown,  located in a quiet environment. Capacity: 19 people. One-two-three bedded en-suite tv, air-conditioned rooms. Private car parking, free Wi-Fi

title: Luxembourg (city)
name: Novotel Luxembourg Kirchberg
content: The Novotel in Kirchberg is a low-rise one in an office park, surrounded by office buildings, as well as the Sofitel Europe and Suite Novotel. The hotel itself is quite new and pretty standard for a Novotel, yet there is not much in the way of family entertainment that Novotel prides itself for, not even a pool.

title: Ho Chi Minh City
name: Mövenpick Hotel Saigon
address: 253 Nguyen Van Troi St, Phu Nhuan District
content: Luxury hotel in Phu Nhuan, 10 min away from the exhibition centre and international airport and 20 min from HCMC centre. 251 rooms and suites. All rooms are equipped with individually controlled air-con, TV, minibar, strongbox, hairdryer. Broadband Internet in all rooms.

title: Jakarta/Central
name: Gren Alia Cikini
content: 8 floors. Rooms, except suites, have connecting doors. The restaurant opens 24 hours. Less than 50 meters to Ismail Marzuki Park.

title: Swords
name: Highfield House
content: Beautiful family home, only 3km from Dublin Airport. On bus route 102 from airport & 41c & Swords Express. Three star tourist board rating. Ground floor accommodation available. Free Wifi, tea/coffee.

title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: easyHotel Earl's Court
directions: 5 min from Earl's Court tube station
content: Guests can only book an easyHotel on the website and rooms are priced on the basis of the earlier you book, the less you pay.

title: Pontiac (Illinois)
name: 4-H Park
content: Picnic tables, horse trails and corral, playground, restroom, RV dump station, showers.

title: Bangkok/Silom
name: Mandarin Oriental
alt: โรงแรมแมนดาริน โอเรียนเต็ล
content: Ranked highly amongst the finest hotels in the world, it is known particularly for its superlative service. Prices are consequently on the steep side; even the cheapest online rates are rarely below 8,000 baht a night. Sumptuously decorated in old-school Colonial style. The hotel is on the east side of the river with Oriental Pier, its own Express Boat stop.

title: Volos
name: Philippos Hotel
content: Hotel Philippos is a two-star city hotel right in the city center of Volos, close to the main commercial road of Ermou and just a block away from the Port road. It has well equipped, air conditioned rooms ideal for travellers. Free Wifi.

title: Stockholm/Södermalm
name: Globen Villa
directions: In between metro station globen and Enskede Gard
content: In this quiet neighbourhood of traditional working-class houses a welcoming lady rents 3 units for bed and breakfast. Two of the units are separate buildings, which are well equipped. The breakfast consists of several fresh things like bread, fruits and drinks. The cabins are cosy and great value. The metro is a 5 minute walk and from there 10 minutes to the main attractions. Short, the location is fine. The units have their own kitchenettes, so you can cook yourself. The supermarket is a 10 minute walk. Discounts apply if you stay longer. 1200 SEK for a weekend from Friday evening to Sunday. 3500 SEK for a week and less if you stay longer.

title: Winslow (Arizona)
name: America's Best Value Inn
content: Indoor pool, continental breakfast, wi-fi, laundry facilities, pets accepted.

title: Budapest/Pest
name: Danubius Hotel Aréna
price: Dbl from HUF14500 all tax incl.
content: **** 379 air-conditioned rooms. Also there: Danubius Premier Fitness: fitness room and aerobic studio. Swimming pool, Finnish and infra-saunas, solarium, massage and beauty salon.- New Italian-style restaurant and coffee shop. - Ten conference and function rooms with seating capacities of between 15-330 guests. - Close to Budapest’s largest sports and events centre and the international fair centre (HUNGEXPO).

title: Takamatsu
name: Toyoko Inn Takamatsu Hyogomachi
directions: Several blocks S/SW of Takamatsu Station, next to Lawson.
content: This is a branch of the national business hotel chain.  The rooms are clean and comfortable, though not large.  Japanese-style breakfast is included in the price.  There is wired internet in each room and computers for use in the lobby.  Reservations can be made online in English, though the clerk is not likely to speak much.

title: Mar Lodj
name: Cap Marignane
content: With views across the expanse of the Saloum River, Cap Marignane is the perfect place to launch your exploration of the delta (on fishing tours or kayaking, perhaps) as well as a refreshing sanctuary to return to afterwards. A number of lovely rooms, some accessible by low wooden bridges over a crowd of submerged crab holes, are a calm respite from the sun and surf. Enjoy a drink beachside before heading to the restaurant, a colorfully painted and airy spot where you’ll taste delicious local cuisine.

title: Mukutmanipur
name: Sonajhuri Prakriti Bhraman Kendra
content: West Bengal Forest Development Corporation Limited, 6A Raja Suboh Mullick Square, 7th Floor, Kolkata-700013. Phone: +91 33 22370060 / 22258549. Spot booking permitted subject to availability of rooms

title: Sydney/North Sydney
name: Park Regis Concierge Apartments
content: Ideally located amidst the relaxed village atmosphere of Cremorne - a short drive to the attractions of Sydney's city centre. The hotel's city fringe location gives leisure visitors numerous sightseeing and entertainment options on the North Shore.  The hotel features fully self contained studio and one bedroom apartments some with harbour views. The apartments feature modern decor, climate controlled air-conditioning, TVs, direct dial phones with internet access and full kitchen and laundry facilities. The hotel is situated near numerous dining options with a restaurant and bar next door.

title: Royal Chitwan National Park
name: Chilax House
directions: Two minute walk from park ticket counter and Two minute walk from rhino statue chowk
content: Special package for Chitwan National Park, 15 minute walk from Sauraha bus park. Provide free wi-fi and has 4 common rooms and 5 toilet attached Rooms (hot water supplied. Encompasses a organic vegetable and fruit garden, a self cooking facility restaurant cum kitchen. Provides all jungle activities including nature walks, elephant jungle safari, Jeep jungle safari, tharu cultural dance programmes, village tours, jungle excursions, Canoe Ride, and other wildlife related and cultural activities.

title: Montreal/Old Montreal
name: Alternative Hostel of Old Montreal
directions: between rue Saint-Paul and place d'Youville; metro Square-Victoria
content: Housed in a 19th century warehouse, this hostel boasts fair trade coffee, wi-fi, an organic continental breakfast, and a range of activities and classes. Kitchen and laundry facilities provided. Often full, reservations recommended.

title: Varkala
name: Sharanagati Yogahaus
directions: near black beach at north cliff
content: Offers homestays/yoga vacations which include yoga classes, Vipassana meditation, morning tea and Kerala-style lunch in the room price.  Also offers individual yoga classes for people staying somewhere else.  Beautiful quiet garden with hammocks. Only 4 rooms available (keeps traffic down).

title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: Inn at the Park
content: Formerly known as Park Manor Suites, this hotel is located on the western edge of Balboa Park. Rooms feature nice beds, duvets, kitchenettes and free Wi-Fi. Two on-site restaurants, Inn at the Park and Top of the Park and live entertainment.

title: Te Anau
name: The Village Inn
content: A quirky pioneer-styled hotel, with an attached restaurant. Internet for $5/day

title: Nogales (Arizona)
name: Candlewood Suites Nogales
content: Designed primarily for business travelers. Free breakfast and wi-fi, gym and laundry facilities.

title: Istanbul/Sultanahmet-Old City
name: Garden House Istanbul
directions: Tram T1 to Çemberlitaş or Sultanahmet
price: The rates are from €49-219 All year around
content: This facility very close to the Blue Mosque, but in a quite neighboorhood both serves as a mid-range hotel, and exclusive suites branded as 'Rose Garden Suites'. The Hotel has nicely furnished, if somewhat small rooms. The main draw is the courtyard which has been turned into a nice garden and the rooftop terrace. The on-site restaurant offers a 20% discount for guests.

title: Berlin/Mitte
name: Circus Hotel
content: Rosenthalerstr. 1 - About ten steps from the Rosenthaler Platz U-bahn. Nicer version of the hostel. Breakfast included, free wifi; free laptops, DVDs, and iPods available to borrow. Reserve early and ask for interior room if street noise bothers you at night. Exceptionally friendly service.

title: Volos
name: Volos Palace
directions: Behind the city hall, near the waterfront and train station
content: Very nice new hotel with breakfast buffet, bar and restaurant. Modern, comfortable rooms, half of which have a sea view. Helpful staff, most of whom speak English.

title: Curacautín
name: Hostal Rayén
directions: from the bus terminal, walk three blocks west (or right when exiting the terminal)
price: s/d CLP8,000/20,000 with private bathroom and breakfast (probably low season prices)
content: Very basic rooms.

title: Fort Lauderdale
name: Best Western Plus Fort Lauderdale Airport South Inn & Suites Hotel
content: Adjacent Fort Lauderdale International Airport and Port Everglades Cruise Ship Terminal, Suites available. Amenities include: high speed internet, cable, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, outdoor pool, complimentary breakfast, workout facilities, meeting space, airport shuttle

title: Shillong
name: Hotel Knight Inn Shillong
content: Also includes Kenmore Restaurant, which serves mouth-watering food from Chinese, Indian and other cuisines.

title: Montreal/Old Montreal
name: Hotel St-Paul
directions: between rue Saint-Paul and place d'Youville; metro Square-Victoria
content: This self-described "design hotel" features uber-modern rooms on the edge of the historical district. See Eat and Drink for bars and restaurants in the same building.

title: Miyajima
name: Miyajima Tsutsumigaura Camp-jo
alt: 宮島包ヶ浦キャンプ場
directions: A bus travels from Miyajima Pier to the campground, 10 minute ride. From morning until 18:00. Costs ¥300.
content: A nice campsite at the Tsutsumigaura Beach, about 4 km from the port. Cabins and outdoor grills are available as well. There are clean toilets, but no shower: you have to use the bath-house a little way up at the bungalows, for an extra ¥300, and it closes around 8PM. The local deer walk freely around the campgrounds, so don't leave food unattended in the tent while you're away!

title: Patan
name: Summit Hotel
directions: to the right of the main road after crossing the Bagmati on the hill in a residential area
content: Nice location, good food. Garden wing has small rooms, but the other rooms are good.

title: The Hamptons
name: Hermosa Lodge
address: 78 Mecox Road, Water Mill, New York
content: An ideal Getaway for those looking for Romance, Relaxation or Adventure in The Hamptons.

title: Barcelona/Sants-Montjuïc
name: AC Hotel Sants by Marriott
content: AC does the trick by wrapping quite small rooms and limited facilities in modern design in very toned-down hues. Don't expect anything fancy, this is Marriott's lowest-tier brand in Spain. Some of the rooms begin to show dents and cracks after guests failed to properly navigate the narrow bits. The location next to the Sants station is convenient even if a bit sombre.

title: Hong Kong/Central
name: Ovolo Hotel – 286 Queens Road Central
directions: 2 minutes’ walk from Sheung Wan MTR
content: Boutique hotel that opened in 2012. 60 Rooms. Queen or twin mattresses, AppleTV, loot bag, rainfall shower, electric curtains, free minibar, free breakfast, free Wi-Fi, happy hour.

title: Akan National Park
name: Nonaka Onsen
directions: From the junction of Highway 240 and Highway 241, take Highway 241 SW several kilometers. Turn SE onto Highway 861, follow this uphill for several kilometers, and the onsen is on your left.
content: This hotel and onsen is situated in the mountains at the base of a hiking trail for Mt. Meakan.

title: Cologne
name: Best Western Grand City Hotel Köln
content: The former Four Points became a part of the Grand City Hotels chain, which focuses on budget-oriented hotels in Germany, as well as a part of the Best Western network. The hotel's building is anything but pretty and the room appointments somewhat outdated, but this is made up for with free Wi-Fi and a convenient location.

title: Astana
name: Rixos Presidents Hotel Astana
content: Make no mistake about it, this is the most luxurious hotel in Astana. For starters, standard rooms come with heated tiled floors in the bathroom, step in showers and jaccuzi tubs, LCD wide-screen television, and ''free'' wireless internet (although it is not very consistent). The service is friendly and professional. There is a bar, a cafe, and two restaurants, and the best conference facilities in Astana. The spa has the best exercise equipment in Astana, and the pool is lovely. It is within walking distance to the ministries and the better restaurants, and the breakfast buffet is more than fantastic (they've been known to put out caviar!) complete with a harpist. The main drawback? So many VIPs prefer to stay in this hotel (visiting presidents, prime ministers, and other big-wigs) that you often have to fight security to get in and out!

title: Yurihonjo
name: Chokai Ohira Campground
directions: From the Jinego Rest Area, take Highway 70 SE.  At a T-junction, Highway 70 turns N, but don't follow it -- keep going straight.  After about 5km, the pavement turns to gravel, and the campground is about 3km farther.
content: This isolated campground itself is not very scenic, but it is near the trail head for Hinoto Dake (丁岳), a good day hike.  It has one toilet building, a small area for dish washing, a covered eating area, and a light.  There is no resident caretaker.  The road and campground are closed in winter.

title: Wellfleet
name: Pretty Penny Vacation Home
content: Waterview walk to ocean beach vacation rental home.  Inside the Cape Cod National Seashore.

title: Jakarta/South
name: Ritz-Carlton
address: Jl. DR. Ide Anak Agung Gde Agung Kav.E.1.1 no.1, Mega Kuningan
content: The flagship hotel of the Ritz Carlton brand in Jakarta, with standard 5 star service. Bathrooms have floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the other skyscrapers popping up in this fast-growing area. Many types of suites to choose from. Free wireless internet. Only has 2 restaurants (Italian and international) and a bar, but generally enough to fit everyone.

title: Tolú
name: Villa Babilla
content: German-owned hostel.

title: Study Butte-Terlingua
name: Lajitas Golf Resort & Spa
directions: 15 miles south of Terlingua Ghost town on the River Road (Hwy 170)
content: Rooms vary in size, decor and price from simple hotel rooms with "Cowboy Bordello" style rooms in the Badlands Hotel part of the resort, to one-of-a-kind suites, luxurious condos, and even 1,2, or 3 bedroom houses. Resort amenities include horseback riding, an amazing golf course, ATV/jeep/river tours, a Spa, two pools, two restaurants, and the infamous Thirsty Goat Saloon.

title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: St. Mark Hotel
content: This hotel offers 25 guest rooms all with private en-suite facilities. Book online for best deals.

title: Virgin Gorda
name: Guavaberry Spring Bay
directions: on Tower Road south of Spanish Town, 5–10 minute walk from Spring Bay Beach
price: A two-bedroom cottage is about $300 in high season.  No credit cards accepted
content: Has one- two- and three-bedroom cottages, each with a kitchen/living/dining room and deck.  The houses are tucked among more of the giant granite boulders.  The honor-system self-serve commissary is small but has all the necessities for snacking, drinking and dining. No restaurants on premises, but several within a mile or so.  It also manages several villas in the area, ranging from really nice to the spectacular Casa Rocalta.  Guests of the villas have access to the Guavaberry commissary and office staff.

title: Paris/16th arrondissement
name: Hôtel Gavarni
content: In the heart of the Passy village and its fashion boutiques. It's the first independent hotel in Paris to have been awarded the European Ecolabel. Fully air-conditioned, free WiFi.

title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: Galleria Park Hotel
content: A boutique hotel with a half-acre private urban park. Good linens, flat-screen TVs and complimentary wine hour.

title: Cabarete
name: Lomas Mironas Half Acre Ocean View Villas
address: Localiad / Barrio: Lomas Mironas Provincia: Puerto Plata Munucipio: Zona Urbana, Between Cabarete / Sosua
directions: Entrance on the main Highway #5 between Sosua (5km) and Cabarete (9km) near Sea Hose Ranch
checkin: 2PM at Perla de Sosua, behind Banco Popular in Sosua
price: From $1,000USD per week or $1,800 per month
content: easy access to country style horse back riding and is within a few mile of noted El Choco National Park (Parque Nacional "El Choco" und "Las cuevas de Cabarete" - the caves of Cabarete) An incredible 77 square kilometers of jungle, lagoon, caves, forest, orchids and open backcountry to explore.

title: Malacca
name: Backpacker's Freak Hostel
alt: 背包客栈, ホステル
price: Air-con dorm RM16-18, Single RM26-28, Double/Twin room RM36-50, Triple RM60-66
content: 14 rooms with or without air-con, one 4 beds air-con mixed dormitory. Hot/cold showers 24/7, Balinese style common area and cable TV/movie room, kitchen facilities provided for guests. Clean, with friendly staff and quality beds. Free Wi-Fi throughout, free breakfast, easy going and low density. The owner, Sean, speaks good English.

title: Nivala
name: Hotelli Puustelli
content: The only hotel in Nivala, a bit aged but decent. WiFi and breakfast are included in the price.

title: Tashkent
name: Le Grande Plaza Hotel
alt: Formerly BUMI, Гостиница Ли Гранд Плаза
directions: Metro station Amir Temur Xiyoboni and Metro station Yunus Rajabiy are very close
content: Executive floor with lounge, outdoor pool, South Indian restaurant. 10km from airport.

title: Bayreuth
name: Hotel Rheingold
directions: Follow the signs to the underground parking lot "Unteres Tor" (P5), they will directly lead you to the hotel.
price: Single room from €75, double room from 85€
content: Re-opened in 2013 after complete renovation, claimed to be entirely barrier-free.

title: Port St. Joe
name: MainStay Suites
address: 3951 East Hwy 98 , Port St. Joe, FL, 32456
content: Looking for a hotel, motel or affordable lodging near Port St. Joe? The new MainStay Suites is the first and only AAA-rated hotel in Gulf County, located 15 minutes from historic Apalachicola, and one of only four along the entire Forgotten Coast to receive a 3-diamond rating, with affordable nightly, weekly and monthly stays.  MainStay Suites is located near many points of interest including Cape San Blas, St. Joseph Peninsula State Park, Mexico Beach, Port St. Joe Marina and Salinas Park. Port St. Joe Marina offers recreational opportunities like charter boats for offshore fishing, and local captains that offer guide services for fishing in St. Joe Bay. Boat rentals are also available, as well as a restaurant and ship's store. Area activities include the Florida Seafood Festival, Scallop Festival, Christmas On The Coast, fishing tournaments, Music in the Park events, sporting events and parades.

title: Vienna/Wieden
name: Hotel Erzherzog Rainer
content: The Hotel Erzherzog Rainer is one of the five Vienna Schick Hotels.

title: Tbilisi
name: Fox Hostel
directions: Metro Rustaveli, walk south, just 50 m up the hill, opp. Radisson Blue Hotel
content: Renovated 2nd floor apartment in old building (sign on balcony). Cheerful interior design by a woman with taste. Community kitchen and lounge. Spotlessly clean, and -- quite unusual for Georgia -- solid bathroom fixtures.

title: Sopron
name: Atrium Pansion & Wellness
price: (High Season - Low Season - Air conditioned room) deluxe sgl / dbl / tpl HUF10350-9350-12440 / 13800-12800-15900 / 19200-18200-21050, Apartmans four / five bed HUF27700-26700-29800 / 30100-29100-32100
content: Room prices incl. all taxes, a rich continental breakfast, unlimited high speed Internet access, and free of charge parking use. - High Season: Apr-Aug, Christhmas, New Year. - Open: 24/7, Reception: 6:00-22:00, Wellness: 8:00-22:00. - Wellness services: luxurious bubble bath up to six-person, two-person infrared sauna, five-person Finnish sauna. Massage: Traditional and numerous special kind.

title: Shkodra
name: Hotel Colosseo
content: 14 rooms.

title: Malacca
name: River View Guest House
price: Twin room w/ fan RM45, king room w/ air-con RM60
content: In the heritage district of Chinatown, back terrace overlooking the river. Recently converted Chinese shop house, spacious clean fan rooms, shared shower rooms, high quality beds and bedding. All rooms have windows. Use of kitchen, Wi-Fi. No children. Charming owners.

title: Groene Hart
name: Hotel Belvedère
price: €80 for a single room, €110 for a double room
content: Located in the historic city centre of Schoonhoven.

title: Offa's Dyke Path
name: Mellington Hall Hotel
content: 1870's Gothic mansion set in 280 acres of mature gardens and tranquil parkland with mullioned windows, oak panelling and beautiful staircase. 10 individually designed rooms and suites, all ''en suite'' with unlimited Wi-Fi. No pets allowed. Afternoon tea and home made cakes in the ''Offas Dyke Bar''. Lunch 12.00–14:00, Dinner 18.30–21:00 served in one of 4 restaurants: the ''Cwm Dining Room'', the ''Mahogany Panelled Restaurant'', the ''William Morris Room'', or the ''Shropshire Lounge''. Local ingredients and suppliers are used wherever possible with many ingredients traceable to source. Graded *** with Welsh Tourist Board. The most luxorius camp site I have met. Camp by lake next to facilities block. Phone owner for entrance code. Pay £5 pppn (2014) in the morning to groundsman. 5 star hotel next door are polite but claim to know nothing about camping as its under separate ownership. Hotel

title: Los Angeles/Downtown
name: Miyako Hotel
content: A downtown Japanese hotel offering classic comfort accommodations, meeting rooms, and a health spa with Shiatsu massage, close to attractions.

title: Rotterdam
name: easyHotel Rotterdam City Centre
content: A budget hotel operated by the same group as the airline easyJet and accoding to the same principles - the basic accommodation is free, but everything else costs extra.

title: Christchurch
name: AAA Northlands Motel
content: Close to Northlands Mall and QE2 Park.

title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf
content: This hotel is newly renovated and centrally located.

title: Muscat
name: The Chedi
content: Five star luxury with traditional Omani architecture.

title: Antananarivo
name: La Ribaudière
content: A good mid-range option. Very popular, good restaurant.

title: Sakon Nakhon
name: Baan Esan Country House
directions: Sakonnakhon-Udon Rte 22 close to Rajaphat University
content: Cute traditional northeastern-style guesthouse 5 minutes from Sakon Nakhon airport, with a beautiful garden and landscaping. Jasmin and fragrant flowers, orchids, spa, sauna, Jacuzzi. Wi-Fi, satellite TV. English spoken, Breakfast included, latte, cappuccini, meals to go, motorbike rental

title: Byron Bay
name: Byron Beachside Accommodation
content: Sleek & Spacey, Gorgeous Light-filled & innovative Warehouse apartments. Located on the fringe of Byron Bay Village, an easy stroll to the eclectic mix of shops & restaurants on offer. Walk to Main Beach and many of the attractions around Byron Bay, or enjoy the comforts of the Butter Factory pool, garden courtyard & BBQ area.

title: Jakarta/Central
name: Tune Hotels Pasar Baru Jakarta
address: Jalan K.H. Samanhudi no. 25, Pasar Baru
content: AirAsia group hotel adopting its business model. You pay what you use!

title: Holbrook (Arizona)
name: Wigwam Motel
content: Sleep in a giant tepee (as the natives did, although they did it without air conditioning or cable TV). Various historic vehicles on-site. This motel's [[novelty architecture]] is the basis for the [[Route 66]] 'Cosy Cone Motel' in Pixar's 'Cars'. 15 units, non-smoking, listed US National Register of Historic Places.

title: Mugello
name: Villa Montazzi
content: 18th century villa with lots of space: 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 4 living-rooms, library, diningroom and kitchen.  Views of the hills and the Apennines in the distance. Large Italian garden surrounding the property. Antique furniture, billiards, table-tennis, above ground swimming pool.

title: Montreal/Plateau
name: Le Bleu Balcon
directions: between ave du Mont-Royal and rue Marie-Anne; metro Mont-Royal, bus 11, 30, or 97
content: Small, three room, bed and breakfast in a typical Plateau apartment building. Shared bathrooms.

title: Bakkhali
name: Bakkhali Tourist Lodge
directions: take bus from Kolkata and the ferry across the Hatania-Doania river
content: The only lodge near the beach is run by the West Bengal Tourism Development Corporation (WBTDC) at Bakkhali. Credit cards accepted.

title: Kolkata/East
name: NRI Residency
directions: located close to Salt Lake and the EM Bypass
content: offers guesthouse style accommodation with clean and large AC rooms with US style private bathrooms.

title: Bad Gandersheim
name: Rio Gande
directions: Exit 67 on the A7, take B248 then B64 for 10km then take B445 and follow signs for town centre, follow signs for town centre and moblie home park.
content: Location: On the small river of Gande, right on the edge of the historic centre, accessible from the street "An der Wiek", next to the parking lot of Rudolf Cahn of souls Stadium. Separate space for campers, quiet location in the countryside, close to the Centre. Up to 2 minutes walking to the marketplace. Maximum of 3 days stay is allowed.  Shopping and restaurants 200 mtrs away.  The web site offers a full list of amenities etc.

title: Mexico City/Chapultepec
name: JW Marriott Mexico City
content: One of the premier Mexico City hotels, the JW Marriott Hotel Mexico City rises 26 stories high in the exclusive Polanco District. Located in the heart of the business and entertainment sector, this flagship Mexico City hotel is within walking distance to Auditorio Nacional, the city's financial hub, and some of Mexico's best shopping, dining and night life.

title: Munich/Maxvorstadt
name: The Charles Hotel Munich
content: The ''Charles'' is a luxury hotel at the Old Botanical Garden and within walking distance to the historic center. If you want to give yourself a treat, like butler service and a spa, and bring big money, that's the place for you.

title: Travemünde
name: Tourist Office
content: Big variety of accommodation, mostly in local's homes, so it's best to contact the local tourist office.

title: Nara
name: Takama Guest House
content: This Japanese style house transformed into a cosy hostel is run by a modest welcoming guy. It has two clean 4 bed dorms for ¥2000 per person and a double for ¥3000 per person. Free Wi-Fi and a shared PC available. It was opened around September 2011.

title: Kokkola
name: Kokkola Camping
content: Cottages, trailer park, tenting area.

title: Antwerp
name: Novotel Antwerpen
content: This is an old-style low-rise suburban Novotel, complete with a garden with an outdoor pool. The good news is that it was completely renovated, so expect reasonably fresh, nice appointments and features such as the inBalance gym and a game station for kids. The location is north of the docklands, which makes it a reasonable choice pretty much only for those arriving by car.

title: Seoul/East
name: Sheraton Walker Hill Hotel
content: Luxury hotel famous for its casino, swimming pool and seasonal dance parties. Populated with a lively crowd of regular expats.

title: Springdale (Utah)
name: Driftwood Lodge
content: Nice Lodge.

title: Kalundborg
name: Debbies Bed&Breakfast
price: Singles with shared bathroom 300 DKK; doubles with private bathroom 600 DKK; triples with private bathroom and kitchen 675 DKK
content: Rooms with free internet and television.

title: Moscow Outskirts
name: Moscow Home-hostel
price: From 550 RUB dorm or 2000 RUB a dbl.
content: Located in the picturesque quiet park zone, 20 minutes walk to the Kremlin.

title: Iseo
name: Locanda Diana
content: The building and the rooms are quite simple.

title: Sedona
name: The Penrose Inn Bed and Breakfast
content: Arguably one of the best. The service, amenities, and delicious, hot breakfasts are miles above average. Their view of Bell Rock and Courthouse Butte is unmatched.

title: Charleston (South Carolina)
name: Courtyard North Charleston
content: Free WiFi, but only in the lobby & large business center.

title: Jasper National Park
name: Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge
directions: Follow the signs on Highway 16. Turn left (if coming from the east) or right (if coming from the west) onto the black steel bridge over Athabasca River and follow the road
content: This is the only full service hotel outside of Jasper Township. Has a world-class golf course on site, also a world-class restaurant. Expect to pay world-class prices.

title: Jimbaran
name: Karma Jimbaran Resort
content: Resort offering completely private 3-4 bedroom villas. 2 min walk to the beach and a few of the villas have ocean views. Gay/lesbian friendly staff and management. Member of ''Leading Small Hotels of the World''.

title: Karachi
name: Airport Hotel
address: Star Gate Rd, Near Old Airport Rd
content: A pretty good hotel which originally opened in 1955 under the name of “Speed Bird House” owned by Pakistan's national flag carrier airline PIA for its transit passengers and walk in guests. The hotel have some 244 air-conditioned rooms including some executive rooms. Facilities includes standby generators, cable TV in rooms, free WiFi, gym, sauna, jacuzzi, steam bath, swimming pool and free airport pickup/drop.

title: Crowden-in-Longdendale
name: The Old House
content: B&B accommodation, 600 yards from Pennine Way.

title: Amsterdam/Oost
name: Camping Zeeburg
content: This campground is near the city. It has camping cabins, wagonettes, tent sites and RV sites. A good store, free wifi and restaurant/bar round out the amenities. A good, clean and cheap place to stay if you do not mind walking to the bathroom and paying €.80 for a hot shower.

title: Berlin/East
name: Youth hostel Pro-social
price: One night in a four person apartment €12. Up to three night stay €14. Breakfast = €3,50.
content: Youth Hostel of ’Pro-Social’ House on Blumberger Damm have become a highlight for young tourists in the Marzahn-Hellersdorf region of Berlin. 153 beds in apartments with modern, well-furnished rooms of 1 to 4 beds, all have sofa/living area, as well as separate shower and WC, a small entrance hall). These are available for young tourists, youth groups, school classes, language course groups, cultural ensembles, sports teams, in fact anyone who wants to explore Berlin. Youth Hostel puts on satisfying and healthy meals for guests.

title: Freetown
name: Radisson Blu Mammy Yoko Hotel
content: Freetown's first truly 4 star hotel. Recently refurbished to a very high standard. It is well located near to local bars and the beach.

title: Paris/1st arrondissement
name: Hôtel Montpensier
content: Another semi-cheapie right in the middle of everything.

title: Skiathos
name: Aphrodite Studios
content: Aphrodite Studios - a group of 20 spacious studios for 2, 3 or 4 persons - is located at Megali Ammos beach (else Ftelia) that is one of the most known beaches of Skiathos island.

title: Pangmapha
name: Soppong River Inn
content: This is surely one the more comfortable places to stay. Natural accommodations in tropical gardens along the Lang River with a teak deck overhanging the river. Rooms and cottages range from standard to luxury with air conditioning.

title: Dunedin
name: On Top Backpackers
address: Filleul St near The Octagon and Moray St
content: Small dorms, good clean facilities, good staff, good attitude, right next to the Octagon and two blocks from a 24/7 Countdown supermarket. Built over a pool hall and bar; one minute from most facilities including cinema, library, information centre, banks, food etc. 24/7 swipe-card access.

title: Milwaukee
name: Pfister Hotel
content: Milwaukee's most famous and luxurious hotel, which has been serving visiting VIPs since 1893.  Blocks from all of downtown's most exciting attractions, including the Art Museum and the Third Ward.  Even if you can't afford to stay, it's worth your time to take a walk through the building and explore the spectacular lobby, or check out the museum's impressive art collection.

title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: Omni San Francisco Hotel
content: A luxury hotel with marble floors and wood paneling in the lobby and very nice rooms.

title: Monopoli
name: Bed And Breakfast Mari e Monti
alt: Near Castellana Grotte, Zoosafari and Alberobello
content: Contrada aratico. Bed & Breakfast for €30 for person a night. The b&b have a 2 main room, a bedroom, a small kitchen with a fridge, and a small bathroom

title: Windermere
name: Windermere Lodge
content: Is a four star graded luxury pine lodge in Limefitt Park, Troutbeck.

title: Ames
name: Iowa House
content: A small bed and breakfast in an old fraternity house that's well furnished with friendly service. In a nice neighborhood and very convenient to Campustown.

title: Guanajuato
name: El Zopilote Mojado
price: $70 MXN/night; weekly rates can be negotiated
content: This hostal is downtown but located in 3 buildings around the quiet Plaza Mexiamora. In the ''El Zopilote Mojado'' building is a coffee shop with excellent coffee and desserts, and upstairs are the rooms, tastefully done. There is another building called ''Perros Muertos'', colorfully decorated, with all the services (kitchen included) and two terraces with gorgeous views. Finally, ''La Casa del Infierno'' is located in Callejon del Infierno. This house has two small apartments and a main house, fully equipped with very Mexican decorations.

title: Iwaizumi
name: Ryusendo Onsen Hotel
address: 日本 〒027-0501 岩手県下閉伊郡岩泉町岩泉町字府金48
content: This hotel and onsen is located a few kilometers south of the caves.

title: Øresund Coast
name: Sophienberg Slot
content: Build by the king as a 'small' retreat due to its excellent view over the sound, this classical mansion set in a beautiful garden right by the sea mainly functions as a event and conference center. During peak season (July-Mid August) however, they kindly offer reasonably priced bed and breakfast to casual guests.

title: Port Stephens (New South Wales)
name: Botaba Bed and Breakfast
alt: B&B Accommodation in Port Stephens Boat Harbour
content: Botaba Bed and Breakfast is surrounded by native bushland. 'Adults Only' with 2 rooms, each with private ensuite facilities and direct access to the garden. Fluffy bathrobes and natural body products are provided . Cooked breakfast each morning.

title: Woking
name: Holiday Inn Woking
content: Due in part to the presence of a large consulting company in Woking, a large corporate Holiday Inn is located in the centre of the town.  It's expensive but more comfortable than your average Holiday Inn.  Expect cheaper rates at weekends.

title: Zelenograd and New Moscow
name: Hotel-Vintage
content: Just 5 km away Sheremetievo Airport. Free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is available on request in the Vintage’s breakfast room. Room service is available and packed lunches can be organised for day trips.Safe deposit box and free newspapers.

title: Globe (Arizona)
name: Quality Inn
content: Free breakfast and internet, pet-friendly, no smoking, outdoor pool.

title: Vilnius
name: Hotel Rudninku vartai
content: Cosy hotel.

title: Northern suburbs of Stockholm
name: Jumbostay
content: Jumbovägen 4 near Arlanda Airport, is a bit of a novelty and conveniently located near the airport. A decommissioned Boeing 747 Jumbo jet converted into a backpackers' hostel. Everything inside is new and clean, and linen comes included on made beds. Flat screen TV's in each room are a luxury for hostels, and if you really want to splash out, there is the cockpit suite. On the downside, not much of an atmosphere once you get over the novelty of staying in a jet.

title: Eleuthera
name: Pineapple Fields Hotel
directions: Banks Road south of Governor's Harbour
content: Pineapple fields is a residential Island resort development with spectacular ocean views, just a step away from our breath-taking beach on the island of Eleuthera in the Bahamas.

title: Blue Ash
name: Wingate by Wyndham Cincinnati Blue Ash
content: 4320 Glendale-Milford Rd.

title: Monsaraz
name: Turismo Rural Monsaraz - Casa D. Antónia
content: In the main street of Monsaraz you will find the Casa Dona Antónia, memorable and unmistakable with its original and highly characteristic features - its main façade, its three broad chimneys and its massive bougainvillea which, when in flower, adds colour to this marvellous building.  At the beginning of the 1970's it opened its doors to offer a traditional family welcome to visitors. As time passed these visitors spread the reputation of Casa D. Antónia, not only in Portugal but also in the world beyond.

title: Taitung
name: Formosan Naruwan Hotel
content: This is five star hotel for those with a large budget and an appreciation for amenities. It offers all the things a hotel of its stature should including spa and free gym.

title: Turin
name: NH Art + Tech
content: Also at Lingotto, this hotel has 5 stars and features the architecture of Renzo Piano.

title: Kota Kinabalu
name: Borneo BeacHouse Backpackers
address: 122 Lorong Ikan Lais, Jalan Mat Salleh, Tanjung Aru
price: Fan dorm RM28, A/C dorm RM38
content: Fairly shabby hostel and a fairly nasty beach. Located far outside the city. Staff are friendly but not very knowledgeable. Only worth staying at if you have an early flight or are in transit, or if you don't mind dirty sheets and broken toilets. Located near some hawker stalls where you can get cheap Malay food for RM5-6.

title: Northern suburbs of Stockholm
name: Radisson Blu
content: The only hotel within the airport terminal.

title: Salalah
name: Hilton Salalah
content: A popular choice for European visitors. It is located roughly 12km outside town and runs a shuttle service to and from the Gold Souq daily. The hotel cannot really be recommended, however, as the service is appalling and a general sense of "the inmates running the asylum" pervades.

title: Paris/8th arrondissement
name: Intercontinental Paris Avenue Marceau
content: The "other" Intercontinental in Paris contrasts with the lavish historic ''Grand'' by having a more subtle, postmodern decor. The location in a converted historic building provides for spatial limitations clear in all areas of the hotel, but with only 57 rooms the property has almost a boutique feel to it.

title: Northern suburbs of Stockholm
name: Venngarn Palace
content: A 17th century palace, though there are historical records since the 12th century. Among most Swedish people, the palace is known as a rehabilitation home for alcoholics during the early 20th century. Today, it is used as a conference hotel.

title: Valparaíso
name: Apartments Valparaiso Experience
directions: A 4 minutes walk to Plaza Victoria, between Ferrari St y Bernardo Ramos St halfway down staircase alley Pasaje Santa Margarita on Bellavista hill.
content: All apartments are fully furnished with free and stable Wi-Fi and cable TV. Newly built quality duplex apartments, central heating, double glazing windows, wooden ceiling beams and wooden floors, each unit with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, bright living room and equipped kitchen and ample deck terraces with panoramic views over the ocean, city and coastline. Remodelled building with 2, 3 and 4 bedroom apartments on a safe and central location on Bellavista hill.

title: Llandysul
name: Typoeth Cottage
content: Self catering holiday cottage in secluded valley, less than 10 minutes from Llandysul. Twin beds, with option for a third bed. Wood burning fire. Enclosed rear garden. Dogs are welcome. Dog training sessions are available.

title: Dumaguete
name: DND Building
directions: Next door to Worldview. Sign is visible only when walking north, on a wall to your left
content: Good place for longer-term stay. Large rooms with a/c, cable TV, Wi-Fi, fridge (but no cooking facilities), cold water shower. For weekly or monthly stays, electricity bill is extra.

title: Munich/Ludwigsvorstadt-Isarvorstadt
name: Hotel Royal
content: The hotel offers free wireless internet access and free premiere movie channel (German & English). It features a very central location with only a few minutes to walk from Munich's historic center, Marienplatz, Hofbräuhaus and the Oktoberfest site.

title: Pristina
name: Hotel Sara
directions: in the heart of the bazaar
content: Rooms for one to three people and renovated albeit very simple. Clean and basic, this hotel features lurid red and green corridors, a handful of satellite television channels, a few rooms with small jacuzzis and a garage for two cars.

title: Camp Hill
name: Radisson Hotel Harrisburg Hershey
content: A very nice hotel with a variety of different types of rooms, two different restaurants, a fitness center, and convention space for businesses. Its location is ideal to enjoy the quieter aspects of the town of Camp Hill while still being close enough to travel to Harrisburg and Hershey.

title: Thousand Islands National Park
name: Putri Island Resort
directions: Departure from Ancol Marina pier no. 9
price: From Rp 880,000 for a 2 day/1 night weekday rate
content: This is the first resort erected at the islands. 75 cottages, all with double or twin beds. Not your fit if what you want is a quiet atmosphere! You can use the glass bottom boat, a special cruise to see the sunset, & an undersea aquarium!

title: Siuntio
name: Störsby Bed & Breakfast
content: A lovely countryside farm equipped to accommodate single travellers or whole families, if needed for all their holidays. The lady running the place speaks all sort of languages (if needed with her hands) and makes you feel welcome.

title: Quartzsite
name: Crystal Hill Kofa Campground
directions: in the Kofa National Wildlife Refuge, off of Hwy 95 south of Quartzsite
content: Located on a dirt road with 16-29 campsites available. RVs permitted, no maximum. No water, 14-day limit. Visitors are permitted to collect any quartz crystals they may find in the area without the aid of tools - no digging!

title: Mombasa
name: Tamarind Village
content: Apartments of one, two or three rooms with satellite tv and open veranda with view of the old town. Two pools and a whirlpool.

title: Los Angeles/Wilshire
name: Beverly Laurel Motor Hotel
content: A popular hotel, next door to Swingers.

title: Barcelona/Sant Martí
name: Melia Barcelona Sky
content: Upscale hotel in Poble Nou neighbourhood. Amenities include free high-speed internet, minibars in all rooms, 24 hour access to the gym, pillow-top mattresses and a pillow menu.

title: Cincinnati
name: Ramada Inn Downtown
content: Cheapest traditional hotel to stay next to downtown.

title: Niagara Falls (New York)
name: Gorge View
content: Hostel with male, female, and co-ed dorms, along with private rooms. All bathrooms en-suite. Reception hours from 9AM-7PM daily; late check-in is possible if arranged in advance. Free wireless internet, laundry facilities.

title: Granada (province)
name: Hostels Granada Nest
content: Youth Hostels Nest in Granada.

title: Fox Glacier
name: Lake Paringa Heritage Lodge
content: Motel, backpackers and van sites near Lake Paringa.

title: Williams (Arizona)
name: Red Garter Bed and Bakery
content: Listed on the National Register of Historic Places.

title: Tallinn
name: Sokos Hotel Viru
content: This is a large matchbox of a building and, for a long time, it was the tallest modern building in Tallinn. It's very centrally located at the edge of the Old Town. In the Soviet days, when Tallinn was a hotbed of espionage, Viru was the city's premier hotel and every single room was famously bugged by the KGB. Today it's just a very good Finnish-run business hotel, and even the gray facade has been whitewashed.

title: Alcobaça
name: Hotel Santa Maria
content: A three star hotel.

title: Tucson
name: Lodge on the Desert
content: Founded in 1936 as a dude ranch on the edge of town, Lodge on the Desert is now in the heart of the city. However, it still exudes desert style and beauty. The 35 rooms are beautifully appointed with unique Southwestern flair.

title: Hamar
name: Hamar Hostel
content: This hostel, part of Hostelling International, is located near Vikingskipet, a fifteen minute walk from the city centre.

title: Luxembourg (city)
name: Luxembourg Youth Hostel
content: 2, rue du Fort Olisy. A nice clean hostel with a friendly atmosphere and only 10 minutes on the bus from the city centre. 23.90€ per bed in a shared dorm, discount with HI membership. Breakfast free, other meals €5 - €10.

title: Berlin/City West
name: Pullman Berlin Schweitzerhof
content: The former Sofitel found a new lease of life as an ultra-modern Pullman. It is located in Budapester Strasse, a relatively quiet upscale street running along the Zoologischer Garten. some distance away from U-Bahn or S-Bahn stations. The hotel is appointed in the beige/brown/ecru theme also found in other Pullmans in Germany.<br>The rooms facing the zoo offer striking vistas, while the ones on the opposite side face a wall of an office building across the courtyard. Fortunately, there are small lobbies on every floor with views of the zoo and complimentary tea and coffee. All rooms offer a full range of modern comforts, including the possibility to link your devices to the room's audio/video systems. There is free mineral water in the rooms, but do note that the WiFi incurs extra charges over the room prices.

title: Tashkent
name: Jahongir Hotel
directions: From Metro station Tinchlik north ten mins walk
content: A two star hotel.Economy rooms are with shared bath

title: Győr
name: Corvin Hotel
content: *** Twenty rooms.

title: Turku
name: Interpoint Hostel
content: Operated by the YWCA of Turku, this is the cheapest place to sleep in Turku, but for good reason: It is just 30 mattresses on the floor, and 1 shower. If that is enough for you, then this is your place.

title: Copenhagen/Vestegnen
name: Ishøj Strand Camping
price: Adults 65 Kr (One year Camping Pass is mandatory - 90 Kr)
content: Just next to the nearby hostel, both are jointly operated by the Danish hostelling organisation. Shared building with reception, kitchenette, bathrooms,  and other sanitary facilities. Campfire, playground, football fields for the kids, and walking distance to the beach.

title: Copenhagen/Indre By
name: Danhostel - Copenhagen City
content: Rooms are clean and minimal, if not to say Spartan, although the hostel prides itself on having rooms designed by renowned design house Gubi.... It looks more like a room by Ikea - not that this is necessarily a bad thing, considering it is a hostel, and the view are great! Everything extra comes with a cost, but the lobby is super nice.

title: Dingle Peninsula
name: Moan Laur Bed and Breakfast
content: Cosy traditional Irish cottage in the heart of the Dingle Peninsula with great views of the Slieve Mish Mountains. Within walking distance of the Dingle Way.

title: San Francisco/Twin Peaks-Lake Merced
name: Days Inn at the Beach
content: Your typical Days Inn; across the street from the zoo.

title: Avignon
name: Hotel d 'Europe
content: 5-star

title: Dudinka
name: Hotel Northern Lights
content: Centrally located with 37 rooms. A sauna, swimming pool and small café are avalible.

title: Toronto/Downtown East
name: Ramada Plaza Toronto
content: Restaurant, business center, meeting & banquet rooms, indoor heated swimming pool, hot tub, complimentary WiFi, underground parking available, central location.

title: Valleyview
name: Paradise Inn & Suites Hotel
content: Onsite 24 hour Tim Horton restaurant, complimentary deluxe continental breakfast with waffle bar, waterslide, hot tub, free high speed wifi, fitness center, pet friendly, free parkings with hookup,  free local phone, flatscreen TV, mini-frig & microwave, full kitchen available, accessible rooms.

title: Yosemite National Park
name: Hodgdon Meadow
content: This campground is located north of Crane Flat near the park entrance and is open year-round.  Reservations are required from April through September, and offers 105 sites for both tents and RVs up to 35' in length. Four group sites are available for 15-25 people. Water and flush toilets are available.

title: Barcelona/Sant Martí
name: Catalonia Albeniz
content: A simple and slightly dated hotel right next to the Clot train station.

title: Ivano-Frankivsk
name: Auscoprut hotel
content: three-star hotel. 24 rooms

title: Troy (Michigan)
name: Courtyard Detroit Troy
content: Good size and quality rooms. Small gym and pool. Breakfast is Starbucks style.

title: Pogradec
name: Millenium Hotel
content: Splendid. -All 51 rooms with: Bathroom, Cable TV, Minibar, Terrace, Airconditioning, Internet, Telephone, Heating system.  +Tel.:+ 355 86 820308

title: Yangon
name: Yuzana Garden Hotel
content: 37 rooms in a renovated colonial building.

title: Santiniketan
name: Krishna Chura Homestay
content: Hospitable family home with modern facilities.

title: Roatán
name: Coconut Tree Hotel (West End, Half Moon Bay)
content: Great accommodations for travelers on a budget. All cabins have air-con and a refrigerator. Cabins in West End & West Bay. Associated with [http://www.coconuttreedivers.com/ Coconut Tree Divers]

title: Cuzco
name: KM Apartments
directions: Behind Scotiabank of Avenida de la Cultura
content: Affordable apartments, to 5 minutes from Plaza de Armas in Taxi.

title: Lac-Mégantic
name: Auberge et Chalets sur le Lac
content: Rooms and chalets for rent, refrigerators, boat docks on-site, outdoor pool. Whirlpool bath in some rooms. Additional charge for pets.

title: Lochmaddy
name: Hamersay House
content: Formerly the Tigh Dearg Hotel, a new hotel (opened in 2005) located about 15 minutes walk from the ferry.

title: Cincinnati
name: Hilton Netherland Plaza
content: Originally the Netherland Plaza Hotel, a favorite of Bing Crosby and many other celebrities who frequented Cincinnati during it's golden age of WLW radio. Hilton's historic luxury hotel in Cincinnati is the located inside of historic Carew Tower Complex in the heart of Cincinnati (Fourth and Vine Streets). The Carew Tower is the 2nd tallest building in Downtown Cincinnati, and an Art Deco architectural landmark.

title: Matsue
name: Matsue Urban Hotel
content: No nonsense business hotel. Rooms have LAN internet.

title: Red Wing
name: St. James Hotel
content: The oldest hotel in town, in operation since 1875.

title: Moscow Central-North
name: TNT Hostel Moscow
directions: located at Metro Kuznetskiy Most, on the Purple line. - The door code is ''1234''. Hostel is on the 3rd (Russian numbering) fl., left door.
content: Hostel located in the one of the safest places in Moscow, on a small side street within the Central Bank of Russia and Federal Guard Service buildings.

title: Cadaqués
name: Hotel Playa Sol
content: Directly on the sea-side.

title: Montevideo
name: Spléndido Hotel
content: Rumor has it that this hotel was originally built by a former president at the turn of the 20th century for his mistress. The hotel is located near the Plaza de Independencia and the Teatro Solis. Many of the best restaurants, music, bars, and sightseeing spots are literally within a few steps of the front door.

title: Federated States of Micronesia
name: Kosrae Nautilus Resort
directions: 15 minute drive from the airport on the eastern side of the island, adjacent to the ocean
content: 18-room modern hotel with air-conditioned rooms and restaurant, or outside dining by the swimming pool. Free airport transfers, full service scuba dive operation including NAUI scuba instruction. Tour and rental cars arranged. Located adjacent to the Lelu causeway facing east to the Pacific Ocean, with 3 acres of manicured gardens.

title: Doha
name: Merweb Hotel
content: Newish, pleasant four-star hotel.

title: Chipata
name: Chipata Motel
directions: Just north of intersection with Lundazi Rd
content: Clean if somewhat run-down doubles from US$10.  Also hosts many concerts, which can be good to visit, but not so good to try to sleep through.

title: Lesotho
name: Maliba River Lodge
content: Maliba River Lodge offers guests self-catering accommodation in [[Ts'ehlanyane National Park]] and is the perfect stay over for budget travellers and tour groups. Each Chalet sleeps 8 people.

title: Death Valley National Park
name: Furnace Creek
price: $18 per night during the winter season and $12 a night during the summer
content: (Year round).  Located 196 feet below sea level, Furnace Creek has 136 sites with water, tables, fireplaces, flush toilets, and dump station. No showers, but nearby Furnace Creek Ranch offers pool and shower for $5 per day.

title: Isalo National Park
name: Isalo Rock Lodge
content: This 60 room resort occupies an incredible location, surrounded by sandstone formations and with a sunset view across the rocks that is nearly worth the hefty room price on its own.  This is a top-end resort, built from local materials in order to blend with the natural setting.  The large rooms that contain amenities such as air conditioning, mosquito nets, mini bar, safe, deck, etc.  Property amenities include a pool, desert gardens, bar, restaurant, and spa.  The resort also offers a few hiking options, including the short (five minute) hike up to a hiking trail up to Giorgio's Window, a sunset overlook atop a sandstone formation.  Visa accepted for payment.

title: Cleveland/East Side
name: Glidden House
content: A renovated and expanded mansion in University Circle on the campus of Case Western University. This is one of the most luxurious lodging options in Cleveland.

title: Paris/15th arrondissement
name: Hotel Mirabeau Eiffel
content: Though it is off centered, It is new, clean and somewhat affordable

title: Barcelona/Sant Martí
name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic
content: This hotel with a spa is actually a bit north of the actual Olympic Village. Due to its constrained location within one of the old blocks of Poblenou, the experience there may be less rewarding than in some of the newer hotels.

title: Quelimane
name: Hotel Flamingo
content: Reasonable hotel with basic air conditioned rooms. Internet is available in reception. Swimming pool and bar/restaurant outside. There is Wireless available at the bar/restaurant. Safe parking.

title: Saint Petersburg/Center
name: Old Vienna, mini hotel
address: Malaya Morskaya ulitsa, 13/ Gorohovaya 8 ( Малая Морская ул., д. 13 / Гороховая ул., д. 8)
content: A both stylish and "home-cozy" mini-hotel of business class level, located in the centre. All 14 rooms with: air con, Wi-Fi, bathroom, sat TV, telephone, mini-bar, hair-drier, DVD. Breakfast (buffet) included in the price.

title: Perth (Ontario)
name: Tay Inn
content: Highway 7 motel with wi-fi, a/c, refrigerators, outdoor pool. No pets.

title: Banff
name: The Fairmont Banff Springs Hotel
content: One of the [[grand old hotels]], few hotels can compare to the majesty of the Fairmont Banff Springs Hotel. Nestled in the trees overlooking the rest of the town and valley it is a magnificent location for a magnificent building. Multiple restaurants, a heated outdoor pool and a wide range of accommodation in a fantastic building. All this comes at a price though, and the Banff Springs is an expensive hotel. Also booking very early is required. Among the luxurious amenities, you can indulge in their three waterfall treatments whirlpools and indoor Hungarian mineral pool (that actually has music underwater to soothe you as you float into complete relaxation) or enjoy treatments at the onsite Willow Stream Spa. Bike and ski rentals are available at the hotel and can be booked in advance.

title: Tashkent
name: Hotel Ichan Qala
address: Yusuf Hos Hojib ko'chasi ( ул. Юсуф-Хос-Хожиб), 75/10
directions: Close to State Pedagogical University and BEK hotel
price: Standart Сглгл / Dbl $125/150, Delux Room /en- Suite Room $180/250, Junior Suite/Senior Suite $290/375, Executive Suite Room $415, Villa Khorezm $2500
content: A four star hotel. Sixty eight rooms: Superior, DeLuxe, Junior Suite, Suite, Presidential Suite and Villa

title: Saint Petersburg/Center
name: Ermitage Hotel
content: A small four star hotel with genuine St. Petersburg spirit. Located in the historical centre. Offers 4 double rooms that allow usage of a fully equipped study and a magnificent hall with fireplace - and with the whole staff of the hotel at your disposal.

title: Archangelos
name: Porto Angeli Hotel
content: 5 star resort.

title: Auburn (New York)
name: Sleepy Hollow Motel
content: Road.

title: Santiago de Chile/Sanhattan
name: Santiago Marriott Hotel
content: A popular business hotel in Las Condes, near excellent dining and shopping. Offers comfortable accommodations, a Lobby Bar, two first-rate restaurants, meeting space, and other modern amenities and services.

title: Montreal/Old Montreal
name: Auberge Vieux Port
content: A good deal for the price, this historical building, set back from the street, books up early.

title: Vaasa
name: Westbay Inn
content: A guesthouse some seven kilometers north of the city center in Västervik.

title: Kyoto/North
name: GuestHouse Bon
directions: 8 min. west of Kitaōji subway station K04, north exit
content: Located in northwest Kyoto, immediately east of Daitokuji. Inexpensive bicycle rentals. The guest house owner has lived in Western countries before and can speak fluent English and a pinch of Spanish. All Japanese-style rooms, but can be converted to dorm style upon request for larger parties.

title: Dunedin
name: Central Backpackers Dunedin
content: In the heart of the city, 1 minute from the Octagon.

title: West Coast (Suriname)
name: New Kow Loon
directions: On the corner of Oost Kanaalstraat
content: This is a lively place on the market, combining a restaurant with a hotel. Rooms are simple but adequate and breakfast is included. The restaurant serves a broad range of Surinam dishes, from different cuisines.

title: Ulaanbaatar
name: Mandukhai Hotel
content: A nice inexpensive hotel located in UB city center. The hotel staff speaks little English but rooms are large and include TV. Bathrooms are shared.

title: Taos
name: El Monte Sagrado
content: A resort with luxurious themed suites, a spa, a restaurant & bar, meeting space, and wedding facilities.

title: Tabriz
name: Hotel Darya
content: It include in the price Wi-Fi, Satellite Channels, Breakfast, Swimming Pool, and Sona.

title: Tampere
name: Cumulus Pinja
content: A small hotel, located in the center of the city.

title: Morenci (Arizona)
name: North Clifton RV Park
content: Full hook-ups for RVs, with sites for tents. Call for availability.

title: Trondheim
name: Radisson BLU Royal Garden Hotel
content: Modern palace of glass, brass and marble with 295 rooms. Centrally located, excellent communications, but a little soulless.

title: Vancouver/City Centre
name: Quality Hotel - Inn at False Creek
content: Has the trendy boutique look and feel with brick walls in the rooms accompanied by modern finishings. Rooms are mixed with two double beds, a single queen or a single king. There are also some extended stay rooms with a kitchenette. Wifi is complementary and there is a seasonal outdoor pool.

title: Dresden
name: Ramada Hotel Dresden
content: On the southeastern outskirts of Dresden. Do not mistake it with the "Ramada Resident", which is in a similar direction, but quite a distance away from this hotel.

title: Phnom Penh
name: Long Lin Guesthouse
price: USD12 for a spacious double or twin
content: Clean, spacious and well-decorated. The owner is very friendly and helpful, as is the service. Tours, buses and boats can also be booked through the guesthouse and may include pick-ups.

title: Manila/Malate
name: Pink Manila hostel
address: 2551 Don Pedro street cor. Bautista street
content: Fan dorm beds. Has a swimming pool.

title: Jakarta/South
name: Amaroossa Cosmo
content: Located within the Pasar Minggu area. Wide rooms with mirrors on the wall behind the bed. Large restaurant and coffee shop for a banquet or informal meeting.

title: Oran
name: Sheraton Oran Hotel & Towers
content: One of the fanciest hotels in Oran with breathtaking views of the ocean from each room. The hotel also features a complimentary airport shuttle, restaurants and a tennis court

title: Iqaluit
name: Hotel Arctic
content: Formerly the Nova Inn.

title: Montevideo
name: Ciudad Vieja Hostel
content: Located near the historical heart of the city and in the middle of Montevideo’s nightlife. Free breakfast, Internet, kitchen access.

title: Santa Cruz Trek
name: Llamacorral
content: Recommended camp site for the last night.

title: Novgorod
name: Hotel inside railway station
hours: on a 24hrs basis (e.g. check in at 03:25 — then you should check out at 03:25 next morning, or extend your stay).
price: dorm in 4-bed room 350 Rubles; dorm in 3-bed room 400 Rubles; double 1200 Rubles; single 650 Rubles
content: 13 rooms right inside of the railway station building. Shared bathroom. No WiFi.

title: Logroño
name: Hotel Carlton Rioja
address: Avda. Gran Vía Rey Juan Carlos I, 5
content: 4-star hotel.

title: Minneapolis/Downtown
name: Hotel Ivy
content: Located in the heart of downtown. Connected to seven miles of skyway, connecting guest to attractions such as the Convention Center, Nicollet Mall, Orchestra Hall and the Guthrie Theatre regardless of weather.

title: Jasper National Park
name: HI-Maligne Canyon
directions: turn south off highway 16 just east of the townsite
content: Closed Wednesdays Oct-Apr, open all other times. This small, 24 bed hostel, is an excellent place to get away from things for a while. Though it lacks running water, you'll not miss anything else. There's a good sized kitchen, a supply of drinking water, and a very friendly and relaxed atmosphere.

title: Pécs
name: Nap Hostel Pecs
price: 8/6-bedded room (bunk beds, shared bathroom), €10/13. - 6 bedded room (standard beds,shared bathroom) €15, - Dbl with shared bathroom €44/room
content: Is in the main pedestrian street of the historic city centre. The hostel is in a building of eclectic architecture built in 1885. The rooms are spacious and colourful, the bathrooms are modern and there is a fully equipped kitchen for you to use. From the balcony, you can have a beautiful panoramic view of the whole city and of the Mecsek Mountains. -+mobile: +36 30 2770733

title: Odessa
name: Mini Hostel Odessa
content: Cheap, safe and secure hostel in the centre of Odessa. Free Wi-Fi, lockers, linen, coffee and tea. English-speaking reception 24/7. Guests of the Mini Hostel Odessa get a discount if they stay in the Mini Hostel Kiev or the Mini Hostel Lviv.

title: Manuel Antonio
name: Brunxu Apartments
content: Apartments for rent surrounded by exotic vegetation that characterize the Pacific Coast of Costa Rica.

title: South Central Arizona
name: Chuparosa Inn Bed & Breakfast
address: 1300 S Madera Canyon Rd, Madera Canyon
content: Ideal for birdwatchers.

title: Chiang Mai
name: 7 Century Guest House
content: Newly renovated guest house, but somehow already a bit worn. 2 single (150 baht), 4 double (180-220 baht) and 1 triple rooms (250 baht). Singles can be a bit mouldy due to poor drainage and ventilation. Good hot shower (private for single rooms, shared for double and triple). Terrace. Free Wi-Fi. If they have a laptop free you can borrow it to take to your room. Fan in rooms. Kitchen free to use. Soft beds. Service also available in German. Help with booking trips, treks, motorbikes and other things. Friendly staff.

title: Annan
name: Firth Hotel
directions: on B721 to east of town centre
content: Family run B&B and licensed bar.

title: Munich/Haidhausen
name: Courtyard by Marriott Munich City East
content: The Courtyard occupies a building between the Residence Inn and the Motel One close to the Ostbahnhof

title: Kingston (Ontario)
name: Delta Kingston Waterfront
content: Renovated 2013, former Ramada/Radisson.

title: Alajuela
name: Jaulares
content: Buffet restaurant and private cabins accommodation.

title: Copenhagen/Indre By
name: Radisson BLU Royal Hotel
content: Five-stared hotel centrally located opposite the Central station and the Tivoli. The entire hotel from the exterior facade through to the swan and egg chairs gracing the lobby have been designed by famous Danish architect, Arne Jacobsen. Free broadband, fitness centre, gourmet restaurant "Alberto K" on the 18th floor.

title: Jakarta/Central
name: Atlet Century Park
content: A cheap hotel in the middle of Senayan close to Gelora Bung Karno. Semi-Olympic size swimming pool. The restaurant only provides Indonesian food. The 16th floor executive room will also entitle you to an executive lounge with never ending helping of snacks.

title: Stockholm/Norrmalm
name: Nobis
content: Branded as "Stockholm's first contemporary luxury hotel", opened in 2009 in a 19th century building. The building used to be a bank office, known for the 1973 hostage robbery which coined the term ''Stockholm Syndrome''. The lounge is 28 meters tall.

title: Kentucky Dam Village State Resort Park
name: Kentucky Dam Village State Resort Park
content: The park campground features 219 paved sites with water and electric hook ups.  Comfort stations with showers and flush toilets are available as well as an onsite grocery store.  The campground is closed November 1 through March 31.

title: Farnborough
name: The Aviator Hotel
content: Farnborough Road. A four-star "luxury" hotel.

title: Nairobi
name: Giraffe Manor
content: The converted home of the founders of the African Fund for Endangered Wildlife, located a few kilometres from the city center, sitting on 57 ha (140 a) of land. The giraffes can be fed at the front door or even from the second floor bedroom window!

title: Jakarta/West
name: Pullman Central Park
content: A sleek 5 star hotel above the Central Park Mall. Chic and spacious rooms with a sense of black and white. All day dining at Collage with live cooking demonstrations and top off with a wine at Vinoteca or a Bloody Mary at Bunk bar. Also provides spa, massage, fitness and pool for your wellbeing.

title: Paris/15th arrondissement
name: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel
directions: entrance is from 22 rue Jean Rey
price: Room-only rates starting from €205, breakfast is €25 per person
content: The former Hilton was taken over by Accor's upscale business hotel brand Pullman and underwent extensive renovation to its rooms and public spaces. It continues to offer close-up views of the Eiffel Tower from the balconies of its relatively spacious for Paris Deluxe (32 sqm) and Superior (26 sqm) rooms, while the Classic rooms (26 sqm) face the courtyard.

title: New Orleans/French Quarter
name: Royal Barracks Guest House
content: Every room features a queen size bed, private bath and fireplace, and private entrance to the courtyard.

title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: The Clift Hotel
content: Hotel features Jeffrey Chodorow's Asia de Cuba restaurant, the Redwood Room, the Living Room, private apartments, penthouse suites and meeting facilities.

title: Jakarta/Central
name: Le Grandeur Jakarta
address: Jl. Mangga Dua Raya, Jakarta 10730, Indonesia
content: 350 room business hotel. At the Mangga Dua shopping complex. The La Avant is the primary restaurant and despite its French name, it is famous for the pulled Chinese noodles (''La Mien'') that has a silky taste.

title: Benson (Arizona)
name: Benson KOA
content: Spots for tents and RVs, cabins available. Hookups and water at some sites, showers and pool on the grounds. Free wi-fi, pets accepted.

title: Liverpool
name: Premier Inn, Albert Dock
directions: Situated just off the A5036. Follow the brown tourist signs for the 'Albert Dock' and the 'Beatles Story'. Once inside the dock, the hotel is situated in the middle of the Britannia Pavilion directly besides the Beatles Story.
content: The hotel is in original warehouse, has been well transformed and has the vaulted ceilings. While room allocation is mostly luck some rooms have classic views over the dock; others of the new Liverpool Arena. Early booking essential; cheap/discounted rooms now impossible to find because of the high demand/location. Ranked as top Liverpool hotel on Tripadvisor. No hotel parking - nearby at about £12/day.

title: Las Vegas
name: Oasis Las Vegas RV Resort
content: Nice clean RV park south of the Strip, 50 amp full service hookups. Two pools and hot tubs. You'll need to drive or take a shuttle to the Strip. Easy access from I-15.

title: North Uist
name: The Old Courthouse
directions: Around 15 minutes walk from the ferry.
content: Bed and Breakfast from 25 - 30 pounds per person per night.

title: Towada-Hachimantai National Park
name: Sukayu Onsen
price: 7000 yen per person for the ryokan accommodation, 10000 yen on high season
content: One of the most famous old onsen in the area. The exterior and interior are of wood, and the main bath, though large, will unlikely hold up to 1000 people as it is famously claimed. The water is white and is reputedly good to treat reuma. The whole onsen smells of sulfur from the water, which adds to the charm once you get used to it. The large bath is open 24 hours and is one of the few remaining mixed-sex baths (be warned!), except 8-9am and pm when it is female only. It is near a nice short walk that takes you to a termal-heated wooded bench. Serious hikers can relax in this onsen after walking the Hakoda mountain. Rooms are Japanese style, and food is served in the room, ryokan style. Alternatively you can stay for a longer period and cook your own food in the cooking facilities.

title: Thousand Oaks
name: Hampton Inn & Suites Thousand Oaks, CA
content: Guest rooms and suites with complimentary hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking. Pool and fitness center are also provided.

title: Baker (Nevada)
name: End of the Trail...er
content: Two bedroom guest house with kitchenette, large bath and private deck with unobstructed view of Great Basin National Park. One bedroom has a queen-sized bed, the other a twin-sized bed. Comfortable for 1-3 guests. A unique artist's retreat that is clean and quiet. Season: May 1 through September 30th. No smoking and no pets.

title: Chipata
name: Pine View Guest House
directions: Southeast side of town, off Umodzi Highway)
content: A nice place offering double rooms from $20.

title: Ayacucho
name: Hostal Tres Mascaras
directions: One block southeast from Plaza de Armas
content: Fairly big hostel with rooms surrounding a courtyard sporting both parrots and budgies (although caged). The yard is a bit run down, but the rooms are nice. Wifi, hot water, simple breakfast on request.

title: Brookline
name: The Beech Tree Inn
content: The Beech Tree Inn Bed and Breakfast offers 10 guest rooms in the outskirts of Boston.  The inn is just a short tram ride from many of the cities events and activities.

title: Tel Aviv/Central Tel Aviv
name: Mercure B&P Tel Aviv
content: The hotel is in the center of Tel Aviv and offers spacious and contemporary 4 star accommodations. This makes it ideal for business and leisure travelers.

title: New Orleans/Faubourg Marigny
name: Elysian Fields Inn
content: Convenient for walking into the French Quarter, 3 blocks from Frenchmen Street clubs. Hosts, Leigh and Jim are very knowledgeable of the NOLA music scene. Has secure covered parking.

title: Mikkeli
name: Raijan Aitta
content: Handmade linen and flax products, plus raspberries and strawberries in summer and cottage accommodation from €30/person.  The surrounding countryside and nearby lake are beautiful, but you'll need your own wheels to get here.

title: Tempe
name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Tempe
content: Rates include free wi-fi and breakfast. 12 miles from downtown Phoenix.

title: Umeå
name: YMCA hostel
content: Hostel popular among school groups. Dorm bunks, singles and doubles with/without shower available. Extra charge for linen, breakfast and internet usage.

title: Chandler (Quebec)
name: La Petite Auberge
content: A handsome wood-frame house built in 1916 for the Langlois family, La Petite Auberge's location in the heart of downtown Chandler just a block off Route 132 isn't what you would call quiet. However, owner Gilda Grenier really does a good job crafting a pleasant, relaxing experience for her guests. The four guest rooms each are equipped with cable TV, free wireless Internet, and fireplaces; two bathrooms are shared among them. There's also a comfy sitting room where breakfast is served each morning from 7AM to 9PM: a full spread of French toast, pancakes, cereal, homemade jams, a selection of meat, and coffee. Parking is on-street, but free of charge. Website in French only.

title: Calgary
name: Mount Royal University Guest & Visitor Housing
content: Fully furnished one-, two- and four-bedroom apartment and townhouse units on the Mount Royal campus in southwestern Calgary (address is for the administrative office, not the residences). Two- and four-bedroom units have private bedroom keys, and include local phone calls, voice mail, and wireless internet.

title: Cairo/Downtown
name: Arabian Nights Hostel
content: A very fun hotel located next to Khan el Khalily and near the Citadel.  Staff are very friendly and helpful.  There is a great view from the roof, with an Arabian style tent set up.  They are now having a free Sufi dancing show on their roof every Sunday. Comfortable clean rooms, good help with trip ideas and Cairo tips.  Free wifi, air conditioning, breakfast and as many hot drinks as you want.  Rooms start from 80 Egyptian pounds.

title: Seminyak
name: Villa Seminyak Estate & Spa
content: 76 rooms in 52 villas.

title: Lahti
name: Hotelli Cumulus Lahti
content: Pet friendly hotel in the center of Lahti. There are conference facilities for 50 people. The hotel has 171 rooms, bar and disco.

title: Santa Cruz Trek
name: Ahruaycocha
content: Alpamayo Base Camp - good destination for a side trip on the third day.

title: Smiths Falls
name: Comfort Inn
content: 64 room hotel on Rideau Canal, restaurant, wi-fi, some rooms have refrigerators or whirlpool baths.

title: Ambleside
name: Waterhead
content: 4 stat town house boutique hotel.

title: Simferopol
name: Hotel Sportivnaya
content: Quite OK hotel. Friendly staff, breakfast is included in the room rate. Sauna with a pool. Cons: small rooms, poor Wi-Fi signal.

title: Puy-de-Dôme
name: Chateau Royal de Saint-Saturnin
content: 13th century chateau-hotel in the Volcano Regional Park. Table d'hote restaurant, large car park, all rooms have en-suite bathrooms.

title: Okayama
name: Hotel Granvia Okayama
directions: There is a walkway within Okayama Station directly to the hotel or exit the station and turn right
price: Rooms from ¥13,860 single, ¥18,480 double, although rates escalate quickly above the standard class; suites begin at ¥69,300
content: Plenty of luxury to be found here, including an indoor pool, sauna, gym, and eight restaurants & bars.

title: Benson (Arizona)
name: Comfort Inn
content: Free breakfast and wi-fi, nonsmoking, pool, pet-friendly.

title: Cebu (city)
name: Cebuview Tourist Inn
content: All rooms are fully A/C with cable TV and ''en suite'' WC/hot and cold shower. Family rooms are also available for those travelling in groups. Free Wi-Fi in air-con lobby. Relatively clean and large rooms for this price bracket. Elevator and honest staff. In nightlife area.

title: Lake Wales
name: Camp Mack's River Resort
content: 265 sites. Hookups, dump station, laundry, & showers available. Tent camping permitted. Pool. Wi-fi internet access (for a fee).

title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: Hotel des Arts
directions: between Grant Ave and Kearny St
content: The hotel displays the work of contemporary local artists.

title: Tel Aviv/Central Tel Aviv
name: Dan Tel Aviv Hotel
content: Dan Hotel Tel Aviv is one of the shoreline Tel Aviv Hotels, lapped by the blue Mediterranean and located at the center of everything yet away from it all. For your choice, 2 Tel Aviv Hotels - Dan Hotel Tel Aviv and Dan Panorama Hotel Tel Aviv.  Perfect for a sun and fun vacation, a high-pressure business trip, or a bit of both.

title: Houston/Neartown
name: Hostelling International Houston
content: Located in a 1917 mansion built for one of Houston's former mayors, this hostel is within walking distance from all the best restaurants, shops, and nightlife that Montrose has to offer. Also just a short bus ride, or if weather permits a 20 minute walk from the Museum District and Downtown. Regularly hosts pub crawls, museum tours, travel classes, and Texas sized BBQ's in the backyard. HI Houston is also the only hostel in the Hostelling International network with a swimming pool, to help escape those Texas summer days.

title: Jerusalem/Old City
name: Abraham Hostel Jerusalem
directions: Twenty-minute walk from the Old City along Jaffa St.; fifteen minutes from the Central Bus Station.
content: Popular, larger hostel that keeps a community feel. Free breakfast, wi-fi, and Old City tour.

title: Batumi
name: Sheraton Batumi
content: Direct beach access and friendly service. 203 rooms including 26 suites.

title: Altrincham
name: Bull's Head and Lodge
directions: In Hale Barnes opposite Ringway Golf Course
content: Lodge that adjoins the village pub, handy for the airport and M56

title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
name: Alamo Campground
content: 4 tent sites, no water. Reservation only, made in the Kris Eggle Visitor Center on the first day of the visit.

title: Malacca
name: Time Hotel Melaka
content: air-con rooms, all of which have cable TV, comfy duvet, and private hot and cold rainshower. High-speed Internet access, currency exchange, and business centre. While staying here, you can visit some interesting places like A'Famosa Fort, and Jonker Walk.

title: Aswan
name: Old Cataract Hotel
content: Live it up like the aristocrats of old! Part of the Sofitel Legend chain of hotels, the Old Cataract Hotel overlooks the Nile River opposite the island of Elephantine.

title: Boston/South Boston
name: Seaport Hotel
content: One of the new deluxe hotels that's sprung up around the South Boston waterfront area in the past couple years.

title: Granada
name: Oasis Backpackers' Hostel
