content: Pleasant hostel on the edge of the Albayzin district with a lively atmosphere. 24hr tea & coffee, welcome drink, daily activities, internet & wifi and a lovely patio and big roof-top terrace.

title: Bodrum
name: Kaya Pansiyon
content: In the heart of Bodrum, but in a peaceful location. Rooms with balcony, TV, air conditioner and bathroom. Venere top clean 2013 and Tripadvisor certificate of excellence 2013 awards.

title: Rio de Janeiro/Zona Sul
name: Art Hostel Rio
content: Fairly new hostel in what used to be the Hotel Hispano Brasileiro.

title: Budapest/Central Pest
name: Mellow mood Marco Polo hostel
content: Staff not particularly welcoming or helpful. Very clean and well maintained. Easy to find. Internet access was expensive (250ft/half hour) in the portal. Breakfast for fee.

title: Lac-Mégantic
name: Le Quiet
content: 47 room hotel/motel, wi-fi, meeting facilities, restaurant adjacent.

title: San Francisco/Civic Center-Tenderloin
name: USA Hostels San Francisco
directions: between Jones St and Leavenworth St
content: Great hostel operating in two buildings just off Union Square. All rooms have their own bathrooms.

title: Chumphon
name: Had Suay Resort
address: Ao Bo Mao Beach, Pathio, Chumphon
content: Basic modern, clean bungalows on the beach with individual balconies. Air-con, cable TV. Views of the long sand beach bay and Ko Khai. No restaurant. Free pickup from nearby airport.

title: Pécs
name: Hotel Laterum ****
directions: W 2.5 km close to the Third Theatre of Pécs
content: Is in western part of Pécs. Hotel Laterum has been a provider of youth- and group tourism for over 15 years, while also serving as a meeting place for both international and domestic conferences, various events, weddings.

title: Freeport (Maine)
name: Recompence Shore Campground
content: Eco-friendly campground set on 625 acres on the shore of Casco Bay. Run by Wolfe's Neck Farm, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization. 115 sites (22 with 30 amp service), kayak, bicycle and canoe rentals, camp store & hiking trails.

title: Banja Luka
name: Hostel Zeleni Most
directions: On the west side of the Zeleni Most (Green Bridge), 500m from the city center
content: mobile phone: +387 65 404 666. Right across Kod Nane-restaurant

title: Tornio
name: Tornion Kaupunginhotelli
content: Situated in Tornio centre by the river. 98 rooms with shower and toilet, telephone, tv and wireless Internet connection. 5 different restaurants and a sauna compartment.

title: Marrakech
name: Riad Basma
directions: From square Jamaa el Fnaa walk up to derb Dabachi and count 3 small streets (derbs) on the right turn right and keep on until nr. 22.
content: 5 double rooms with bathroom.

title: Okayama
name: Toyoko Inn Okayama-eki Nishiguchi Hiroba
directions: 2 minutes from Okayama Station's West Exit (Nishiguchi)
content: A nice and affordable hotel chain with a good reputation. Free Wi-Fi in rooms and lobby. Free breakfast from 6:30AM-9:30AM. There are actually three Toyoko Inns around Okayama Station, so if you're a fan of the chain, you may want to check the others if this one is full or to compare prices.

title: Eindhoven
name: Park Plaza Mandarin Eindhoven
content: Located in the city centre and close to the train station, has an indoor swimming pool and 3 restaurants

title: Budapest/Central Pest
name: Hotel Gloria Budapest and Szapáry Restaurant
phone: +36 70 9349 013. There is also a restaurant (up to 50 people). Small hotel in a very quiet green belt of the city. Rooms with breakfast.
price: Preseason, Offseason sgl / dbl / Apartment €38 / 48 / 60, Highseason sgl / dbl / Apartment €44 / 56 / 78, Special season sgl / dbl / Apartment €52 / 72 / 86. Parking 15 €/day. Highseason: Mar–Oct. Breakfast €12
content: ***. There are 26 doubles and the 2 apartments all with private bath, refrigerator, SAT TV, direct dial telephone and hair-dryer. Capacity: 60 beds. Services: 24-hour multi-language reception, enclosed parking place, garden, free transfer, rent-a-car, ticketing, laundry. - +phone=+36 70 9349 013. There is also a restaurant (up to 50 people). Small hotel in a very quiet green belt of the city. Rooms with breakfast.

title: Charles Town
name: Hillbrook Inn
content: Bed and breakfast with beautiful rooms and suites featuring iPads with free Wi-Fi, and breakfast daily. Fine dining restaurant on-site.

title: Esino Lario
name: Albergo Ristorante Santa Maria
directions: Outside the centre in the direction of Cainallo, towards Gromeduccio
content: An charming hotel immerse in nature. 7 rooms, 19 beds.

title: Montreal/Downtown
name: Loews Hotel Vogue
directions: between rue Sainte-Catherine and boul de Maisonneuve; metro Peel
content: Close to the corner of rue Sainte-Catherine in the centre of city's main shopping district.

title: León (Mexico)
name: Real Azteca Hotel
directions: one block from the shoe shopping plazas
content: Seems quite nice, reasonably clean, air, wifi, restaurant.

title: Dumaguete
name: Harolds Mansion
content: popular "backpacker" hotel. Rooms are spacious and clean with a/c or fans. Free coffee all day & rate includes a small breakfast in the upstairs cafe. Free Internet/Wi-Fi as well. This is where many of the foreign tourists stay, especially divers. If you are travelling out to Apo island you can leave your large bags there safely. Harold himself is extremely friendly and helpful. Harold is happy to have Peace Corps volunteers visit. There is also an attached massage place that is clean and cheap. Dive shop in the same building, tours arranged.

title: Munich/Ludwigsvorstadt-Isarvorstadt
name: Courtyard by Marriott Munich City Center
content: A typical Courtyard property in the dense quarter immediately south of the Hauptbahnhof.

title: Mitzpe Ramon
name: The JNF Grove
directions: Just beside the town center's traffic circle
content: Has taps for drinking water, but the toilets are permanently out of order.

title: Minnetonka
name: Holiday Inn Express
content: 15 minutes from the MSP airport and downtown. Complementary continental breakfast served daily.

title: Malacca
name: Chong Hoe Hotel
directions: Goldsmith St, opposite of Masjid Kampung Kling
price: A/C room w/ TV RM30, A/C w/ bathroom RM50+
content: Air-con and TV rooms without bathroom for RM30 and air-con singles/doubles with TV and bathroom for RM50 onwards. The rooms are nice and clean, Wi-Fi in rooms.

title: Kőszeg
name: Csikar Inn Pension
price: double / triple / quad HUF 10400/13300 / 15800-16600 Breakfast is included. Half board +HUF2000
content: Pansion: twenty one rooms (bathroom, TV, mini bar, telephone) 54 persons. Services: parking: 50 cars, bowling and fitness room, sightseeing, hiking tours to explore area attractions, horse riding (nearby) -Its restaurant has 120 seat, there is a terrace for 100 persons and the Events Hall capable of holding 200 persons

title: Front Royal
name: Holiday Inn & Suites Front Royal Blue Ridge Shadows
directions: on US522/340: 2 miles north of I-66
content: 2012 IHG Torchbearer Award Winner (Holiday Inn's Highest Honor) and 2011 IHG Newcomer Award Winner (Best New Holiday Inn).  A conference hotel with 124 Guest Rooms, 26 one bedroom suites and conference facilities seating up to 300 people for banquets. The hotel offers free wireless internet, coin-op guest laundry, 24 hour fitness center and business centers and a heated indoor pool/whirlpool. Guest rooms come with 32-inch LCD TVs with HBO, Refrigerators and oversized desks with ergonomic chairs.

title: Rheinburgenweg
name: Romantik Hotel Schloss Rheinfels
content: Attached to the hotel, through the small shop is a restaurant excellent view of the valley.

title: Oracle
name: Peppersauce Campground
content: Located in Coronado National Forest on the northern slope of Mt Lemmon, this picturesque campground is managed by the National Forest Service. Toilets and water, no hookups, RVs up to 22'.

title: Stuttgart
name: Alex30 Hostel
price: Shared room from €22. Private rooms also available
content: Central hostel with breakfast buffet. Youth Hostel card is not required to stay. WiFi €1; also a computer terminal at regular rates.

title: Bayreuth
name: Hotel-Gasthof Opel
content: This hotel occupies a 19th century building around 3 km from the center of Bayreuth and run by the Opel family. Free wireless internet and free parking is available.

title: Sopron
name: Danubius Bio Sport Hotel Lövér
content: **** 117 rooms (most with balcony) , three suites. All rooms with hair dryer, minibar, radio, TV, bathrobes on request. There are some connecting and smoking rooms. The hotel service include: laundry service, room service, hotel safe deposit box, souvenir shop, parking facilities for cars and coaches, playroom for children, playground, resting park, free WiFi in common areas.- There is the 'Borostyán Restaurant and terrace' (serving Hungarian and International cuisine also diet and spa menus), health bar, drink bar.

title: Kisangani
name: Palm Beach Hôtel
content: Air-con, TV, pool, restaurant (expensive), & bar

title: Halifax (Nova Scotia)
name: Prince George
content: The Prince George Hotel offers guests 189 rooms. There is a restaurant on the premises.

title: Manila/Malate
name: Chill Out Guest house
price: A/C Dorm ₱350, fan room ₱700, A/C room with bathroom ₱1500-1800
content: A/C dorms beds and fan double rooms. Free tea and coffee, free wifi, open kitchen.

title: San Pedro de Atacama
name: Backpackers San Pedro
content: Very friendly backpackers atmosphere. There's music, hammocks, and a picnic table in the common area and usually people to chat with in the evenings. WiFi works well and there are two computers for public use. The employees are very friendly and helpful too.

title: Lahad Datu
name: Bike and Tours Rooms
address: Lot 50 Taman Kafoh, MDLD 1470, Jalan Segama
content: Comfortable rooms - homestay-like - with AC and fan, free WiFi, breakfast buffet included in room rate and free flow of coffee and tea. Free airport pickup and drop-off. Bike rental and tours. Meals on request. [http://goo.gl/maps/JjqFb map]

title: Santiniketan
name: Mark & Meadows Resort
content: 3 star property spread over 5 acres with swimming pool, fishing pond, games room, children's park, multicusine restaurant, banquet halls, conference halls, 32 cottage style A/C rooms with running hot/cold water.

title: Jimbaran
name: Puri Bambu Hotel
content: All rooms have balconies overlooking the pool or gardens. 2 restaurants and a large pool with a sunken swim-up bar. Complimentary airport transfers.

title: Davenport
name: Residence Inn Davenport
content: Kitchen/kitchenette, free high-speed Internet, continental breakfast, indoor pool and fitness center.

title: Leamington Spa
name: 8 Clarendon Crescent
directions: just a 3 minute walk off the Upper Parade
content: This is a lovely B&B where guests are warmly welcomed by Christine and David. Each room has an ensuite bathroom and the breakfasts will keep you going through the day.

title: Łódź
name: Hostelling International Youth Hostel
content: The rooms are clean, but very basic in terms of amenities. The hostel hosts large groups of young children that often run around the halls screaming. There's also a curfew requiring guests to be in the hostel no later than 22:59, though its possible to come back at a later time, when arranged in advance.

title: Santiago de Chile/Historic Center
name: Casa Moro
directions: Santiago Centro 3 blocks from La Moneda metro station
content: A small bed and breakfast with 4 guest rooms; all with private bathrooms, internet access, maid service daily and a great breakfast every morning of your stay. The house is three levels with two patios and many common spaces. Dinner is offered for those who want that option.

title: Győr
name: Amarillis Hotel
price: Sgl/dbl/tpl HUF 7400/10200/12800 plus HUF750 p.p. breakfast

title: Jakarta/North
name: Aston Marina
address: Marina Mediterania,Tower A, Jl. Lodan Raya No. 2A,
content: 358 units of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments plus 2 exclusive penthouses. Apartment style hotel with kitchen, but you still can have breakfast downstairs.

title: Bangkok/Silom
name: Narai Hotel
alt: โรงแรมนารายณ์
content: Great value for money, as the rooms are luxurious with flat-screen televisions, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and nice views over the city. Amenities include a huge breakfast as well as room service. All of this for a cheaper price than other hotels in the area.

title: Gili Air
name: Scallywags Mango Retreat
content: Six rooms with private garden and outdoor shower, flat screen TVs with satellite service, mini bar, wifi. Also has a restaurant on the beach.

title: Kuala Lumpur/Golden Triangle
name: Sunshine Bedz
content: A small and friendly family run hostel with modern but basic facilities. Breakfast is included in the price and free Wi-Fi/computers also available.

title: Orchha
name: Gantapi Guesthouse
content: Decent clean rooms, small garden with view of the palaces, hot water.

title: Belper
name: The Lion Hotel
content: 22 rooms

title: Las Vegas
name: Bally's
content: A moderate hotel and casino, but the location at the center of the Strip and the large rooms makes it one of the best values around.

title: Siliguri
name: Barsana Hotel
content: Khaprail Road, Matigara. A beautiful hotel with all the modern amenities. Very reasonable as per the infrastructure and facilities.

title: Palmarin
name: Lodge de Palmarin
content: The Lodge de Palmarin lies just south of the village of Diakhanor along a quiet stretch of the Petite Côte. The superb tranquility of the lodge is only enhanced by the hospitably of its staff. In true Sereer fashion, terranga at the Lodge de Palmarin is instantly recognizable. A stay here has the distinct feel of a visit with family or old friends

title: Berlin/Mitte
name: Helter Skelter Hostel Berlin
content: Double rooms start at €46/room, big dorms start at €13.

title: London/South Kensington-Chelsea
name: 54 Boutique Hotel
content: Across the road from the Natural History Museum.

title: Geneva
name: Mon-Repos
price: Single room from 207CHF, double room from 258CHF (low season of 2009).
content: Member of Swiss Quality Hotels International. Three star superior hotel situated 1km away from the railway station and 1.5km from the city center.

title: Las Vegas
name: Palace Station
content: A modest hotel that's part of the local Station Casinos chain, with lower rates and better games than those typical of Vegas hotels.

title: Percé
name: À la Revasse
content: Open all year. Located in a residential section of Percé town centre, convenient to all the action but secluded enough for guests to enjoy some peace and quiet, À la Revasse is a sturdy old house with five comfy guest rooms, all of which boast private baths and are decorated in a maritime theme. Here, the Tourist Wharf and all the shops and attractions are just a short walk away—ask the knowledgeable owners for tips; they've lived in Percé their whole lives and know the town inside and out—but you can also just relax on the porch or, if it gets nippy, inside by the fireplace. Breakfast in the morning features homemade local favourites, such as blueberry pancakes and old-fashioned chopped pork ''creton''. There's free WiFi, and free parking in the driveway—or, if you've arrived on the '''Route Verte''', there's a shed out back to store your bike.

title: Tolú
name: Hostal El Velero
content: The modern hotel is located on the beach-front just next to the marina. The rooms are spacious but there is no breakfast available. On the ground floor of the new building is a pool and veranda with loungers. Beautiful sunset views are guaranteed.

title: Saint Petersburg/Vasilievsky Island
name: Park Inn by Radisson Pribaltiyskaya
content: Overlooking the Gulf of Finland. 1193 rooms. Hotel services include a business centre, a fitness centre, an on-site spa, a hairdresser, gift shops, currency exchange, visa support and concierge, 24-hour medical services and a free shuttle to the city centre.

title: Copenhagen/Vesterbro
name: Hotel Astoria
directions: Located right at the Central Station.
content: Astoria is owned by DGI-byen, and guests get a free pass to the DGI pool and gym, no smoking

title: Kyoto/North
name: Duo Inn
directions: About 50 min. from Kyoto Station via #50 bus, or 15 min. walk north from JR Enmachi Station
price: Singles ¥6300, doubles ¥8400−10,500, triples ¥12,600, 2-4 person Japanese-style room ¥14,700
content: Apartment hotel. Fairly far out in northwest Kyoto but the prices are reasonable. Prices are significantly lower for stays of 7 or more nights. Payment by cash only. No daily cleaning and no bath towels provided. Bus journey from Kyoto Station takes about 50 minutes.

title: North Branch (Minnesota)
name: AmericInn
content: Heated indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, and guest laundry facilities available. Free wireless internet and free breakfast. Pets allowed.

title: Munich/East
name: Golden Leaf Hotel Perlach Allee Hof
directions: S-Bahn S7, S27 & U-Bahn U5: Neuperlach Süd
content: Standart 3 star hotel, with all necessary amenities.

title: Princeton (British Columbia)
name: Ponderosa Motel
price: One bed room $78, two queen beds $88, family room (3 beds) $129. Weekly and monthly rates are also available.
content: 22 rooms, some with kitchenettes. Indoor pool and hot tub.

title: Mombasa
name: PrideInn
content: Singles, doubles and triples equipped with kitchen. Conference room.

title: Tashkent
name: Shodlik Palace Hotel
directions: Metro station Paxtakor and Metro station Alisher Navoiy are both west of its
content: A four star hotel

title: Siliguri
name: Hotel Central Plaza
content: Hill Cart Road, Pradham Nagar. Located about five minute taxi ride from main bus station. Clean and acceptable facilities.  ₹650 non A/C to ₹3,500 for suite.

title: Zakynthos
name: Daphnes Villas and Apartments
directions: 100 m from Porto Roma beach at the very end of Vasilikos peninsula
content: 10 self-catered cottages sleeping 2-7 people. Air-con, Internet, library, playroom, playground, maid service, bed linen, bicycles, BBQ all included in the price. Walking distance to beach, supermarket, taverns and car rental. Open May - October.

title: Minneapolis/Downtown
name: Aloft Minneapolis
content: Located in the Mill District, across the street from the Guthrie Theater, Mill City Museum, Gold Medal Park, and the Stone Arch Bridge. Includes an on site bar, XYZ.

title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Americas Best Value Inn - Golden Gate
directions: between Pierce St and Scott St
content: A 100% non smoking hotel with 40 rooms; the Golden Gate is on Lombard St and so has good access to public transportation. They have a restaurant and bar on the premises, and offer free wi-fi, free continental breakfast, and limited free parking.

title: Rio de Janeiro/Zona Sul
name: Che Lagarto Suites Copacabana Santa Clara
content: The Suites has two types of rooms: Private and Private Low Cost. Breakfast, public kitchen and WIFI included.

title: Lancaster (Pennsylvania)
name: The Red Caboose Motel
content: All of the rooms are converted railroad cabooses. The restaurant is a real dining car. Located next door to the National Toy Train museum and near the Strasburg railroad and the Choo-Choo barn. Free petting zoo on site. Observation tower on site. Rooms are not fancy and Wi-Fi coverage is spotty.

title: Albuquerque
name: Days Inn Midtown Albuquerque
directions: near the intersection of I-40 and I-25
content: Shuttle service to and from airport and convention center from 7AM-11PM daily.

title: Tallinn
name: My City Hotel
content: The hotel in the conspicious white early 20th century building may look like many others in Tallinn with the slightly outdated and pretentious decor, but behind this veneer lies a true dedication to detail, extending as far as featuring a bathtub duck in the courtesy toiletries set.

title: Tabriz
name: Hotel International
address: In Front of Blour Tower, Emam Ave.
content: Renovated interior, very clean and quiet, semi-international standards (meaning new western bathroom, soap, clean towels, room service, buffet breakfast, TV, mini-bar, English-speaking staff ...). Worth a good European 3 star hotel.

title: Pine City
name: Snake River Campground
directions: East on County Road 8 (St. Croix Road) to Snake River Campground Road.
content: Campsites consist of a cleared area, fire ring and table. In addition, vault toilets, garbage cans and drinking water are available. All sites are on a first-come, first-served basis.

title: San Francisco/Civic Center-Tenderloin
name: Cova Hotel
directions: between Hyde St and Larkin St
content: This hotel has 96 well decorated rooms in the heart of downtown. All rooms have 300 thread count sheets, high definition TVs, complimentary breakfast, and free wi-fi.

title: Uzhhorod
name: Five Flags Hostel
content: Friendly hostel in the centre. It offers an 8-bed dorm and a private room with a double bed. The hostel has clean bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen and a common room with cozy sofas and an Internet-connected computer.

title: Lalibela
name: Cliff Edge Hotel
price: Sgl 800 birr, dbl/twin 1000 birr, triple 1200 birr (June 2013), VISA accepted with 5% surcharge
content: A nondescript, 3 stories high, modern hotel sharing a spectacular view with the others in this location. 18 ''en suite'' rooms without TV or phone or a closet to hang your clothes but satellite TV in the reception area. Free Wi-Fi throughout. Car park for 12 vehicles is guarded 24 hours. No standby generator, laundry service. Dismal restaurant with an even more dismal menu and kitchen.

title: Fredensborg
name: Fredensborg Store Kro
content: A Grand old hotel right by the castle, in both the best and worst sense of old - at its best it is elegant and timeless, but the rooms are starting to show its age, and could an update to modern times. The in house '''restaurant''' Anna Sophie, fares much better, and serves upscale food in a beautiful old room.

title: Jammu
name: Vardaan Hotel Jammu
content: Vardaan Jammu is located at a walking distance from Inter State Bus Terminal and 5 minutes drive from Residency Road Shopping Centre. 27 Tastefully decorated rooms, sports cafe', business centre, travel desk, meeting rooms, banquets are among the services available.

title: Patan
name: Greenwich Village Hotel
directions: close to the Summit hotel. Taxis may not know either so check before starting your journey.
content: A quiet, comfortable NGO-type hotel. Ten minutes walk to main road.

title: Safford (Arizona)
name: Best Western Desert Inn
content: Free breakfast and wi-fi, pets accepted.

title: Shebekino
name: Hotel Dve reki
content: The best hotel in the town on the banks of two rivers.

title: Kerikeri
name: Moon Gate Villa
directions: turn right off SH10 towards Kerikeri.  Left side 1.8 km before Kerikeri Village
content: Stylish accommodation set within an exotic garden, 2 minutes from Kerikeri Village, walking distance to restaurants, wineries and craft shops.  A unique, modern villa with waterfalls and reflective pools; king suites with luxury linens.

title: Lieksa
name: Hotelli Puustelli
content: A basic hotel in the town centre of Lieksa.

title: Belitung
name: Martani Hotel
address: Jl. Yos Sudarso no.18, Tanjung Pandan
price: Doubles from Rp120,000, family from Rp400,000
content: Subpar hotel in a central location. Room with simple breakfast. Family room has a home theater system!

title: Karachi
name: Bloom Luxury Hotel
content: A nice choice as compared to other budget hotels in the city in terms of quality. Some balcony rooms are also available. Ask at the reception.

title: Kota Kinabalu
name: Lucy Backpackers
address: Lot No.25, Lorong Dewan, Australia Place
content: Look behind a stamp-makers shop for this nice little house with two dorm rooms available at a competitive rate. B&B. Friendly owner, friendly cat. Free, secure Wi-Fi. Nice and central. Safe lockers available.

title: Nikko
name: Annex Turtle Hotori-An
price: Japanese-style rooms ¥6,500 for one person, ¥12,400 for two, ¥17,700 for three
content: About fifteen minutes on foot from Shinkyō Bridge, in a quiet area near the Kanmangafuchi Abyss; includes a hot spring bath and internet access.

title: Amritsar
name: Hotel City Heart and Café Heart
address: Golden Temple Rd, Jallan Wala Bagh
directions: Near Golden Temple, Opposite Jallianwala Bagh, two km of Bus Stand
price: Delux / Super Luxury/ Inter Connected /Suite Rooms Rs. 2050 /3100 /6300/ 6100, Extra Bed Rs. 550 (2014)
content: Offers views of Golden Temple and the city. Three star. Rooms in Hotel: 35.- Services: 24 Hrs Front Desk, Valet Services, Express Check in, Express Check out, Laundry / Dry Cleaning Services,Drive-in Parking, Valet Parking, ATM / Bank, Car Rental, Concierge Service, Currency Exchange, Doctor on Call, Multi Lingual Staff, Sitting lounge at each floor, Safe Deposit Box, Room Service, Computer use available fax, High Speed Internetl, All Major Credit Cards Accepted, Gift Shop

title: Bishkek
name: Alpinist
content: A great value in the center of Bishkek; the Alpinist has single, double, and triple occupancy rooms available with satellite TV and internet ports, a full service cafe, a conference room, and - being true to its name - a climbing wall!

title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: La Luna Inn
directions: between Broderick St and Divisadero St
content: A rejuvenated 1960s Motor Inn. The bespoke furniture and colorful decor creates a bright, fun, and fanciful atmosphere here.

title: Marblehead (Massachusetts)
name: The Seagull Inn Bed & Breakfast
content: On beautiful Marblehead Neck just steps from ocean and harbor, this old New England inn has been restored with cherry floors, Shaker furniture, and original paintings. Comfortable and private guest suites, expandable for families. Water views from porch, dining room, some suites. Beautiful gardens. Kayaks and bikes free for guests. Beaches nearby. All rooms have private baths, TV/VCR/DVD, phone and refrigerator.

title: Ylläs
name: Hotel Kolari
content: Breakfast included. Sauna. Free WiFi.

title: Reykjavík
name: 101 Hotel
content: Named after the postcode for central Reykjavík.

title: Kőszeg
name: Kóbor Macska Pansion
price: High season (mid Apr-end of Aug)  rooms with shower, WC, color TV and double bed (6 rooms) / triple room (4 rooms) / quadruple room (2 rooms) HUF9800/12600 / 13800-14600; breakfast +HUF750, Late season all room price around ten percent off
content: [http://muemlekem.hu/muemlek?id=9177 About the building]: built in Baroque style, 18th century origin, the Neoclassical facade, made in circa 1830.  - About the accommodation:  Services: free parking, pet-friendly. Fourteen rooms,  43 people. Languages ​​spoken: Hungarian, German. Mobil:+36 30 9276543

title: Stillwater (Minnesota)
name: Water Street Inn
content: Spacious 41-room inn overlooking the St. Croix River with views of the Stillwater Lift Bridge. Rooms feature queen sized beds, double whirlpool baths, gas fireplaces, and balconies. Breakfast, wine dinners, and American cuisine offered at the on-site restaurant and Irish pub.

title: Seinäjoki
name: Omena Hotel
content: from 45€

title: Stornoway
name: Caladh Inn
content: Handy for the ferry and the bus station.

title: Bayreuth
name: Grunau Hotel
content: Larger hotel located 3.5 km east of the city center. Features wireless internet and bicycle rental.

title: Trondheim
name: Best Western Chesterfield Hotel
content: This hotel is a piece of England in the middle of Trondheim. It's within walking distance to bus- and railway station, shopping malls and museums. Buses to and from the airport (Værnesekspressen) stop right outside this hotel.

title: Stockholm/Södermalm
name: Rygerfjord
content: <br>A decommissioned diesel passenger ship, transformed to a hostel/hotel, with rooms at different price levels.

title: Vaasa
name: Radisson Blu Royal Hotel
content: Big hotel complex streching to both sides of the street. Good sauna and pool facilities, one on the top floor and another one underground. Free broadband in the rooms, and you can rent a tandem bike for €10 /2 hours. There is a nightclub, a restaurant and a pub in the hotel complex.

title: Baku
name: Caspian Hostel
directions: Old Town, around the cnr from Meridian Hotel, above Thousand Camels Hostel
content: Great location in the Old Town. 2 dorm rooms and 1 private room.

title: Regensburg
name: Hotel Goliath am Dom
content: Very nice, small and comfortable Hotel right next to Regensburg Cathedral. You can reach every point of interest from here by foot.

title: Christchurch
name: Jailhouse Accommodation
content: Newly renovated heritage backpacker accommodation with a colourful history - the former Addington Prison (closed to inmates in 1999). The Jailhouse has single, double, twin, dorm and family rooms available. Wi-Fi and free parking. Secure online bookings available.
